content: The-aufilaus, Phoo ntawv kws kuv xub sau, kuv sau has txug txhua yaam kws Yexus ua hab qha txij thaus kws nwg pib ua num
moog txug nub kws Vaajtswv coj nwg moog sau ntuj. Thaus Yexus tsi tau moog sau ntuj, nwg kuas Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv qha nwg cov timthawj kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm.

Rua qhov plaub caug nub tom qaab kws nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, nwg tau lug tshwm rua puab pum ntau zag, kuas puab paub has tas, nwg tseem muaj sa nyob. Puab tau pum nwg hab nwg qha puab txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.

Muaj ib zag thaus Yexus nrug nwg cov timthawj nyob ua ke,  nwg saamfwm rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog qhov twg le, mej yuavtsum nyob tog txug nub kws mej tau lawv le kuv Txiv coglug has tas, nwg yuav pub rua mej. Qhov ntawd kuv tub qha rua mej lawm.
Yauhaas muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus rua huv dlej, tabsis tshuav ob peb nub xwb, yuav muab mej ua kevcai raus lug ntawm Vaaj Ntsujplig Tug Dlawbhuv.”
Thaus cov timthawj nrug Yexus nyob ua ke, puab nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, lub sijhawm nuav, koj yuav muab lub Tebchaws rov rua cov Yixalayees los?”
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Tsi taag mej yuav paub has tas, nub twg hab lub sijhawm twg yuav muaj le ntawd. Lub sijhawm ntawd, nyob ntawm leej Txiv teem ca.

Tabsis thaus Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv lug nrug mej nyob lawm, nwg yuav pub fwjchim rua mej hab mej yuav ua timkhawv qha kuv zaaj moog thoob plawg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, huv lub xeev Yudas, huv lub xeev Xamalis, hab moog txug qaab ntuj kawg.”
Thaus Yexus has le ntawd taag, thaus puab tseem saib quas ntsoov Yexus, ces Vaajtswv txawm coj Yexus moog sau ntuj lawm. Muaj ib tauv fuab lug roog nwg, ces puab tsi pum nwg lawm.
Thaus puab tseem taabtom saib ntsoov Yexus moog sau ntuj, ua cav muaj ob tug txivneej naav rig tsho dlawb paug lug sawv ntawm puab.

Obtug has rua puab tas, “Cov tuabneeg Kalilais, mej sawv saib sau ntuj ua dlaabtsi? Yexus tug kws Vaajtswv nyavnyuas coj moog sau ntuj lawm, nwg yeej yuav rov qaab lug ib yaam nkaus le kws mej pum nwg moog ntaag.”
Cov timthawj txawm rov qaab peg Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj lug txug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Lub roob ntawd nyob nrug dleb ntawm lub nroog kwvlaam le ib kilumev.

Thaus puab lug txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, puab txawm moog rua huv ib lub tsev, hab nce moog rua ib chaav kws nyob txheej sau, chaav ntawd yog chaav kws puab tuaj su. Puab cov ntawd yog: Petus, Yauhaas, Yakaunpaus, Aadales, Filis, Thaumas, Npataulaumais, Mathais, Yakaunpaus kws yog Alafais tug tub, Ximoos tug kws xaav kuas nwg lub tebchaws muaj kev ywjpheej, hab Yudas kws yog Yakaunpaus tug tub.
Puab cov nuav hab ib cov quaspuj hab Malis kws yog Yexus nam hab Yexus cov kwv pheej tuaj ua ke thov Vaajtswv huv chaav tsev ntawd.
Ob peb nub tom qaab ntawd cov ntseeg tuaj saablaaj ua ke, puab muaj kwvlaam le ib puas neeg nkaum leej, ces Petus txawm sawv ntsug qha cov tuabneeg ntawd
has tas, “Cov kwvtij, yeej yuav muaj lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws Vaaj Ntsujplig qha rua Vaajntxwv Daviv sau has txug Yudas tug kws coj tuabneeg kev moog nteg Yexus.
Yudas yeej yog ib tug huv peb paab, Yexus tsaa nwg nrug peb ua ib teg num.”
(Cov nyaj kws Yudas tau thaus Yudas ua phem, Yudas muab yuav ib thaaj aav. Qhov chaw kws Yudas lub cev poob, nwg plaab tawg hab nyuv tawm taag huv tuabsi, tub yog ntawm thaaj aav ntawd ntaag.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nov zaaj nuav, puab txawm hu thaaj aav ntawd lawv le puab lug has tas, Akedamas kws txhais has tas, “Thaaj Aav Ntshaav.”)

“Tub muaj lug sau tseg rua huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj has tas, ‘Ca nwg lub tsev nyob khoob lug; tsi xob pub leejtwg moog nyob huv lub tsev ntawd.’ Hab muaj dlua ib nqai has tas, ‘Ca lwm tug lug hloov nwg chaw ua nwg teg num.’
“Yog le ntawd, tug kws yuav lug nrug peb ua num, tug ntawd yuavtsum yog ib tug kws ibtxwm nrug peb ua ke hab nrug peb tug Tswv Yexus moog rua nuav rua u,

txij thaus Yauhaas qhuab qha hab muab tuabneeg ua kevcai raus dlej  lug txug nub kws Vaajtswv coj Yexus moog sau ntuj, mas tug ntawd txhaj nrug peb ua tau timkhawv has tas, Yexus tub sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm tag.”
Ces puab pum zoo muab ob tug tuabneeg lug rua suavdlawg xaiv, ob tug ntawd ib tug yog Yauxej kws hu ua Npaxanpas (lossis hu ua Yuxatus), hab Mathias.
Puab txawm thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yog tug kws paub txhua tug lub sab huv tuabsi, yog le ntawd, thov koj qha rua peb saib ob tug nuav, koj xaiv tug twg
lug ua timthawj hloov Yudas chaw, ua teg num kws Yudas muab tso tseg hab moog rua huv qhov chaw kws yeej yog nwg lub lawm.”
Ces puab txawm rhu ntawv, saib ob tug ntawd tau tug twg. Puab rhu tau Mathias. Txij nub ntawd lug, Mathias txawm nrug kaum ib tug timthawj ntawd ua num.
Thaus txug nub Peetekos, cov ntseeg suavdlawg tuaj nyob ua ke rua huv ib lub tsev.
Ua cav txawm muaj ib lub suab nrov nroo ntwg sau ntuj lug ib yaam le ib nthwv cua hlub hlub lug rua huv lub tsev kws suavdlawg taabtom nyob ua ke.
Puab pum ib yaam zoo le tug nplaim tawg lug faib pis rhe lab vog moog rua puab txhua tug.
Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv lug kaav taagnrho puab txhua tug lub sab, ces puab txawm has tau lwm yaam lug lawv le Vaaj Ntsujplig kuas puab has.
Thaus ntawd cov Yudais kws fwm Vaajtswv tuaj txhua lub tebchaws kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav tuaj su rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus puab nov tej suab ntawd, cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd txawm tuaj saib yog le caag. Thaus puab nyag nov nyag lub tebchaws tej lug kws cov ntseeg ntawd has, puab xaav tsi thoob le.
Puab tsi paub yuav has le caag, ces puab txawm has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws taabtom has lug nuav puavleej yog tuabneeg Kalilais los sav!
Ua le caag peb nov puab has tau peb tej lug?

Peb cov ntawm nuav muaj ibtxha yog tuabneeg Pathias, tuabneeg Medias, hab tuabneeg Elaas: Muaj ibtxha tuaj tim tebchaws Mexuputamias tuaj, tuaj huv tebchaws Yudas tuaj, tuaj peg tebchaws Kapadaukias tuaj; tuaj peg tebchaws Pootus hab tebchaws Axias tuaj,

tuaj peg tebchaws Felinkias hab peg tebchaws Paafilias tuaj, tuaj nraag tebchaws Iziv tuaj, tuaj huv tej cheebtsaam huv tebchaws Linpias kws nyob ze tebchaws Kilenes tuaj. Peb ibtxha tuaj tim lub nroog Loos tuaj,

tsi has cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws kaav xeem ua tuabneeg Yudais, hab peb ibtxha tuaj tim koog Povtxwv Kaletes hab nraag tebchaws Alanpias tuaj, txawm yog peb tuaj txhua qhov chaw tuaj los peb puavleej nov puab has txug tej txujci tseemceeb kws Vaajtswv tau ua lawm. Peb totaub, rua qhov tej lug kws puab has ntawd puavleej yog peb tej lug!”
Puab nov le ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le, puab sis nug zum zawg has tas, “Tej nuav yog le caag?”
Tabsis muaj ibtxha luag cov ntseeg zum zawg has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntawd qaug cawv lawm!”

Thaus ntawd Petus hab kaum ib tug timthawj tseem sawv ntsug, ces Petus has nrov nrov rua cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd has tas, “Cov kwvtij Yudais hab mej txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav, mej ua tuab zoo noog tej kws kuv qha rua mej.
Nwgnuav nyavnyuas cuaj teev sawv ntxuv xwb, cov txivneej nuav tsi yog qaug cawv le mej has.
Tej kws muaj nuav yog lawv le Yau-ees kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawm has tas:

‘Vaajtswv has tas, thaus txug tam kws nplajteb yuav kawg, kuv yuav ua le nuav: Kuv yuav pub kuv tug Ntsujplig rua txhua tug. Mej tej tub tej ntxhais yuav cev kuv tej lug. Mej tej tub hluas yuav ua ywgtoog, hab tej laug yuav ua npau suav.
Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, thaus txug tam ntawd, kuv yuav pub kuv tug Ntsujplig rua kuv cov tubkhai, tsi has quaspuj hab txivneej huv tuabsi. Puab yuav cev kuv tej lug.
Kuv yuav ua tej txujci tseemceeb rua sau nruab ntug, hab huv nplajteb nuav. Yuav muaj ntshaav, muaj nplaim tawg hab paa tawg;
thaus tseem tsi tau txug nub tseemceeb kws ci ntsaa ab kws tug Tswv lug, lub nub yuav tsaus, hab lub hli yuav lab le ntshaav.
Thaus ntawd tug kws thov tug Tswv paab, tug ntawd yuav dlim.’

“Cov kwvtij Yixalayees, mej ca le noog tej lug kws kuv yuav qha nuav! Vaajtswv khaiv Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales lug ua tej txujci tseemceeb qha Vaajtswv lub fwjchim rua mej. Tej kws mej pum ntawd qha rua mej paub has tas, Yexus yog tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug tag.

Qhov kws Vaajtswv muab Yexus rua mej, mej muab nwg rua cov tuabneeg txhum coj moog ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, hab mej kuas puab muab nwg tua povtseg, qhov ntawd tub yog lawv le Vaajtswv pum zoo hab npaaj tseg lawm.
Tabsis Vaajtswv tub dlaws Yexus dlim hab tsaa Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm; txujkev tuag lub fwjchim yuam tsi tau nwg.
Rua qhov Daviv has txug nwg has tas: ‘Kuv naj nub pum tug Tswv nrug kuv nyob; Nwg nyob ntawm kuv saab xis, kuv txhaj tsi ntxhuv sab.
Tub yog vim le nuav kuv txhaj zoo sab, hab tej lug kws kuv has ua rua suavdlawg paub has tas kuv zoo sab. Txawm yog kuv yog tuabneeg xwb los kuv tseem muaj kev ca sab,
rua qhov koj yeej yuav tsi tso kuv tug ntsujplig rua huv tubtuag teb; koj yuav tsi ca koj tug tubkhai kws ncaaj nceeg cev nqaj lwj rua huv qhov ntxaa.
Koj tub qha txujkev kws coj tuabneeg moog txug txujsa rua kuv paub lawm, hab qhov kws koj nrug kuv nyob, ua rua kuv zoo sab kawg le.’
“Cov kwvtij, kuv yuav qha rua mej paub txug peb yawmkoob Daviv. Nwg tub tuag hab puab muab nwg lub cev coj moog log lawm, naj nub nwgnuav nwg lub ntxaa tseem nyob.

Thaus Daviv tseem ua neej nyob, nwg yog ib tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug. Nwg paub tseeb has tas Vaajtswv tub coglug rua nwg has tas, Vaajtswv yuav tsaa nwg ib tug xeebntxwv lug ua vaajntxwv ib yaam le nwg.

Daviv tub paub ua ntej lawm has tas, tug Mexiyas yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug. Daviv txhaj has tas: ‘Vaajtswv yuav tsi tso nwg tseg rua huv tubtuag teb; nwg cev nqaj yuav tsi lwj rua huv qhov ntxaa.’
Tug Yexus nuav yog tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, peb ua timkhawv has tas, nwg tub sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm tag.

Vaajtswv tug kws yog Yexus Txiv, nwg coj Yexus moog nyob ntawm nwg saab xis, hab Vaajtswv pub Vaaj Ntsujplig rua Yexus lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm. Nwgnuav Yexus tub pub Vaaj Ntsujplig rua peb lawm, lawv le mej nov hab mej pum nuav.
Daviv yeej tsi tau moog sau ntuj ceebtsheej dlua le, tabsis Daviv has tas: ‘Tug Tswv has rua kuv tug Tswv has tas: koj ca le lug nyob ntawm kuv saab xis
moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeebncuab lug rua koj tsuj.’
“Yog le ntawd cov Yixalayees, mej suavdlawg yuavtsum paub has tas, tug Yexus kws mej muab ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig yog tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa ua tug Tswv hab ua tug Mexiyas lawm.”
Thaus suavdlawg nov Petus has le ntawd, puab nyuaj sab kawg le, puab txawm nug Petus hab cov timthawj has tas, “Cov kwvtij, peb yuav ua le caag?”

Petus teb puab has tas, “Mej txhua tug nyag yuavtsum tso nyag tej kev txhum tseg hab ua kevcai raus dlej ntawm Yexus Khetos lub npe, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam txim rua mej; hab mej txhaj yuav tau txais Vaaj Ntsujplig tug dlawbhuv.
Rua qhov Vaajtswv coglug tseg has tas, nwg yuav pub tej nuav rua mej, mej cov mivnyuas, hab rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob dleb tug Tswv kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hu lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Petus tseem ntuag hab qha puab ntxiv has tas, “Mej yuavtsum nrhav kev tsiv kuas dlim, mej txhaj tsi raug txim le cov tuabneeg sab phem nuav!”
Cov tuabneeg kws nov Petus qha, muaj ntau leej ntseeg hab ua kevcai raus dlej. Nub ntawd cov kws lug ntseeg muaj kwvlaam le peb txheeb leej.
Puab naj nub tuaj kawm tej kws cov timthawj qha, puab sis hlub sis paab, puab koom noj Yexus rooj mov hab thov Vaajtswv ua ke.
Thaus suavdlawg pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws cov timthawj ua, puab xaav tsi thoob le.
Cov ntseeg suavdlawg koom ib lub sab, nyag nqaa nyag tej qhov txhua chaw tuaj tso ua ke ua suavdlawg tug.
Puab muab puab tej aav hab tej khoom kws yog puab tug muag, hab puab muab tej nyaj ntawd faib rua txhua tug lawv le tug kws muaj chaw siv.

Puab naj nub moog pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev, hab puab noj Yexus rooj mov, hab noj mov ua ke huv puab tej tsev ib lub dlhau ib lub, txawm yog muaj ntau muaj tsawg los puab suavdlawg zoo sab noj.
Puab ua Vaajtswv tsaug tsi tseg tsi tu, hab tej tuabneeg suavdlawg puavleej fwm puab. Tug Tswv naj nub coj tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob zuj zug ntxiv rua cov ntseeg.
Muaj ib nub thaus peb teev nub qaij, Petus hab Yauhaas moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, thaus ntawd yog lub sijhawm kws suavdlawg tuaj thov Vaajtswv.

Muaj ib tug txivneej tuag ceg thaus nruab thab lug nyob quastsawg ntawm lub roojvaag kws hu ua lub Roojvaag Zoo Nkauj. Naj nub muaj tuabneeg kwv nwg tuaj nyob rua ntawm lub roojvaag hab thov nyaj ntawm cov tuabneeg kws tuaj thov Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev.
Thaus nwg pum Petus hab Yauhaas taabtom yuav moog huv lub Tuamtsev, nwg txawm thov kuas obtug pub ib yaam dlaabtsi rua nwg.
Obtug tsaa qhovmuag saib tug txivneej kws tuag ceg ntawd, ces Petus txawm has tas, “Koj ca le saib wb!”
Tug txivneej ntawd xaav has tas, nyaj obtug yuav pub ib yaam dlaabtsi rua nwg ntaag.
Tabsis Petus has rua nwg tas, “Kuv tsi muaj nyaj, tabsis kuv yuav muab yaam kws kuv muaj rua koj: Kuv tuav Yexus Khetos kws yog tuabneeg Naxales lub npe has rua koj tas, koj ca le sawv hab moog kev!”
Petus tuav nkaus tug txivneej ntawd saab teg xis nqug nwg sawv. Taamsim ntawd nwg ob txhais ceg hab tej cos txhaa txawm muaj zug lawm;
nwg sawv tseeg nrug Petus hab Yauhaas moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab nwg dlha paaj pawg ua Vaajtswv tsaug.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd pum nwg moog kev hab nov nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug,
hab thaus puab pum dlheev nwg, puab paub has tas, nwg yog tug kws naj nub tuaj nyob ntawm lub Roojvaag Zoo Nkauj thov nyaj, puab xaav tsi thoob le, sov yog ua le caag nwg moog taug kev lawm.
Thaus tug txivneej ntawd tseem tuav rawv Petus hab Yauhaas teg ntawm Xalumoos lub qaab khaav, cov tuabneeg kws pum le ntawd xaav tsi thoob le. Puab txawm dlha zum zawg lug rua ntawm Petus obtug.

Thaus Petus pum cov tuabneeg dlha zum zawg lug, Petus has rua puab tas, “Cov kwvtij Yixalayees, ua le caag mej yuav xaav tsi thoob rua tej nuav hab ua le caag mej yuav saib quas ntsoov wb? Mej xaav has tas yog wb muaj fwjchim lossis yog wb ntseeg heev, wb txhaj ua rua tug txivneej nuav moog taug kev nua los?

Tug Vaajtswv kws yog peb yawmkoob Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv ua rua nwg tug Tubkhai Yexus tau koob meej. Tabsis mej nteg nwg coj moog rua cov numtswv kws muaj fwjchim. Thaus Philaj taug nwg zaaj, txawm yog Philaj xaav muab nwg tso los mej tsi kaam.
Nwg yog tug dlawbhuv hab ncaaj nceeg, tabsis mej tsi kaam Philaj tso nwg. Mej tsua thov kuas Philaj tso tug tuabneeg kws tua tuabneeg rua mej.
Mej muab tug kws cawm tuabneeg txujsa tua povtseg, tabsis Vaajtswv tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, peb txhaj ua timkhawv has tas nwg tub sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm tag.

Tub yog Yexus lub npe kws muaj fwjchim khu tau tug txivneej tuag ceg kws mej pum ntawd muaj zug ntaag. Tub yog vim tug txivneej kws mej pum hab paub nuav ntseeg Yexus, nwg txhaj zoo. Mej pum has tas nwg zoo lawm vim nwg ntseeg Yexus.
“Cov kwvtij, kuv paub has tas qhov kws mej hab mej cov thawjcoj ua le ntawd rua Yexus, vim mej tsi paub.
Yaav thaus u Vaajtswv kuas cov cev Vaajtswv lug qha ua ntej has tas, tug Mexiyas yuav raug kev tsimtxom; nwgnuav tub muaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv tau has tseg lawm.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum tso mej tej kev txhum tseg hab tig rov lug cuag Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam mej lub txim. Yog mej ua le ntawd,
tug Tswv yuav paab kuas mej tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug. Vaajtswv yuav khaiv Yexus kws yog tug Mexiyas lug paab mej.

Yexus yuav nyob sau ntuj ceebtsheej moog txug thaus kws ib puas tsaav yaam hloov dlua tshab taag huv tuabsi, tej nuav muaj lawv le cov cev Vaajtswv lug kws yog tuabneeg dlawbhuv thaus u tau qha tseg lawm.
Rua qhov Mauxes has tas, ‘Tug Tswv kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav tsaa mej cov ib tug ua tug cev Vaajtswv lug ib yaam le nwg tau tsaa kuv,  mej yuavtsum noog txhua yaam kws nwg qha rua mej.
Yog leejtwg tsi noog tej lug kws tug cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd qha, Vaajtswv yuav muab tug ntawd tshem tawm ntawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg moog hab tug ntawd yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.’
Cov cev Vaajtswv lug thaus u kws yog suav txij Xamuyees lug, puavleej has txug tej nuav ib yaam nkaus.

Thaus Vaajtswv kuas nwg cov cevlug qha nwg tej lug cog tseg rua mej, tub yog nwg xaav paab mej. Hab tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob, tub yog nwg coglug rua mej hab. Vaajtswv coglug tseg rua Anplahaas has tas, ‘Kuv yuav foom koob moov ntawm koj tug xeebntxwv moog rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav.’
Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj khaiv nwg tug Tubkhai kws nwg tub xaiv ca lawm lug cuag mej ua ntej, nwg foom koob moov rua mej, kuas mej txhaj tso mej tej kev txhum tseg.”
Thaus Petus hab Yauhaas tseem taabtom qha cov tuabneeg ntawd, cov povthawj qee leej,  cov tubrog kws saib lub Tuamtsev tug thawj hab ib cov Xadukais txawm tuaj nrhav obtug.

Puab chim rua Petus hab Yauhaas heev, rua qhov obtug qha rua suavdlawg has tas, Yexus tub sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm. Obtug qha le ntawd, suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas, tuabneeg sawv tau huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.
Puab txawm nteg Petus hab Yauhaas coj moog kaw ib mos, rua qhov thaus ntawd tub tsaus ntuj lawm.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tau nov obtug qha zaaj ntawd, muaj ntau leej ntseeg Yexus; suav cov txivneej kws lug ntseeg muaj kwvlaam le tsib txheeb leej.
Thaus kaaj ntug lawm, cov Yudais tej thawjcoj, cov txwjlaug hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tuaj ua ke saablaaj huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Anas kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub, Kaiyafas, Yauhaas, Alexaades hab lwm tug kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub tsev tuabneeg tuaj nrug puab saablaaj hab.
Puab coj Petus hab Yauhaas lug sawv taabmeeg puab hab puab nug obtug has tas, “Leejtwg pub fwjchim rua meb? Hab meb tuav leejtwg lub npe ua tej nuav?”
Taamsim ntawd, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txawm lug kaav Petus lub sab, Petus teb puab has tas, “Cov numtswv kws kaav pejxeem hab cov txwjlaug,
nub nua mej nug wb le nuav, yog mej nug txug qhov kws wb khu tug txivneej tuag ceg nuav lossis nug txug qhov kws nwg ob txhais ceg zoo.

Yog mej nug le ntawd, kuv teb rua mej hab cov Yixalayees suavdlawg has tas, tub yog Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales ua rua tug txivneej kws sawv taabmeeg mej nuav zoo ntaag. Yexus yog tug kws mej muab ntsa rua sau tug ntoo khaublig, tabsis Vaajtswv tub tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm.
Yexus yog tug kws Vaajtswv txujlug qha tseg has tas: ‘Lub Pobzeb kws cov kws ua tsev muab povtseg, nwgnuav tub muab lub ntawd lug ua lub thawj lawm.’
Tsi muaj leejtwg cawm tau peb dlim peb lub txim, tsuas yog Yexus tuab leeg xwb txhaj cawm tau, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug kws Vaajtswv tso lug cawm peb tuabneeg nplajteb kuas peb dlim peb lub txim le.”

Thaus puab pum has tas Petus hab Yauhaas muaj sab tawv teb le ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le, rua qhov puab paub has tas obtug yeej tsi tau kawm ntawv. Ces puab ncu dlheev txug has tas, obtug yeej nrug Yexus nyob ua ke.
Tabsis puab tsi muaj lug teb, rua qhov puab pum tug txivneej tuag ceg kws zoo lawm nrug obtug sawv ua ke ntawd.
Puab txawm kuas Petus hab Yauhaas obtug tawm moog rua nrau zoov, puab saablaaj has tas,

“Peb yuav ua le caag rua obtug? Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav puavleej paub has tas, zaaj txujci tseemceeb nuav tub yog obtug ua, yog peb yuav has tas tsi yog obtug ua los yeej has tsi tau.
Peb yuavtsum txwv tsi pub obtug has Yexus lub npe rua leejtwg le, zaaj nuav txhaj yuav tsi nrov nchaa moog rua suavdlawg nov.”
Puab txawm hu obtug rov qaab lug, hab puab has rua obtug kuas obtug tsi xob has lossis qha Yexus zaaj ib zag le lawm.
Tabsis Petus hab Yauhaas teb puab has tas, “Wb noog mej lug zoo dlua le wb noog Vaajtswv lug los? Mej sim xaav saib, ob qho nuav qhov twg yuav hum Vaajtswv sab dlua?
Tej kws wb nov hab wb pum lawm, wb yeej yuav qha, wb npog tsi tau le.”

Cov numtswv hajyam txwv obtug tawv dlua thawj zag, ces puab maam le tso obtug moog. Puab tsi paub yuav rau txim le caag rua obtug, rua qhov tej tuabneeg kws pum zaaj txujci tseemceeb ntawd suavdlawg puavleej qhuas Vaajtswv.
Tug txivneej kws Vaajtswv khu zoo ntawd noobnyoog muaj plaub caug tawm xyoo lawm.
Thaus cov numtswv tso Petus hab Yauhaas lawm, obtug rov moog rua ntawm cov ntseeg hab qha tej kws cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov txwjlaug txwv obtug rua puab noog.

Thaus cov ntseeg nov le ntawd, puab koom ua ib lub sab thov Vaajtswv has tas: “Vaajtswv, koj yog tug kws tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb, tsim dlej havtxwv hab tsim ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob sau nruab ntug, nyob huv nplajteb hab huv havtxwv,
koj kuas Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv qha rua peb yawmkoob Daviv kws yog koj tug tubkhai has tas: ‘Vim le caag lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg chim heev; hab tej tuabneeg tuavhuv ua phem, tabsis ua tsi tau?
Cov vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nplajteb nuav sawv nreg nroog tog hab cov numtswv tuaj ua ke tawmtsaam tug Tswv hab tug Mexiyas.’

Yeej muaj le ntawd tag, rua qhov Helauj hab Pauti-us Philaj obtug nrug lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg hab cov Yixalayees tuaj ua ke rua huv lub nroog nuav tawmtsaam Yexus kws yog koj tug Tubkhai dlawbhuv kws koj tsaa ua tug Mexiyas lawm.
Tej kws puab ua nuav tub yog muaj lawv le koj lub fwjchim hab koj tau npaaj sab tseg lawm.
Tug Tswv, nwgnuav thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib tej kws puab ua nruj ua tsiv rua peb. Hab thov koj paab peb cov kws yog koj cov tubkhai kuas muaj lub sab tawv qha koj txujlug.
Thov koj cev teg khu tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob, hab thaus peb tuav Yexus kws yog koj tug Tubkhai dlawbhuv lub npe, thov koj ua tej txujci tseemceeb rua suavdlawg pum.”
Thaus puab thov taag, qhov chaw kws puab nyob ntawd txawm ua zug koog, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txawm lug kaav puab txhua tug lub sab, puab txhaj muaj lub sab tawv qha Vaajtswv txujlug.
Cov ntseeg txhua tug puavleej koom ua ib lub sab. Puab nqaa puab tej qhov txhua chaw tuaj tso ua ke ua suavdlawg tug. Tsi muaj ib tug yuav has tas, tej kws nwg muaj yog nwg le.
Vaajtswv pub fwjchim rua cov timthawj, puab txhaj muaj lub sab tawv ua timkhawv has txug zaaj kws Tswv Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, hab Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab txhua tug.
Puab cov ntawd tsi muaj ib tug txomnyem le. Cov kws muaj aav ntau lossis muaj teb, muaj vaaj muaj tsev los nwg muab muag, hab coj cov nyaj kws nwg muag tau tuaj
rua cov timthawj; hab cov timthawj muab cov nyaj ntawd faib rua suavdlawg lawv le tug kws muaj chaw siv.

Yauxej kuj ua le ntawd hab; Yauxej yog xeem Levis, nwg yug tim lub koog Povtxwv Xaipas. Cov timthawj tis dlua ib lub npe rua Yauxej hu ua Npananpas, (lub npe ntawd txhais has tas “Tug kws Txhawb Zug.”)
Nwg muab nwg dlaim teb muag, hab coj cov nyaj tuaj rua cov timthawj.
Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Ananias, nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Xafilas. Ananias muab obtug thaaj aav muag,
Ananias hab nwg tug quaspuj koom sab muab cov nyaj ntawd ibtxha khaws ca lawm, hab coj ibtxha tuaj rua cov timthawj.

Petus has rua Ananias has tas, “Ananias ua le caag koj yuav ca dlaab Ntxwgnyoog kaav koj lub sab kuas koj dlaag Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, cov nyaj kws koj muag koj thaaj aav, koj tub muab ib co khaws ca lawm los sav?

Thaus koj tsi tau muag koj thaaj aav, thaaj aav ntawd yeej yog koj le; thaus koj muab muag lawm, cov nyaj yeej yog koj le hab. Ua le caag koj yuav muaj lub sab ua le ntawd? Tsi yog koj dlaag tuabneeg, tabsis yog koj dlaag Vaajtswv!”
Thaus Ananias nov Petus has le ntawd, taamsim ntawd Ananias txawm qaug ntawg hab tuag kag lawm; thaus suavdlawg nov zaaj nuav, suavdlawg ntshai kawg le.
Cov tub hluas txawm lug muab Ananias lub cev qhwv hab kwv coj moog log lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd yuav laug peb txoog teev Ananias tug quaspuj tuaj txug, tabsis nwg tsi paub has tas muaj tej xwm ntawd le.
Petus has rua Xafilas has tas, “Koj qha rua kuv saib, meb muag meb thaaj aav tau nyaj npaum le ntawd xwb tag los?”. Xafilas teb has tas, “Yog, yeej tau le ntawd xwb tag.”

Petus txawm has rua Xafilas has tas, “Ua le caag koj hab koj tug quasyawg yuav koom ua ib lub sab dlaag Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv? Koj saib, cov tuabneeg kws kwv koj tug quasyawg moog log taabtom lug txug ntawm qhovrooj, puab yuav kwv koj moog log ib yaam nkaus hab!”

Taamsim ntawd Xafilas txawm qaug ntawg rua ntawm Petus kutaw hab tuag lawm. Thaus cov tub hluas lug txug, puab pum has tas, Xafilas tub tuag lawm, ces puab txawm kwv nwg moog log nrug nwg tug quasyawg ua ke.
Cov ntseeg hab tej tuabneeg kws nov zaaj nuav, puab ntshai kawg le.
Cov timthawj ua tej txujci kws xaav tsi thoob ntau yaam rua suavdlawg pum. Cov ntseeg naj nub tuaj nyob ua ke ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua Xalumoos lub qaab khaav.
Txawm yog tsi muaj leejtwg lug koom nrug cov ntseeg los suavdlawg qhuas cov ntseeg kawg le.
Hab pheej muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg Vaajtswv coob zuj zug, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej.

Cov tuabneeg kws pum tej txujci kws cov timthawj ua, puab coj tej tuabneeg muaj mob tuaj tso rua ntawm ntug kev. Puab muab choj hab muab lev pua rua cov tuabneeg mob ntawd pw, puab ua le ntawd, puab xaav has tas thaus Petus taug kev tuaj, Petus tug dluab yuav roog cov tuabneeg mob ntawd qee leej.

Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob huv tej zog kws nyob ibncig lub nroog Yeluxalees tseem coj puab tej tuabneeg kws muaj mob hab tej tuabneeg kws raug dlaab tuaj rua cov timthawj khu, cov tuabneeg ntawd txhua tug puavleej zoo huv tuabsi.
Yog le ntawd, tug Povthawj Hlub hab cov Xadukais kws yog nwg tuab paab txhaj ntxub cov timthawj hab tuavhuv ua phem rua cov timthawj,
puab txawm nteg cov timthawj coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Tabsis mo ntawd tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug qheb lub tsev lojcuj tej qhovrooj, hab coj cov timthawj tawm moog.
Nwg has rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le tawm moog sawv huv lub Tuamtsev, hab qha lub neej tshab nuav rua suavdlawg noog.”

Cov timthawj txawm ua le ntawd, puab txhaj sawv ntxuv moog qha cov tuabneeg kws tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Tug Povthawj Hlub hab cov tuabneeg kws yog nwg tuab paab txawm hu cov Yudais tej numtswv hab cov txwjlaug tuaj ua ke saablaaj, puab khaiv tuabneeg moog coj cov timthawj huv tsev lojcuj lug cuag puab.
Tabsis thaus cov tuabneeg kws puab khaiv moog txug huv tsev lojcuj, puab tsi pum cov timthawj lawm. Puab txawm rov qaab lug has rua cov numtswv has tas,

“Thaus peb moog txug ntawm lub tsev lojcuj, peb pum lub qhovrooj tseem kaw zoo zoo, hab muaj ntsugphoo ntsug huv tuabsi. Cov tubrog kws zuv los tseem sawv ntawm qhovrooj zuv. Tabsis thaus peb qheb qhovrooj moog txug huv, tsi pum ib tug tuabneeg nyob huv le!”
Thaus cov tubrog kws zuv lub Tuamtsev tug thawj hab cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj nov puab has le ntawd, puab xaav tsi thoob le, sov cov timthawj dlua twg lawm.
Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib tug txivneej tuaj has rua puab has tas, “Mej noog kuv has, cov tuabneeg kws mej muab kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, nwgnuav puab taabtom qha suavdlawg huv lub Tuamtsev!”
Tug thawj tubrog txawm coj nwg cov tubrog moog nteg cov timthawj coj rov lug, tabsis cov tubrog tsi ua phem rua cov timthawj, rua qhov puab ntshai nyob tsaam cov pejxeem muab pobzeb ntaus puab.
Puab coj cov timthawj lug sawv taabmeeg cov numtswv hab tug Povthawj Hlub taug cov timthawj zaaj.

Nwg has rua puab has tas, “Peb tub txwv tu nrho has tas, mej tsi xob tuav tug txivneej nuav lub npe qha le nua los sav, ua le caag mej tseem qha hab? Mej saib, tej kws mej qha tub nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm. Mej tseem muab lub txim kws puab tua tug txivneej ntawd rua peb ris hab!”
Petus hab cov timthawj teb has tas, “Peb yuavtsum noog Vaajtswv lug heev dlua le noog tuabneeg lug.
Mej muab nwg ntsa rua sau tug ntoo khaublig hab muab nwg tua, tabsis tom qaab ntawd peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tub tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm.

Hab Vaajtswv kuas nwg moog nyob ntawm Vaajtswv saab xis, Vaajtswv tsaa nwg ua tug Thawj hab ua tug Cawmseej. Vaajtswv ua le ntawd kuas cov Yixalayees tso puab tej kev txhum tseg, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam txim rua puab.
Tej nuav peb hab Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv yeej ua tau timkhawv. Vaaj Ntsujplig yog tug kws Vaajtswv pub rua cov tuabneeg kws noog Vaajtswv lug.”
Thaus cov numtswv nov le ntawd, puab chim heev, puab xaav muab cov timthawj tua povtseg taamsim ntawd.

Tabsis cov numtswv ntawd muaj ib tug hu ua Nkamaliyees, nwg yog cov Falixais hab yog ib tug xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kws suavdlawg fwm heev. Nwg sawv hab kuas luas coj cov timthawj tawm moog ib plag nrau zoov,
ces nwg txawm has rua cov numtswv has tas, “Cov kwvtij Yixalayees, mej tsi xob rawm ua le caag rua cov tuabneeg nuav, mej yuavtsum ua tuab zoo taug puab zaaj tsaiv.

Mej puas ncu has tas, yaav taag lug The-udas khaav has tas, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg tseemceeb, hab yuav laug muaj plaub puas leej tuaj nwg tog, tabsis nwg raug luas muab tua tuag lawm. Ces cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nwg tog txawm tsiv ua dlog ua dlig taag, nwgnuav tub tsi nov leejtwg has txug nwg le lawm.

Tom qaab ntawd, thaus cov numtswv taabtom sau cov pejxeem tej npe saib muaj coob npaum le caag, thaus ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Yudas, nwg yog tuabneeg Kalilais. Nwg tuaj ntxag cov pejxeem kuas suavdlawg tuaj nwg tog, tabsis muaj tuabneeg muab nwg tua tuag lawm hab, ces cov tuabneeg kws tuaj nwg tog txawm tsiv ua dlog ua dlig taag lawm.
Yog le ntawd, kuv has rua mej has tas, mej ca le tso cov timthawj nuav moog, tsi xob ua le caag rua puab. Tej num kws puab ua ntawd, yog tuabneeg kuas puab ua xwb, ces tej ntawd yeej yuav pluj moog,
tabsis yog Vaajtswv kuas puab ua, ces mej yuav kov tsi yeej puab le. Yog mej tawmtsaam puab, nyob tsaam yog mej tawmtsaam Vaajtswv!” Cov numtswv pum zoo lawv le Nkamaliyees has.
Puab hu cov timthawj lug, puab muab cov timthawj nplawm, hab txwv tsi pub puab tuav Yexus lub npe qha leejtwg le, ces puab txawm tso cov timthawj moog lawm.
Thaus cov timthawj tawm ntawm cov numtswv moog, puab zoo sab kawg le, rua qhov Vaajtswv pum zoo ca cov kws qha Yexus zaaj raug kev txaajmuag.
Puab naj nub moog qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Yexus kws yog tug Mexiyas huv lub Tuamtsev hab huv puab tej tsev rua suavdlawg noog.

Tom qaab ntawd pheej muaj tuabneeg lug ua Yexus cov thwjtim coob zuj zug ntxiv. Ces cov Yudais kws has lug Kilis hab cov Yudais kws has lug Henplais tsi sis hum. Cov Yudais kws has lug Kilis ywg has tas, txhua nub kws faib zaub mov hab faib nyaj txag, puab tsi faib rua cov puj ntsuag kws yog tuabneeg Yudais kws has lug Kilis.

Ces kaum ob tug timthawj txhaj hu cov ntseeg tuaj ua ke hab has rua puab tas, “Tsi tsimnyog peb cov kws yog timthawj tso qhov kws qha Vaajtswv txujlug tseg hab moog ua cov kws saib suavdlawg tej zaub mov.
Yog le ntawd, cov kwvtij, mej ca le xaiv xyaa leej lug rua peb, puab yuavtsum yog cov kws suavdlawg fwm, puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv hab muaj tswvyim, peb yuav tsaa puab ua teg num nuav.
Peb txhaj muaj sijhawm thov Vaajtswv hab moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug.”

Suavdlawg pum zoo ua lawv le cov timthawj has, ces puab txawm xaiv Xatefanaus tug kws muab sab rau ntseeg hab puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, hab puab xaiv Filis, Pakhaulus, Nikanaus, Timoos, Pamenas, hab Nikaulus kws nyob peg lub nroog Aati-aukias tuaj, nwg yog lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws coj cov Yudais txuj kevcai.
Cov ntseeg txawm coj xyaa leej ntawd lug rua cov timthawj, cov timthawj tuav puab, thov Vaajtswv rua puab hab tsaa puab ua teg num ntawd.
Vaajtswv txujlug txawm nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg txhua qhov chaw. Cov thwjtim kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees pheej muaj coob zuj zug ntxiv, hab muaj cov povthawj ntau leej lug ntseeg Yexus.
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Xatefanaus hab pub fwjchim rua nwg ua tej txujci tseemceeb kws xaav tsi thoob rua suavdlawg pum.

Tabsis muaj qee leej tswvcuab kws tuaj huv cov Tuabneeg Ywjpheej  lub tsev saablaaj tuaj (luas ibtxwm hu le ntawd), muaj ibtxha yog cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Kilenes hab huv lub nroog Alexaadias tuaj, puab cov ntawd hab cov Yudais kws tuaj peg lub tebchaws Kilikias hab huv lub xeev Axias tuaj, txawm nrug Xatefanaus sis caav.
Tabsis puab caav tsi yeej Xatefanaus, rua qhov Vaajtswv pub tswvyim rua Xatefanaus.
Puab txawm ndlav qee leej ua timkhawv dlaag has tas, “Peb nov tug txivneej nuav thuam Mauxes hab thuam Vaajtswv!”
Puab txhobtxwm ua le ntawd kuas cov pejxeem, cov txwjlaug hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai suavdlawg ntxhuv. Puab txawm sau nthwv lug nteg Xatefanaus hab coj nwg moog cuag cov numtswv.
Hab puab coj ob peb tug lug ua timkhawv dlaag has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav naj nub thuam peb lub Tuamtsev kws dlawbhuv hab thuam Mauxes txuj kevcai.
Peb nov nwg has tas tug Yexus kws yog tuabneeg Naxales yuav muab lub Tuamtsev nuav rhuav, hab nwg yuav hloov Mauxes txuj kevcai kws Mauxes muab rua peb!”
Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tsev saablaaj ntawd saib quas ntsoov Xatefanaus, puab pum nwg lub ntsejmuag ci ib yaam le ib tug timtswv ceebtsheej lub.
Tug Povthawj Hlub nug Xatefanaus has tas, “Koj tau has le puab has tag los?”

Xatefanaus teb has tas, “Mej cov ua kwv ua tij hab ua txiv, mej ca le noog kuv has! Thaus peb yawmkoob Anplahaas tseem nyob tim tebchaws Mexuputamias kws nwg tseem tsi tau tsiv moog nyob peg lub nroog Halaas, Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab tau tshwm lug rua nwg pum
hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj ca le tso koj tej kwvtij tseg hab tawm huv koj lub tebchaws nuav moog rua ib lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav qha rua koj.’
Anplahaas txawm tawm huv tebchaws Khade-as moog rua peg lub nroog Halaas. Thaus Anplahaas txiv tuag lawm, Vaajtswv has kuas Anplahaas tsiv lug nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwgnuav mej nyob nuav.

Thaus ntawd Vaajtswv tseem tsi tau pub ib thaaj aav luaj xibteg rua Anplahaas le, tabsis Vaajtswv coglug tseg has tas Vaajtswv yuav muab lub tebchaws ntawd rua nwg hab nwg cov xeebntxwv ua puab tug moog le. Thaus Vaajtswv coglug rua Anplahaas ntawd, Anplahaas tseem tsi tau muaj mivnyuas.
Vaajtswv has rua Anplahaas has tas, ‘Koj cov xeebntxwv yuav moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg nyob huv luas lub tebchaws, puab yuav moog ua luas qhev hab luas yuav tsimtxom puab plaub puas xyoo.
Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws tsimtxom koj cov xeebntxwv, tom qaab ntawd, puab yuav tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug pehawm kuv ntawm nuav.’

Vaajtswv muab txuj kevcai txav rua Anplahaas ua lub cim qha has tas, Vaajtswv coglug tseg rua Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg. Thaus yug Ixaj tau yim nub lawm, Anplahaas txawm muab Ixaj ua kevcai txav tawv. Ixaj muab Yakhauj ua kevcai txav, hab Yakhauj muab nwg kaum ob tug tub kws yog peb tsaav tuabneeg cov yawmkoob kws muaj koob meej nyob nto moo lug ua kevcai txav.
“Yakhauj cov tub ntawd muaj lub sab khib rua puab tug kwv Yauxej, puab txhaj muab Yauxej muag moog ua qhev rua nraag tebchaws Iziv. Tabsis Vaajtswv nrug nraim Yauxej

hab Vaajtswv paab Yauxej dlim Yauxej tej kev txomnyem. Thaus Yauxej moog cuag Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv, Vaajtswv pub tswvyim rua Yauxej ua tau hum Falaus sab, Falaus txhaj tsaa Yauxej ua tug saib Falaus lub tebchaws hab saib txhua yaam huv Falaus lub loog.
Tom qaab ntawd txawm muaj kev tshaib plaab thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv hab tebchaws Kana-aas, suavdlawg txomnyem kawg le. Peb cov yawmkoob nrhav tsi tau noj,
Yakhauj nov has tas, nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv muaj mov, ces nwg txawm khaiv peb cov yawmkoob moog nraag tebchaws Iziv, zag ntawd yog thawj zag kws puab moog nraag.
Thaus puab rov moog zag ob, Yauxej txhaj qha rua nwg cov tijlaug paub has tas, nwg yog puab tug kwv, hab qha nwg tsev tuabneeg rua Falaus paub.
Yauxej khaiv tuabneeg moog tog Yakhauj kws yog nwg txiv, hab kuas Yakhauj coj taagnrho nwg tsev tuabneeg kws muaj xyaa caum tsib leeg lug nyob huv tebchaws Iziv.
Yakhauj txawm moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv. Yakhauj hab nwg cov tub puavleej tuag taag rua nraag.
Puab cov tubki txawm kwv puab rov lug log rua ntawm lub toj ntxaas kws nyob ntawm Sekhees. Lub toj ntxaas ntawd yog lub kws thaus u Anplahaas muab nyaj yuav ntawm cov tuabneeg Hamaus lug.
“Thaus yuav txug lub sijhawm kws Vaajtswv ua lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua Anplahaas lawm, thaus ntawd peb tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv fuamvaam coob heev.
Thaus kawg muaj dlua ib tug vaajntxwv lug kaav tebchaws Iziv. Tug vaajntxwv ntawd tsi paub Yauxej.
Tug vaajntxwv ntawd ua phem rua peb tsaav tuabneeg, tsimtxom peb cov yawmkoob tsi pub puab tu puab tej mivnyuas, hab yuam kuas puab muab puab tej mivnyuas mog povtseg kuas tuag taag.
Thaus ntawd yog lub sijhawm yug Mauxes, Mauxes yog ib tug mivtub zoo nraug heev. Nwg nam nwg txiv tu nwg huv tsev tau peb lub hlis,
hab thaus obtug coj Mauxes moog tso rua nraag ntug dlej, Falaus tug ntxhais txawm coj moog tu hab saws ua nwg tub.
Mauxes kawm paub cov tuabneeg Iziv tej kev txawj kev ntse huv tuabsi. Mauxes yog ib tug txawj ntse heev, nwg ua yaam twg los ua tau.
“Thaus Mauxes noobnyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo, nwg moog ncig saib nwg cov kwvtij Yixalayees.
Nwg pum ib tug tuabneeg Iziv tsimtxom ib tug tuabneeg Yixalayees, nwg txawm moog muab tug tuabneeg Iziv tua povtseg, nwg ua le ntawd pauj qhov kws tug tuabneeg Iziv tsimtxom tug Yixalayees.
(Mauxes ua le ntawd nwg xaav has tas, nyaj nwg tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub has tas, Vaajtswv xaiv nwg lug paab puab kuas puab dlim, tabsis puab tsi paub.)
Nub tom qaab nwg pum ob tug tuabneeg Yixalayees taabtom sis ntaus, nwg txawm cheem obtug has tas, ‘Meb tub yog kwvtij; ua le caag meb tseem yuav sis ntaus ua dlaabtsi?’
Tabsis tug kws ua txhum txawm muab Mauxes thawb ntag rua ib caag, hab nwg has rua Mauxes has tas, ‘Leejtwg tsaa koj ua tug saib hab txav txim rua peb?
Koj yuav muab kuv tua ib yaam le naag mo koj tua tug tuabneeg Iziv hab los?’
Thaus Mauxes nov le ntawd, nwg txawm tsiv tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog nyob tim tebchaws Midias. Nwg nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, nwg tau ob tug tub.
“Tom qaab plaub caug xyoo lawm, muaj ib tug timtswv ceebtsheej lug tshwm rua nwg huv cov nplaim tawg ntawm ib tsob ntoo rua Mauxes pum tom taj suabpuam kws ze lub Roob Xinais.
Thaus Mauxes pum le ntawd, Mauxes xaav tsi thoob le, nwg yuav txaav moog saib ze ze, tabsis nwg nov tug Tswv lub suab has rua nwg has tas,
‘Kuv yog koj cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, kuv yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.’ Mauxes nov le ntawd, Mauxes ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo hab tsaa tsi taug qhovmuag saib le.
Tabsis tug Tswv has rua Mauxes has tas, ‘Koj ca le hle koj nkawm khau, rua qhov qhov chaw kws koj sawv ntawm ko yog qhov chaw dlawbhuv.

Kuv tub pum kuv tsaav tuabneeg raug kev tsimtxom nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab kuv tub nov puab lub suab quaj lawm, kuv txhaj lug paab kuas puab dlim tej kev tsimtxom ntawd. Koj ca le lug, kuv yuav khaiv koj moog nraag tebchaws Iziv.’

“Tug Mauxes nuav tub yog tug kws cov Yixalayees tsi leeg yuav, hab puab has rua nwg tas, ‘Leejtwg tsaa koj ua tug saib hab txav txim rua peb?’ Vaajtswv kuas tug timtswv ceebtsheej lug tshwm huv tsob ntoo kws muaj nplaim tawg rua Mauxes pum, ua tug paab Mauxes, tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv moog ua tug saib hab paab puab kuas dlim.

Thaus Mauxes coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv, nwg ua tej txujci tseemceeb kws xaav tsi thoob huv tebchaws Iziv, ntawm ntug dlej Havtxwv Lab hab plaub caug xyoo kws puab nyob tom taj suabpuam.
Mauxes yog tug kws has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Vaajtswv yuav khaiv ib tug huv mej cov ua tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug rua mej, ib yaam le nwg tau tsaa kuv  lawm.’

Mauxes yog tug kws nrug cov Yixalayees nyob tom taj suabpuam; Mauxes nrug peb cov yawmkoob ua ke, hab nrug tug timtswv ceebtsheej kws lug has rua Mauxes sau Roob Xinais nyob. Hab Mauxes yog tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug rua peb.
“Tabsis peb cov yawmkoob tsi noog nwg lug; puab muab nwg thawb ntag rua ib caag, hab puab xaav rov qaab moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Puab txhaj has rua Aloos has tas, ‘Koj ca le nchuav ib cov mlom coj peb kev moog. Peb tsi paub has tas sov muaj xwm dlaabtsi rua Mauxes tug kws coj peb kev tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug lawm.’
Ces thaus ntawd puab txawm nchuav tau ib tug mlom zoo le ib tug nyuj, puab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua tug mlom ntawd, hab puab ua rooj noj rooj haus hawm tug mlom kws puab txhais teg puab.

Vim le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj tso puab tseg hab ca puab pe tej nubqub kws nyob sau nruab ntug, lawv le cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg has tas: ‘Cov Yixalayees! Plaub caug xyoo kws mej nyob tom taj suabpuam, tej tsaj kws mej muab tua fij ntawd, tsi yog mej tua fij rua kuv.

Mej kwv tug vaajtswv Maulej lub tsevntaub, hab coj tug mlom nubqub Lefas kws yog mej tug vaajtswv; tej ntawd yog tej kws mej txhais teg puab rua mej pe. Vim mej ua le ntawd, kuv yuav ntab kuas mej tsiv dlhau lub nroog Npanpiloos moog.’

“Thaus peb cov yawmkoob tseem nyob tom taj suabpuam, puab muaj lub Tsevntaub kws nrug Vaajtswv sis coglug. Lub Tsevntaub ntawd puab ua lawv le Vaajtswv has lossis ua lawv le tug qauv kws Vaajtswv muab qha rua Mauxes.

Tom qaab ntawd, peb cov yawmkoob kwv lub Tsevntaub kws peb cov yawmsuab muab rua puab nrug Yausuas moog txeeb tau lwm tsaav tuabneeg lub tebchaws. Puab moog txeeb tau, tub yog Vaajtswv ntab cov tuabneeg ntawd tawm, ca peb cov yawmkoob lug nyob. Lub Tsevntaub nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug txug Daviv tam.
Daviv ua hum Vaajtswv sab, Daviv txhaj thov Vaajtswv kuas ca Daviv ua ib lub Tuamtsev rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv  nyob.
Tabsis thaus kawg Xalumoos yog tug kws ua lub Tuamtsev ntawd.
“Tabsis Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tsi nyob huv lub tsev kws tuabneeg txhais teg ua; lawv le tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tas,
‘Tug Tswv has tas, ntuj ceebtsheej yog kuv lub zwmtxwv; hab nplajteb yog kuv lub chaw tag taw. Mej yuav ua lub tsev luaj le caag rua kuv nyob? hab yuav ua kuv lub chaw su rua qhov twg?
Tsi yog kuv txhais teg tsim ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi los?’ ”
Xatefanaus has ntxiv tas, “Cov tuabneeg tawv ncauj, ua le caag mej tsi nov Vaajtswv txujlug le! Mej naj zag tawmtsaam Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv ib yaam le mej cov yawmkoob!

Tsi muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug kws mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau tsimtxom le. Puab tua cov cev Vaajtswv lug kws xub qha ua ntej lawm has tas, Vaajtswv tug Tubkhai kws ncaaj nceeg yuav lug. Nwg yog tug kws mej muab rua cov numtswv hab puab muab nwg tua povtseg ntaag.
Txawm yog Vaajtswv tug timtswv muab Vaajtswv txuj kevcai rua mej los mej tsi ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd!”
Thaus cov Yudais tej numtswv nov Xatefanaus has le ntawd, puab npautawg hab chim heev, puab zawm nav quas zog rua Xatefanaus.
Tabsis Xatefanaus puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj, nwg pum Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab hab pum Yexus sawv ntawm Vaajtswv saab xis.
Xatefanaus has rua puab has tas, “Mej saib! Kuv pum ntuj ceebtsheej qheb hab pum Tuabneeg Leej Tub sawv ntawm Vaajtswv saab xis!”
Thaus puab nov Xatefanaus has le ntawd, puab txawm qw nrov nrov hab muab teg pus qhovntsej hab dlha moog rua ntawm Xatefanaus,
puab muab Xatefanaus thawb ntag rua saab nrau ntug nroog hab muab pobzeb ntaus nwg. Cov timkhawv kws nkaug Xatefanaus txawm hle puab tej tsho tso rua ntawm ib tug hluas kws hu ua Xaulus kutaw.
Thaus puab taabtom muab pobzeb ntaus Xatefanaus. Xatefanaus thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Tswv Yexus, thov koj coj kuv tug ntsujplig moog nrug koj nyob!”
Xatefanaus txhus caug ndlua hab has nrov nrov has tas, “Tug Tswv! Thov koj zaam txim rua puab.” Thaus nwg has le ntawd taag, ces nwg txawm tu sav nrho lawm.

Xaulus pum zoo puab tua Xatefanaus hab. Txij nub ntawd lug cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees raug tsimtxom heev. Taagnrho cov ntseeg suavdlawg tsiv moog nyob txhua lub zog huv xeev Yudas hab xeev Xamalis, tsuas tshuav cov timthawj txhaj tsi tsiv xwb.
Cov txivneej kws fwm Vaajtswv muaj qee leej tuaj muab Xatefanaus lub cev kwv moog log, puab quaj hab hlub Xatefanaus kawg le.
Xaulus tsimtxom cov ntseeg heev; nwg moog huv cov ntseeg tej tsev ib lub rua ib lub, nwg nteg cov ntseeg, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej huv tuabsi coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.
Cov ntseeg kws tsiv moog nyob rua txhua qhov chaw, puab kuj moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua qhov ntawd.
Filis moog rua huv ib lub nroog  kws nyob rua huv xeev Xamalis, nwg qha has txug tug Mexiyas rua cov tuabneeg ntawd noog.
Thaus suavdlawg nov Filis qha hab pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws Filis ua, puab ua tuab zoo noog nwg qha.

Cov tuabneeg raug dlaab ntau leej tuaj cuag Filis kuas Filis ntab dlaab tawm, thaus dlaab yuav tawm, dlaab qw nrov nrov hab tawm moog lawm. Filis khu tej tuabneeg tuag teg tuag taw hab tej tuabneeg cegtawv txhua tug zoo huv tuabsi.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, suavdlawg zoo sab kawg le.

Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Ximoos, nwg nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tau ntev lug lawm. Nwg yog ib tug kws txawj ua khawvkoob, nwg pheej ua rua cov tuabneeg Xamalis xaav tsi thoob le. Nwg khaav has tas, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg tseemceeb,
taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, tsi has tug hlub tug yau puavleej fwm nwg. Puab has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav muaj Vaajtswv lub fwjchim kws hu ua ‘Lub Fwjchim Luj Kawg Nkaus.’ ”
Puab noog nwg lug, rua qhov nwg tub ua khawvkoob rua puab kuas puab muab sab npuab nwg ntev lug lawm.

Tabsis thaus suavdlawg nov Txujmoo Zoo kws Filis qha txug Vaajtswv Lub Tebchaws hab has txug Yexus Khetos, puab suavdlawg tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej txawm lug ntseeg Yexus hab ua kevcai raus dlej huv tuabsi.
Ximoos txawm lug ntseeg Yexus hab. Thaus nwg ua kevcai raus dlej taag lawm, nwg pheej nrug Filis ua ke. Thaus nwg pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws Filis ua, nwg xaav tsi thoob le.
Thaus cov timthawj kws nyob nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees nov has tas, cov tuabneeg Xamalis txais yuav Vaajtswv txujlug lawm, cov timthawj txawm khaiv Petus hab Yauhaas moog saib puab.
Thaus obtug moog txug, obtug thov Vaajtswv pub Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv rua cov ntseeg ntawd.
Rua qhov Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv tseem tsi tau lug nrug cov ntseeg ntawd nyob, tsuas yog Filis tuav Yexus lub npe muab puab ua kevcai raus dlej lawm xwb.
Petus hab Yauhaas obtug tsaa teg rua puab, ces puab txhua tug txawm tau txais Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv.
Thaus ob tug timthawj tsaa teg rua cov ntseeg ntawd, Ximoos pum has tas puab txhua tug puavleej tau Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, ces Ximoos txawm muab nyaj rua Petus hab Yauhaas obtug.
Ximoos has rua obtug has tas, “Thov meb faib lub fwjchim nuav rua kuv hab, thaus kuv tsaa teg rua leejtwg, tug ntawd txhaj yuav tau Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv.”
Tabsis Petus teb Ximoos has tas, “Koj hab koj cov nyaj yuav tuab txhij poob moog rua huv ntuj tawg, rua qhov koj xaav has tas koj muab nyaj yuav tau lub fwjchim kws Vaajtswv pub!
Koj yuav tsi muaj feem lug nrug peb koom ua teg num nuav, rua qhov Vaajtswv paub has tas koj lub sab tsi ncaaj.
Koj ca le tso plhuav tej kev phem kws koj xaav ko tseg, hab thov Vaajtswv zaam tej kev txhum kws koj lub sab xaav phem ntawd huv tuabsi moog.
Rua qhov kuv paub has tas koj yog ib tug tuabneeg kws sab hlub, hab koj tej kev phem tub khi koj lawm, koj yuav nti tsi dlim le.”
Ximoos txawm has rua Petus hab Yauhaas has tas, “Thov meb thov Vaajtswv paab kuv, kuas kuv tsi xob raug tej kws meb has ntawd ib qho le.”

Thaus Petus hab Yauhaas obtug qha tej kws obtug pum hab paub, hab qha tug Tswv Txujmoo Zoo rua suavdlawg noog taag lawm, obtug txawm rov qaab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees. Thaus obtug taug kev rov qaab moog, obtug qha Txujmoo Zoo rua ntau lub zog kws nyob huv xeev Xamalis.

Tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua Filis has tas, “Koj ca le sawv kev moog rua saab qaabteb,  koj taug txujkev kws tuaj tom lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj moog rua nraag lub nroog Nkaxas.” (Nwgnuav txujkev ntawd tsi muaj tuabneeg moog lawm.)

Yog le ntawd Filis txawm sawv kev moog; thaus Filis taabtom taug kev moog, nwg ntsib ib tug nraug saam kws yog tuabneeg Eti-upias, hab yog ib tug numtswv kws saib nam Vaajntxwv Kaadakes kws kaav tebchaws Eti-upias lub txhaab nyaj. Tug nom ntawd moog pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab caij tsheb neeg rov lug tsev.
Thaus nwg caij tsheb neeg rov lug tsev, nwg nyeem phoo ntawv kws Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg.
Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txawm has rua Filis has tas, “Koj ca le caum kuas cuag lub tsheb neeg ntawd.”
Filis dlha ceev nrooj moog, nwg nov tug nom ntawd taabtom nyeem Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug phoo ntawv. Filis nug has tas, “Zaaj kws koj nyeem ko, koj puas totaub?”
Tug nom ntawd teb has tas, “Tub tsi muaj leejtwg qha lub ntsab rua kuv, kuv yuav ua le caag totaub?” Tug nom ntawd txawm kuas Filis nce moog nrug nwg caij tsheb neeg.
Vaajtswv txujlug kws tug nom ntawd nyeem has le nuav: “Puab caab nwg moog ib yaam le caab tug yaaj moog tua, nwg zoo ib yaam le tug yaaj kws nyob tuabywv rua luas txav plaub. Nwg tsi has ib lus le.
Puab ua saib tsi taug nwg hab txav txim tsi ncaaj rua nwg. Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav paub txug nwg cov xeebntxwv, rua qhov nwg tub tsi muaj sa nyob huv nplajteb nuav lawm.”
Tug nom ntawd has rua Filis has tas, “Thov koj qha zaaj nuav rua kuv saib. Tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug has le nuav, yog nwg has txug leejtwg? Nwg has txug nwg lossis nwg has txug lwm tug?”
Filis txawm qha Txujmoo Zoo kws has txug Yexus zaaj rua tug nom noog. Nwg qha zaaj kws tug nom ntawd taabtom nyeem ntaag.

Thaus obtug taabtom caij tsheb neeg taug kev moog, obtug moog txug ntawm ib qhov chaw kws muaj dlej. Tug nom ntawd has rua Filis has tas, “Tub muaj dlej nyob ntawm nuav, koj muab kuv ua kevcai raus dlej puas tau?” [

Filis has rua tug nom ntawd has tas, “Yog koj ntseeg tag tag, kuv muab koj ua kevcai raus dlej ntawm nuav los tau.” Tug nom ntawd teb has tas, “Kuv ntseeg has tas, Yexus Khetos yog Vaajtswv tug Tub.”]
Tug nom ntawd txawm kuas nreg tsheb neeg, ces obtug txawm nqeg moog rua huv dlej, hab Filis muab tug nom ntawd ua kevcai raus dlej.
Thaus obtug tawm huv dlej lug, tug Tswv tug Ntsujplig txawm coj Filis moog rua lwm qhov, tug nom ntawd tsi pum Filis lawm, ces tug nom ntawd txawm caij tsheb neeg moog tsev, nwg zoo sab kawg le.
Muaj tuabneeg pum Filis nyob peg lub nroog Axautais; Filis moog qha Txujmoo Zoo thoob plawg tej nroog kws nyob cheebtsaam ntawd moog txug rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas.
Thaus ntawd Xaulus tseem ua nruj ua tsiv yuav tua cov kws ntseeg tug Tswv povtseg. Xaulus moog cuag tug Povthawj Hlub,

hab thov ntawv nteg tuabneeg coj moog rua cov Yudas tej thawj kws saib cov tsev saablaaj peg lub nroog Damaxes has tas, nwg muaj cai nteg cov kws coj tug Tswv txuj kevcai, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej coj moog kaw rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Thaus Xaulus taabtom moog yuav txug lub nroog Damaxes, txawm muaj dluab ci nplaag sau ntuj tuaj rua nwg.
Nwg txawm qaug ntawg rua huv aav, nwg nov ib lub suab has rua nwg has tas, “Xaulus, Xaulus! Ua le caag koj tsimtxom kuv?”
Xaulus nug has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yog leejtwg?” Lub suab ntawd teb has tas, “Kuv yog Yexus tug kws koj tsimtxom ntaag.
Koj ca le sawv moog rua huv lub nroog, yuav muaj tuabneeg qha rua koj paub has tas, koj yuavtsum ua dlaabtsi.”
Cov txivneej kws nrug Xaulus moog ntawd, puab txhua tug yoob taag huv tuabsi; puab nov lub suab ntawd, tabsis puab saib tsi pum leejtwg le.
Xaulus txawm sawv tseeg hab rua muag hlo, tabsis nwg ob lub qhovmuag tsi pum kev lawm. Puab txhaj tuav nwg teg moog rua huv lub nroog Damaxes.
Nwg tsi pum kev tau peb nub, peb nub ntawd nwg tsi noj lossis tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes muaj ib tug thwjtim hu ua Ananias. Ananias ua ywgtoog pum tug Tswv lug has rua nwg has tas, “Ananias!” Ananias teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”

Tug Tswv has rua Ananias has tas, “Koj ca le sawv tseeg moog rua tom txujkev kws suavdlawg hu has tas Txujkev Ncaaj, koj moog nrhav tug txivneej kws hu ua Xaulus kws yog tuabneeg Talaxus huv Yudas tsev. Nwgnuav Xaulus taabtom thov Vaajtswv,
hab Xaulus ua ywgtoog pum ib tug txivneej hu ua Ananias lug huv tsev, hab tsaa teg rua Xaulus, kuas nwg rov pum kev.”
Ananias teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, muaj ntau leej qha rua kuv has tas, tug txivneej ntawd ua phem heev rua cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Qhov kws nwg tuaj huv lub nroog Damaxes nuav, tub yog nwg tau ntawv ntawm tug thawj ntawm cov povthawj, tuaj nteg cov kws pehawm koj.”

Tabsis tug Tswv has rua Ananias has tas, “Koj ca le moog, rua qhov kuv tub xaiv nwg lug ua kuv teg num lawm. Nwg yuav moog qha kuv zaaj rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg, rua cov vaajntxwv hab rua cov Yixalayees.
Kuv yuav qha rua nwg paub has tas, thaus nwg moog ua kuv teg num, nwg yuav raug kev txomnyem vim nwg ntseeg kuv.”

Ananias txawm moog rua tom Yudas tsev hab tsaa teg rua Xaulus. Nwg has rua Xaulus has tas, “Nyuas kwv Xaulus, tug Tswv Yexus kws koj pum tom kev khaiv kuv tuaj paab koj kuas koj rov pum kev hab puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig Tug Dlawbhuv.”
Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib yaam zoo le khum ntseg poob nthaav ntawm Xaulus ob lub qhovmuag lug, ces nwg txawm rov pum kev le qub lawm. Nwg sawv tseeg lug hab Ananias muab nwg ua kevcai raus dlej;
thaus nwg noj mov taag, nwg rov muaj zug. Xaulus nrug cov ntseeg huv lub nroog Damaxes nyob tau ob peb nub,
nwg moog tom tej tsev saablaaj hab qha has tas Yexus yog Vaajtswv tug Tub.

Txhua tug kws nov nwg qha puab xaav tsi thoob le. Puab sis nug has has, “Tug txivneej nuav tsi yog tug kws tsimtxom cov ntseeg nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees los? Nwg tuaj ntawm nuav tub yog nwg tuaj nteg cov ntseeg coj rov qaab moog rua cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj ntaag los sav.”

Tabsis tej lug kws Xaulus qha nrov nchaa zuj zug. Hab tej kws nwg qha ua timkhawv rua suavdlawg paub tseeb has tas Yexus yog tug Mexiyas, ces cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes txawm tsi muaj lug has lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, cov Yudais txawm saablaaj has tas, puab yuav muab Xaulus tua povtseg.
Tabsis tub muaj tuabneeg qha rua Xaulus paub lawm. Cov Yudais naj nub naj mo zuv lub nroog ntawd tej roojvaag tog nteg Xaulus coj moog tua povtseg.
Tabsis muaj ib mos Xaulus cov thwjtim muab ib lub tawb rua Xaulus nyob huv, hab puab muab hlua khi lub tawb tso dlauv rua saab ntsaa yeej nrau.

Thaus Xaulus tsiv moog txug nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg txawm moog cuag cov thwjtim. Nwg xaav nrug puab koom ua ib paab, tabsis puab ntshai nwg, puab tsi ntseeg has tas nwg yog ib tug thwjtim tag.

Tabsis Npananpas coj Xaulus moog cuag cov timthawj. Npananpas qha tej kws Xaulus pum hab tau ua lawm rua puab noog. Npananpas qha has tas, thaus Xaulus taabtom taug kev moog peg lub nroog Damaxes, Xaulus tub pum tug Tswv Yexus, hab tug Tswv tub nrug Xaulus thaam lawm. Hab Npananpas qha rua puab has tas, thaus Xaulus nyob peg lub nroog Damaxes, Xaulus muaj sab tawv qha Yexus zaaj, nwg tsi ntshai leejtwg le.
Xaulus nrug cov timthawj nyob, nwg moog thoob plawg lub nroog Yeluxalees, nwg muaj sab tawv qha Yexus zaaj rua nuav rua u.
Xaulus pheej nrug cov Yudais kws has lug Kilis sis thaam hab sis caam, tabsis puab cov ntawd tuavhuv yuav muab Xaulus tua povtseg.
Thaus cov ntseeg nov le ntawd, puab txawm coj Xaulus moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas hab xaa nwg moog rua peg lub nroog Talaxus.

Thaus ntawd cov ntseeg kws nyob thoob plawg huv xeev Yudas, xeev Kalilais hab xeev Xamalis tsi muaj kev ntxhuv sab tau ib ntus. Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txhawb cov ntseeg tug zug, ua rua cov ntseeg muab sab rau ntseeg, muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob zuj zug ntxiv hab puab ua lub neej fwm Vaajtswv.
Petus moog txhua nrho txhua qhov chaw. Muaj ib zag nwg moog saib cov ntseeg kws nyob peg lub nroog Lidas.
Thaus nwg nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, nwg pum ib tug txivneej hu ua Ane-as. Ane-as tuag teg tuag taw, nwg sawv tsi taug moog qhov twg, nwg pw sau txaaj tau yim xyoo lug lawm.
Petus has rua Ane-as has tas, “Yexus tub khu koj zoo lawm. Koj ca le sawv tu koj lub chaw pw.” Taamsim ntawd Ane-as txawm sawv tseeg.
Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Lidas hab huv lub nroog Saloos pum Ane-as zoo lawm, puab txawm ntseeg tug Tswv Yexus.

Muaj ib tug quaspuj hu ua Tanpithas nyob huv lub nroog Yaupas, nwg yog ib tug ntseeg Yexus. (Nwg lub npe Kilis hu ua Daulakas, lub npe ntawd txhais has tas, “muaslwj.”) Nwg naj nub ua zoo hab paab cov tuabneeg txomnyem.
Thaus Petus tseem nyob nraag lub nroog Lidas, Daulakas mob heev, nwg txawm tuag lawm. Thaus puab muab nwg lub cev ntxuav taag, puab nqaa nwg moog tso rua ib chaav tsev txheej sau.

Lub nroog Yaupas nyob ze lub nroog Lidas. Thaus cov ntseeg nov has tas, Petus nyob nraag lub nroog Lidas, puab txawm khaiv ob tug txivneej moog has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le nrug wb moog taamsim nuav.”

Petus txawm sawv tseeg nrug obtug moog. Thaus nwg moog txug, obtug coj nwg moog rua chaav tsev txheej sau. Cov puj ntsuag lug sawv vij Petus. Puab quaj zum zawg hab puab kuas Petus saib tej tsho luj tsho miv kws thaus Daulakas tseem ua neej nyob, Daulakas xaws rua puab naav.

Petus kuas suavdlawg tawm moog saab nrau, thaus puab tawm taag lawm, Petus txawm txhus caug thov Vaajtswv; thaus nwg thov taag, nwg tig lug has rua tug tuag has tas, “Tanpithas, koj ca le sawv.” Tanpithas txawm rua hlo qhovmuag, thaus nwg pum Petus, nwg sawv tseeg nyob quastsawg.
Petus cev teg moog nqug nwg sawv. Petus txawm hu cov ntseeg hab cov puj ntsuag lug saib hab muab Daulakas cob rua puab
Zaaj nuav nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg huv lub nroog Yaupas, ces txawm muaj tuabneeg coob coob lug ntseeg tug Tswv Yexus.
Petus nyob huv lub nroog Yaupas tau ntau nub, nwg su huv Ximoos tug kws luam tawv tsaj lub tsev.
Muaj ib tug txivneej kws yog tuabneeg Loos nyob huv lub nroog Xixaleyas hu ua Kauneli-us, nwg yog ib tug thawj tubrog kws saib paab tubrog hu ua “Italis Paab.”
Nwg yog ib tug kws coj Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nruj hab nwg tsev tuabneeg puavleej fwm Vaajtswv. Nwg pheej paab cov tuabneeg Yudais kws txomnyem, hab nwg naj nub thov Vaajtswv.
Muaj ib nub thaus nub qaij nwg ua ywgtoog pum Vaajtswv ib tug timtswv lug huv nwg chaav tsev hab hu nwg has tas, “Kauneli-us.”

Kauneli-us saib dlheev tug timtswv ntawd, nwg ntshai kawg le, nwg txawm nug tug timtswv has tas, “Koj xaav yuav dlaabtsi?” Tug timtswv teb has tas, “Vaajtswv tub nov koj tej lug thov hab pum tej kws koj pub rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem lawm.
Koj ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog nraag lub nroog Yaupas, moog hu Ximoos kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Petus kuas tuaj ntawm nuav.
Petus nyob huv Ximoos tug kws luam tawv tsaj lub tsev, lub tsev ntawd nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv.”

Thaus Vaajtswv tug timtswv moog lawm, Kauneli-us txawm hu ob tug tubkhai hab ib tug tubrog lug cuag nwg. Tug tubrog ntawd yog ib tug kws coj Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nruj heev hab yog ib tug kws naj nub ua num rua Kauneli-us.
Kauneli-us pav tej kws nwg pum huv tuabsi rua puab peb tug ntawd noog, hab nwg khaiv puab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yaupas.
Nub tom qaab thaus peb tug ntawd taabtom moog yuav txug lub nroog Yaupas. Thaus yuav taav su, Petus nce moog thov Vaajtswv sau qaum tsev.
Petus tshaib plaab, nwg xaav noj mov; thaus luas tseem taabtom ua su noj, Petus txawm ua ywgtoog.
Petus pum rooj ntug qheb hab muaj ib yaam zoo le dlaim ntaub dlaav dlaav muaj hlua khi plaub ceg kaum tso dlauv sau ntuj lug rua huv nplajteb.
Petus pum txhua yaam tsaj, tsi has naab, naab qaa, qaav hab tej noog puavleej nyob huv dlaim ntaub ntawd.
Ces txawm muaj ib lub suab has rua Petus has tas, “Petus, koj ca le sawv hab muab tua noj!”
Tabsis Petus has tas, “Tsi tau, tug Tswv! Kuv yeej ibtxwm tsi noj tej kws kevcai txwv tsi pub noj.”
Lub suab ntawd txawm rov has dlua rua Petus has tas, “Tej kws Vaajtswv has tas huv lawm, koj tsi xob has tas tsi huv.”
Muaj le ntawd txug peb zag, ces dlaim ntaub ntawd txawm rov rua sau ntuj lawm.
Thaus Petus taabtom xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws nwg ua ywgtoog pum ntawd, peb tug txivneej kws Kauneli-us khaiv tuaj, puab tuaj nrhav tau Ximoos lub tsev, hab puab sawv saab nrau qhovrooj.
Puab hu has tas, “Ximoos Petus puas nyob huv mej tsev?”
Thaus Petus tseem xaav txug zaaj ywgtoog kws nwg pum ntawd, Vaaj Ntsujplig txawm has rua Petus has tas, “Koj saib, muaj peb  tug txivneej tuaj nrhav koj.
Koj ca le nqeg moog rua txheej huv hab nrug puab moog, tsi xob xaav le caag, rua qhov tub yog kuv khaiv puab tuaj.”
Petus nqeg rua txheej huv, hab nwg has rua peb tug txivneej ntawd has tas, “Tug kws mej tuaj nrhav yog kuv ntaag, mej tuaj nrhav kuv ua dlaabtsi?”

Puab teb has tas, “Tug thawj tubrog Kauneli-us khaiv peb tuaj. Nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab coj Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nruj, cov Yudais suavdlawg puavleej fwm nwg. Vaajtswv ib tug timtswv lug has rua nwg has tas, kuas nwg hu koj moog saib nwg, nwg txhaj yuav tau nov tej kws koj qha.”
Ces Petus txawm coj cov txivneej ntawd lug huv tsev hab puab pw ib mos ntawd. Nub tom qaab Petus txawm nrug puab moog; cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yaupas muaj qee leej nrug Petus moog hab.
Nub tom qaab Petus maam le moog txug huv lub nroog Xixaleyas. Kauneli-us tub hu tej kwvtij neejtsaa hab tej phoojywg tuaj nyob huv nwg tsev tog Petus lawm.
Thaus Petus moog yuav txug ntawm Kauneli-us tsev, Kauneli-us txawm tawm tuaj tog Petus, hab txhus caug ndlua ntawm Petus kutaw hawm Petus.
Tabsis Petus tuav nkaus Kauneli-us tsaa nwg sawv hab has tas, “Koj ca le sawv! Kuv yog tuabneeg ib yaam le koj hab xwb.”
Petus hab Kauneli-us sis thaam sis thaam moog rua huv tsev, Petus pum muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj nyob tog nwg lawm.

Petus has rua cov tuabneeg ntawd has tas, “Mej tub paub lawm has tas cov Yudais txuj kevcai yeej ibtxwm tsi pub cov Yudais moog saib lossis nrug lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg, tabsis Vaajtswv qha rua kuv has tas, kuv tsi xob hu leejtwg has tas yog tuabneeg tsi huv.
Yog le ntawd, thaus koj khaiv tuabneeg tuaj hu kuv, kuv tsi yig le, kuv txhaj ca le tuaj. Kuv xaav paub saib koj hu kuv tuaj ua dlaabtsi?”

Kauneli-us teb has tas, “Tau plaub nub dlhau lug kws yog tuab lub sijhawm thaus peb teev nub qaij nuav, kuv taabtom thov Vaajtswv  huv kuv tsev. Taamsim ntawd, kuv txawm pum ib tug txivneej naav rig tsho ci ntsaa ab lug sawv ntawm kuv hauv ntej.
Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Kauneli-us, Vaajtswv tub nov koj tej lug thov hab pum tej kws koj muab pub rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem lawm.
Koj ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Ximoos Petus nraag lub nroog Yaupas tuaj. Nwg su huv Ximoos tug kws luam tawv tsaj lub tsev; lub tsev ntawd nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv.’

Ces taamsim ntawd kuv txawm khaiv tuabneeg tuaj hu koj, hab koj txaus sab hlo tuaj. Nwgnuav Vaajtswv nrug peb nyob ntawm nuav, peb taabtom tog noog tej kws tug Tswv tau qha kuas koj has rua peb noog.”
Petus pib qha rua puab has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb has tas, Vaajtswv tsi xaiv leejtwg ntsejmuag.
Txawm yog tsaav tuabneeg twg los xij, Vaajtswv leeg yuav txhua tug kws fwm Vaajtswv hab ua hum Vaajtswv sab.

Mej tub paub txujlug kws Vaajtswv qha rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees lawm. Txujlug ntawd yog Txujmoo Zoo kws has tas, tug kws ntseeg Yexus Khetos kws yog suavdlawg tug Tswv, tug ntawd yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Mej tub paub zaaj kws pib muaj huv xeev Kalilais, hab nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg tebchaws Yixalayees, tom qaab kws Yauhaas qha has tas tuabneeg yuavtsum ua kevcai raus dlej.

Hab mej paub txug zaaj kws Vaajtswv tub pub Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv hab fwjchim rua Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales lawm. Yexus moog thoob plawg txhua qhov chaw, nwg ua num zoo, hab cov tuabneeg kws raug dlaab, nwg ntab dlaab tawm huv tuabsi. Yexus ua tau le ntawd, rua qhov Vaajtswv nrug nwg.

Peb tub pum txhua yaam kws Yexus ua huv cov Yixalayees tej zog, hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, peb ua tau timkhawv has tas, yeej muaj tseeb tag. Txawm yog nwg ua le ntawd los luas tseem muab nwg coj moog ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig hab muab nwg tua povtseg.
Tabsis peb nub tom qaab, Vaajtswv tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug hab nwg tau lug tshwm rua ib cov tuabneeg pum.

Tsi yog suavdlawg pum, tabsis tsuas yog peb cov kws Vaajtswv tub xub xaiv ca ua timkhawv pum xwb. Thaus Vaajtswv tsaa nwg sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, peb cov kws ua timkhawv, peb tau nrug nwg noj nwg haus ua ke.
Hab nwg kuas peb moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua suavdlawg, hab ua timkhawv qha has tas, nwg yog tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa ua tug txav txim rua cov tuabneeg caj hab cov tuabneeg tuag.
Cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug puavleej has tas, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim rua txhua tug kws ntseeg Yexus tug kws muaj fwjchim.”
Thaus Petus tseem taabtom qha, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txawm lug rua txhua tug kws noog tej lug kws Petus qha.
Thaus cov Yudas kws ntseeg Yexus kws nrug Petus tuaj nraag lub nroog Yaupas tuaj pum has tas, Vaajtswv pub Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lawm hab, puab xaav tsi thoob le,
rua qhov puab nov cov tuabneeg ntawd has tau lug txawv txawv, hab qhuas Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj. Petus has tas,
“Cov tuabneeg nuav tub tau txais Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv ib yaam le peb tau txais lawm. Leejtwg tseem yuav txwv tsi pub muab cov tuabneeg nuav ua kevcai raus dlej hab?”
Yog le ntawd, Petus txhaj kuas puab tuav Yexus Khetos lub npe ua kevcai raus dlej. Ces puab thov kuas Petus nrug puab nyob ob peb nub.
Cov timthawj hab cov ntseeg kws nyob txhua qhov huv xeev Yudas nov has tas lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg Vaajtswv txujlug lawm hab.

Thaus Petus rov qaab moog txug nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov Yudais kws has tas yuavtsum muab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg xub ua kevcai txav tsaiv, maam le pub puab lug koom cov Yudais txawm thuam Petus has tas,
“Ua le caag koj moog saib lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws tsi ua kevcai txav, hab tseem nrug puab noj mov ua ke hab?”
Petus pib pav txhua yaam kws nwg pum thaus hauvpaug lug rua puab noog has tas,

“Thaus kuv nyob huv lub nroog Yaupas, kuv taabtom thov Vaajtswv, ces kuv txawm ua ywgtoog pum ib yaam zoo le dlaim ntaub dlaav dlaav muaj hlua khi plaub ceg kaum tso dlauv sau ntuj lug rua ntawm kuv xubndlag.
Kuv ua tuab zoo saib, kuv pum muaj txhua yaam tsaj, tsi has naab, naab qaa, qaav hab tej noog nyob huv dlaim ntaub ntawd.
Ces kuv txawm nov ib lub suab has rua kuv has tas, ‘Petus, koj ca le sawv hab muab tua noj.’
Tabsis kuv has tas, ‘Tsi tau, tug Tswv! Kuv yeej ibtxwm tsi noj tej kws kevcai txwv tsi pub noj lossis tej tsaj kws tsi huv.’
Lub suab ntawd rov has rua kuv tas, ‘Tej kws Vaajtswv has tas huv lawm, koj tsi xob has tas tsi huv.’
Muaj le ntawd txug peb zag, ces dlaim ntaub txawm rov rua sau ntuj lawm.
Taamsim ntawd peb tug txivneej kws tuaj peg lub nroog Xixaleyas tuaj, puab txawm tuaj txug huv lub tsev kws kuv su.

Vaaj Ntsujplig has kuas kuv ca le nrug puab moog tsi xob xaav le caag. Ces rau leej kwvtij ntawm nuav kws yog cov ntseeg huv lub nroog Yaupas, puab nrug kuv moog peg lub nroog Xixaleyas hab, peb moog rua huv Kauneli-us tsev.

Kaneli-us has rua peb has tas, nwg pum ib tug timtswv ceebtsheej lug huv nwg tsev hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog nraag lub nroog Yaupas, moog hu ib tug txivneej hu ua Ximoos Petus tuaj.
Nwg yuav qha tej lug kws cawm koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg kuas mej dlim mej lub txim.’
Thaus kuv pib qha, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv txawm lug rua puab ib yaam le lug rua peb thaus chivthawj.
Thaus ntawd kuv txawm ncu dlheev txug tej lug kws tug Tswv qha has tas, ‘Yauhaas muab mej ua kevcai raus rua huv dlej, tabsis mej yuav tau ua kevcai raus lug ntawm Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv.’

Vaajtswv tub pub Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg ib yaam le nwg pub rua peb cov kws ntseeg tug Tswv lawm hab. Vaajtswv tub pub rua puab lawm, kuv yuav txwv Vaajtswv los yeej tsi tau le.”

Thaus puab nov le ntawd, puab tsi thuam Petus lawm, puab ua Vaajtswv tsaug has tas, “Nwgnuav Vaajtswv qheb kev rua lwm Taav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg, kuas puab txhaj tso puab tej kev txhum tseg hab tau txujsa.”

Thaus luas muab Xatefanaus tua lawm, cov ntseeg raug kev tsimtxom heev, ces cov ntseeg ibtxha txawm tsiv moog nyob rua txhua qhov lawm, muaj ibtxha tsiv moog nyob rua peg xeev Faunikias, muaj ibtxha tsiv rua tim koog Povtxwv Xaipas hab lub nroog Aati-aukias, hab puab qha Txujmoo zoo rua cov Yudais nkaus xwb.

Tabsis cov ntseeg kws tsiv moog ntawd, muaj cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koog Povtxwv Xaipas hab koog Povtxwv Kulenes, qee leej moog txug rua huv lub nroog Aati-aukias, ces puab qha txujmoo zoo kws has txug tug Tswv Yexus rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg hab.
Tug Tswv lub fwjchim nrug puab, txhaj muaj tuabneeg coob coob ntseeg hab lug cuag tug Tswv.
Thaus cov ntseeg kws nyob nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees nov le nuav, puab txawm khaiv Npananpas moog rua peg Aati-aukias.
Thaus Npananpas moog txug peg, nwg pum has tas Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua puab, nwg zoo sab kawg le hab nwg txhawb puab tug zug, kuas puab muab sab npuab tug Tswv hab ntseeg tag tag.
Npananpas yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, nwg puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, hab muab sab rau ntseeg. Nwg coj tau cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd coob leej lug ntseeg tug Tswv.
Tom qaab ntawd Npananpas txawm moog nrhav Xaulus huv lub nroog Talaxus.

Thaus nwg nrhav tau Xaulus lawm, nwg coj Xaulus lug nrug nwg nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias. Obtug nrug cov ntseeg nyob tau ib xyoos, hab obtug naj nub qha cov ntseeg kws coob coob ntawd. Pawg ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias yog thawj pawg kws tis lub npe hu ua Cov Ntseeg Yexus.
Lub sijhawm ntawd muaj ib cov cev Vaajtswv lug tuaj nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj txug peg lub nroog Aati-aukias.

Vaaj Ntsujplig kuas cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd tug kws hu ua Ankanpus sawv ntsug qha txug tej kws yuav tshwm lug yaav tom ntej. Nwg has tas yuav muaj kev tshaib kev nqhes thoob plawg lub nplajteb. (Ces lub sijhawm kws Kelaudi-us ua vaajntxwv txawm muaj kev tshaib plaab tag).
Cov ntseeg suavdlawg pum zoo kuas ib leeg muab mivntsiv nyaj lawv le puab muaj xaa moog rua cov kwvtij ntseeg Yexus kws nyob nraag lub xeev Yudas.
Puab txawm ua le ntawd, puab muab cov nyaj ntawd rua Xaulus hab Npananpas coj moog rua cov txwjlaug kws saib cov ntseeg nraag.
Lub sijhawm ntawd Vaajntxwv Helauj  muab cov ntseeg Yexus qee leej coj moog tsimtxom.
Helauj kuas luas muab ntaaj tua Yauhaas tug tijlaug Yakaunpaus povtseg.
Thaus nwg pum has tas tej kws nwg ua ntawd hum cov Yudais sab, nwg txawm has kuas luas nteg Petus coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj. (Thaus ntawd suavdlawg taabtom ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb.)

Thaus puab nteg tau Petus lawm, puab coj Petus moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj hab kuas plaub paab tubrog zuv Petus, ib paab twg plaub leeg. Helauj xaav has tas, tom qaab kws ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau taag, nwg yuav coj Petus lug txav txim hab muab Petus tua taabmeeg cov pejxeem.
Thaus Petus tseem raug kaw huv tsev lojcuj, cov ntseeg kub sab lug thov Vaajtswv paab Petus.

Ua ntej nub kws Helauj coj Petus lug rua cov pejxeem, mo ntawd Petus pw tsaug zug huv ob tug tubrog kis nruab nraab. Luas muab ob txuj saw hlau khi Petus, hab muaj tubrog zuv lub tsev lojcuj huv tuabsi.

Taamsim ntawd tug Tswv ib tug timtswv txawm lug sawv ntawm Petus ib saab, hab muaj dluab ci lug rua huv chaav tsev kws Petus pw. Tug timtswv ntawd tuav nkaus Petus xubpwg dlaj kuas Petus tsim hab has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le sawv!” Ces taamsim ntawd ob txuj saw hlau kws khi Petus ob txhais teg txawm nplaam plawg lawm.

Tug timtswv has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le sa hlaab khov kho hab rau khau.” Petus txawm ua le ntawd. Tug timtswv rov has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le muab koj lub tsho ntev naav hab nrug kuv moog.”
Petus txawm lawv tug timtswv qaab tawm moog rua saab nrau. Petus tsi paub sov yog nwg ua npau suav lossis yog tag; nwg xaav has tas ntshai yog nwg ua npau suav xwb.

Tug timtswv hab Petus moog dlhau thawj paab tubrog hab moog dlhau paab ob, obtug maam le moog txug ntawm lub roojvaag hlau kws yuav moog rua huv lub nroog. Thaus obtug lug txug ntawm lub roojvaag hlau, lub roojvaag txawm qheb hlo rua obtug, obtug txawm tawm moog. Obtug taug kev moog mivntsiv, ces tug timtswv txawm ncaim Petus lawm.

Thaus ntawd Petus txhaj feeb meej hab nwg has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb has tas, Vaajtswv khaiv nwg ib tug timtswv sau ntuj lug paab kuv dlim ntawm Helauj txhais teg hab dlim ntawm tej kev phem kws cov Yudais yuav ua rua kuv lawm.”
Thaus Petus paub has tas Petus dlim lawm, Petus txawm moog rua tom Malis kws yog Yauhaas Malakaus nam lub tsev. Muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj ua ke thov Vaajtswv huv.
Petus moog khob qhovrooj hab hu, ces ib tug nkauj qhe hu ua Laudas txawm lug xauj saib yog leejtwg.
Thaus nwg ncu tau has tas yog Petus lub suab, nwg zoo sab kawg le, nwg tsi ncu qheb qhovrooj, nwg txawm dlha ceev nrooj moog qha rua suavdlawg has tas, Petus sawv saab nrau qhovrooj.
Puab has rua Laudas has tas, “Ntshai koj vwm lawm.” Tabsis Laudas has tas, “Yeej yog Petus tag tag le.” Puab txawm has tas, “Ntshai yog tug timtswv kws ibtxwm nrug Petus xwb.”
Petus tseem nyob saab nrau khob khob qhovrooj. Thaus puab qheb hlo qhovrooj, puab pum dlheev Petus, puab xaav tsi thoob le.

Petus kuas suavdlawg ua tuabywv, ces Petus txawm qha qhov kws tug Tswv coj nwg tawm huv tsev lojcuj lug rua puab noog. Hab nwg has rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le moog qha tej nuav rua Yakaunpaus hab cov ntseeg paub”. Thaus Petus has le ntawd taag ces nwg txawm moog rua lwm qhov lawm.
Thaus kaaj ntug, cov tubrog kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj tsi pum Petus lawm, puab poob sab kawg le.

Helauj khaiv tuabneeg moog nrhav Petus, tabsis puab nrhav tsi tau Petus. Helauj txawm hu cov tubrog kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj lug nug hab kuas luas muab cov tubrog kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj tua povtseg. Tom qaab ntawd Helauj tawm huv lub xeev Yudas moog nyob tau ib ntus peg lub nroog Xixaleyas.

Helauj chim rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Tiles hab Xidoos, cov tuabneeg ntawd ua ke tuaj cuag Helauj. Puab xub moog cuag tug nom kws hu ua Npalatus kws saib Helauj lub tsev kuas nwg paab, puab maam le moog cuag Helauj hab thov nrug nwg sis raug zoo. Puab ua le ntawd, rua qhov puab cov tuabneeg pheej moog yuav mov huv Helauj lub tebchaws lug noj.
Thaus txug nub kws Helauj teem rua puab tuaj cuag nwg, Helauj naav nwg cev rig tsho vaajntxwv hab nyob sau nwg lub zwmtxwv has lug rua cov pejxeem.
Cov pejxeem has nrov nrov has tas, “Lub suab nuav yog vaajtswv lub suab tsi yog tuabneeg lub.”
Taamsim ntawd tug Tswv ib tug timtswv lug rau txim rua Helauj, rua qhov Helauj tsi fwm Vaajtswv. Txawm muaj kaas noj Helauj lub cev, Helauj txhaj tuag lawm.
Vaajtswv Txujlug txhaj luj hlub hab nthuav dlaav zuj zug moog rua txhua qhov.
Thaus Npananpas hab Xaulus ua num taag, obtug txawm rov huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog,  hab obtug coj Yauhaas Malakaus nrug obtug moog.

Pawg ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias muaj qee leej yog cov cev Vaajtswv lug, qee leej yog xwbfwb: Cov ntawd ib tug yog Npananpas, ib tug yog Xime-oos (kws hu ua Dlub), ib tug yog Luki-us (kws yog tuabneeg Kulenes), ib tug yog Mana-ees (kws nrug tug tswvxeev Helauj luj hlub ua ke); hab ib tug yog Xaulus.
Thaus puab taabtom ua kevcai yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv has rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le tsaa Npananpas hab Xaulus ua teg num kws kuv kuas obtug ua.”
Thaus puab ua kevcai yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv taag, puab tsaa teg rua obtug hab khaiv obtug moog ua num.
Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv khaiv Npananpas hab Xaulus obtug moog. Obtug moog rua tom lub nroog Xelukias, hab caij nkoj moog rua tim koog Povtxwv Xaipas.
Thaus obtug moog txug huv lub nroog Xalamis, obtug txawm moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua huv cov Yudais tej tsev saablaaj. Obtug coj Yauhaas Malakaus moog paab obtug ua num.

Thaus puab moog txug ntawm lub koog Povtxwv Pafaus, puab ntsib ib tug txivneej hu ua Npalas-Yexus, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg Yudais, nwg txawj ua khawvkoob hab nwg has tas nwg yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug.

Npalas-Yexus yog tug nom kws kaav lub koog Povtxwv Xaipas tug phoojywg. Tug nom ntawd ntse heev, nwg hu ua Xelanki-us Paulus. Nwg txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Npananpas hab Xaulus lug cuag nwg, rua qhov nwg xaav noog Vaajtswv txujlug.
Tabsis tug kws txawj ua khawvkoob, (nwg lub npe Kilis hu ua Elimas), nwg tawmtsaam Npananpas hab Xaulus, hab tsi pub tug nom ntawd ntseeg Vaajtswv txujlug.
Xaulus tug kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Paulus puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv, nwg saib ntsoov Elimas,

hab has tas, “Koj yog Dlaab Ntxwgnyoog tug tub! Koj tawmtsaam txhua yaam kws zoo, koj nyam dlaag ntxag hab ua phem xwb. Koj tseem yuav muab Vaajtswv txujlug kws yog qhov tseeb hloov ua lug dlaag hab los!

Nwgnuav tug Tswv yuav rau txim rua koj; koj yuav tsi pum kev ib ntus, txawm yog dluab tshaav ntuj los koj yeej yuav saib tsi pum.” Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib yaam zoo le fuab lug plooj nkaus Elimas ob lub qhovmuag, ces nwg txawm tsi pum kev lawm, nwg xuas moog rua nuav rua u nrhav tuabneeg tuav nwg teg coj nwg moog.
Thaus tug nom pum le ntawd, nwg txawm ntseeg; nwg xaav tsi thoob rua Vaajtswv txujlug kws nwg nov ntawd.

Paulus hab nwg ob tug phoojywg caij nkoj ntawm lub nroog Pafaus moog txug tim lub nroog Penkas huv tebchaws Paafilias, ces Yauhaas Malakaus txawm ncaim Paulus hab Npananpas obtug rov qaab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Paulus hab Npananpas sawv kev huv Penkas moog txug peg lub nroog Aati-aukias kws nyob huv tebchaws Pixidias. Nub Xanpataus obtug moog noog lug qhuab qha huv lub tsev saablaaj.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg nyeem Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau ca taag lawm, cov tuabneeg kws saib lub tsev saablaaj kuas ib tug moog has rua obtug has tas, “Ob tug kwvtij, yog meb muaj lug has txhawb suavdlawg zug, thov meb ca le has.”
Paulus txawm sawv tseeg hab kuas suavdlawg nyob tuabywv, nwg pib qha has tas: “Cov kwvtij Yixalayees hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws fwm Vaajtswv, mej ca le noog kuv qha!

Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv xaiv peb cov yawmkoob lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Thaus puab tsiv moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab, puab fuamvaam coob heev. Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tau coj puab tsiv tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Vaajtswv ua sab ntev  rua puab tau plaub caug xyoo tom taj suabpuam.
Thaus puab lug txug huv tebchaws Kana-aas, Vaajtswv ua rua xyaa tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi, hab Vaajtswv muab lub tebchaws ntawd rua cov Yixalayees nyob.
Puab nyob huv luv tebchaws ntawd tau kwvlaam le plaub puas tsib caug xyoo. “Tom qaab ntawd,  Vaajtswv tsaa cov thawjtswj kaav cov Yixalayees lug txug thaus kws Xamuyees ua tug cev Vaajtswv lug.
Thaus puab thov kuas Vaajtswv tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav puab, Vaajtswv txawm tsaa Kises kws yog xeem Npeenyamees tug tub Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv kaav puab tau plaub caug xyoo.

Tom qaab ntawd Vaajtswv tsi pub Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv lawm, ces Vaajtswv txawm tsaa Daviv ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees, rua qhov Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv pum Yexais tug tub Daviv yog tug kws ua hum kuv sab, hab nwg yeej yuav ua lawv le txhua yaam kws kuv kuas nwg ua’.
Vaajtswv tau tsaa Daviv ib tug xeebntxwv lug ua cov Yixalayees tug Cawmseej lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm. Tug Cawmseej ntawd yog Yexus ntaag.
Thaus Yexus tseem tsi tau ua nwg teg num, Yauhaas qha kuas cov Yixalayees tso puab tej kev txhum tseg hab ua kevcai raus dlej.

Thaus Yauhaas ua nwg teg num yuav tav, nwg has rua suavdlawg has tas, ‘Mej xaav has tas kuv yog leejtwg? Kuv tsi yog tug kws mej taabtom tog, tug kws yuav lawv kuv qaab lug, nwg muaj fwjchim luj dlua kuv, kuv tub tsi tsimnyog hle nwg txhais khau ntawm nwg kutaw.’
“Cov kwvtij kws yog Anplahaas cov xeebntxwv hab mej txhua tug kws yog lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws tuaj pehawm Vaajtswv ntawm nuav, txujlug kws yog txujkev cawm dlim tub lug txug peb lawm!

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees hab puab cov numtswv, puab tsi paub has tas, Yexus yog tug Cawmseej, hab puab tsi totaub tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg kws muaj tuabneeg naj nub nyeem rua puab noog txhua nub Xanpataus. Tabsis qhov kws puab txav txim muab Yexus tua ntawd, tub yog muaj kuas tav lawv le tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau sau tseg lawm.
Txawm yog puab nrhav tsi tau txim rua Yexus los puab tseem kuas Philaj muab nwg tua povtseg.
Txhua yaam kev phem kws puab ua rua Yexus yog muaj lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws has txug nwg lawm, puab muab Yexus lub cev txu sau tug ntoo khaublig lug hab kwv moog log rua huv ib lub qhov ntxaa.
Tabsis Vaajtswv tub tsaa Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug,

hab Yexus lug tshwm rua cov tuabneeg kws nrug Yexus tuaj peg lub xeev Kalilais tuaj rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees pum ntau zag. Puab txhaj ua tau timkhawv rua cov Yixalayees has tas, puab tub pum Yexus lawm.
Qhov kws wb tuaj ntawm nuav, yog wb xaav kuas mej nov Txujmoo Zoo kws Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm has tas,
