nwg yuav paab peb cov kws yog puab cov xeebntxwv. Qhov kws Vaajtswv tsaa Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, yog Vaajtswv ua lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj ntu ob has tas: ‘Koj yog kuv tug Tub; nub nua kuv yog koj Txiv lawm.’

Hab qhov nuav ntaag yog qhov kws Vaajtswv has txug qhov kws nwg yuav tsaa Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, Yexus lub cev yuav tsi lwj rua huv lub qhov ntxaa. Thaus Vaajtswv has txug zaaj nuav, Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav foom koob moov nplua mag rua mej lawv le kuv tub coglug tseg rua Daviv lawm;’
Hab nwg tseem has dlua lwm zaaj has tas, ‘Koj yuav tsi ca koj tug tubkhai kws muab sab npuab koj lub cev lwj rua huv lub qhov ntxaa.’
Thaus Daviv ua tej num kws Vaajtswv muab rua nwg ua tav lawm, tom qaab ntawd nwg txawm tuag. Puab coj nwg lub cev moog log nrug nwg cov yawmkoob, hab nwg lub cev lwj rua huv qhov ntxaa lawm.
Tabsis tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, tug ntawd lub cev tsi lwj le.
Cov kwvtij, mej yuavtsum paub tseeb has tas qhov kws wb taabtom qha rua mej, yog wb qha has tas, Yexus yog tug kws zaam tau mej lub txim.
Hab mej yuavtsum paub has tas, txhua tug kws ntseeg Yexus, Yexus yuav dlaws tej kev txhum kws khi puab huv tuabsi moog. Tej kev txhum ntawd, Mauxes txuj kevcai yeej dlaws tsi tau.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj nyob tsaam mej raug tej kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg has tas,

‘Mej saib, mej cov kws thuam Vaajtswv tej lug, mej yuav xaav tsi thoob hab mej yuav puamtsuaj moog, rua qhov lub sijhawm nuav, kuv taabtom ua kuv teg num. Txawm yog muaj tuabneeg qha teg num ntawd rua mej los mej yuav tsi ntseeg!’ ”
Thaus Paulus hab Npananpas taabtom tawm huv tsev saablaaj moog, suavdlawg txawm thov has tas, “Nub Xanpataus tom ntej nuav, thov meb rov tuaj qha peb dlua hab.”

Thaus suavdlawg rov moog tsev taag lawm, txawm muaj cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws coj cov Yudais txuj kevcai ntau leej nrug Paulus hab Npananpas obtug moog. Obtug nrug puab thaam hab txhawb puab zug kuas puab muab sab rau ntseeg hab ncu ntsoov Vaajtswv tshaav ntuj.
Thaus txug nub Xanpataus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tuaj yuav laug taag tuaj noog Vaajtswv txujlug.
Thaus cov Yudais pum muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj noog obtug qha, puab khib, puab thuam tej lug kws Paulus qha hab tshev Paulus.

Tabsis Paulus hab Npananpas obtug yimfuab muaj sab tawv qha. Obtug has tas, “Wb yuavtsum xub qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua mej ua ntej, tabsis mej tsi txais yuav. Hab mej suav has tas, mej tsi tsimnyog tau txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis. Yog le ntawd wb yuav tso mej tseg hab moog qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg.
Rua qhov Vaajtswv has rua wb has tas: ‘Kuv tsaa koj ua qhov kws pum kev ci rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg. Koj yuav qha txujkev cawm dlim moog thoob plawg huv qaab ntuj nuav.’ ”
Thaus lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg nov le ntawd, puab zoo sab hab qhuas tug Tswv txujlug heev; hab cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv xaiv lug yuav txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis txawm lug ntseeg.
Tug Tswv txujlug txawm nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg cheebtsaam ntawd.

Tabsis cov Yudais ua rua cov txivneej kws yog cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog hab cov quaspuj kws yog lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws coj Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nruj tau kev ntxhuv sab. Cov Yudais ntawd tsimtxom Npananpas hab Paulus, hab ntab kuas obtug tawm huv cheebtsaam ntawd moog.
Obtug txawm nchus tej moov aav kws lu obtug kutaw povtseg, kuas puab paub has tas, obtug tsi quavntsej puab, hab obtug txawm moog qha huv lub nroog Ikaune-us lawm.
Cov ntseeg huv lub nroog Aati-aukias zoo sab kawg le, hab puab puv npo Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv.

Thaus Paulus hab Npananpas nyob huv lub nroog Ikaune-us, pheej muaj tuabneeg tsimtxom obtug hab. Obtug moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug huv cov Yudais tej tsev saablaaj, muaj cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob heev.
Tabsis cov Yudais kws tsi ntseeg ntxag kuas lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg nrug puab ntxub cov kws ntseeg Yexus.

Yog le ntawd, ob tug timthawj txawm nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tau ntev loo. Obtug muaj sab tawv qha txug tug Tswv kws pub fwjchim rua obtug ua tej txujci tseemceeb, kuas suavdlawg paub has tas Vaajtswv txuj koob moov kws obtug qha yog txuj tseeb.
Ces cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd txawm tawg ua ob paab: ib paab tuaj cov Yudais tog, hab ib paab tuaj ob tug timthawj tog.
Lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg hab cov Yudais qee leej nrug puab cov thawjcoj txawm tuavhuv ua phem hab yuav muab pobzeb ntaus ob tug timthawj.
Thaus ob tug timthawj nov le ntawd, obtug txawm tsiv moog rua nraag lub nroog Lixathas hab lub nroog Denpis kws nyob huv tebchaws Likaunias hab huv tej cheebtsaam kws nyob ibncig ntawd.
Hab obtug qha txujmoo zoo rua cov tuabneeg huv ob lub nroog ntawd.
Nyob huv lub nroog Lixathas muaj ib tug txivneej tuag ceg thaus nruab thab lug, nwg moog tsi taug kev le.
Tug txivneej ntawd ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws Paulus qha. Paulus tsaa qhovmuag saib nwg, hab pum has tas nwg muaj kev ntseeg txaus paab nwg ob txhais ceg zoo.
Ces Paulus txawm has nrov nrov rua nwg has tas, “Koj ca le sawv tseeg.” Tug ntawd txawm sawv tseeg ncig moog ncig lug.
Thaus suavdlawg pum tej kws Paulus ua ntawd, puab qw puab cov lug Likaunias nrov nrov has tas, “Tej vaajtswv txa ua tuabneeg lug cuag peb lawm.”
Puab txawm muab Npananpas hu ua Xus, hab muab Paulus hu ua Helemes, rua qhov Paulus yog tug qha.

Tug povthawj kws teev tug vaajtswv Xus, nwg lub tuamtsev nyob saab nrau ntug nroog, nwg txawm caab ib tug txiv nyuj hab nqaa paaj ntoos tuaj txug ntawm lub roojvaag kws yuav moog rua huv lub nroog. Tug povthawj ntawd hab cov pejxeem yuav coj tej ntawd tuaj fij rua ob tug timthawj.

Thaus Npananpas hab Paulus nov has tas puab yuav ua le ntawd rua obtug, obtug txawm muab obtug ob lub tsho dlua hab dlha moog rua huv cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd. Obtug has nrov nrov rua puab has tas,

“Mej ua dlaabtsi le nuav? Wb yog tuabneeg ib yaam le mej hab xwb! Wb tuaj ntawm nuav, yog tuaj qha Txujmoo Zoo rua mej, kuas mej tso tej kws mej ua tsi muaj qaabhau tseg hab lug ntseeg tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob. Nwg yog tug kws tsim lub ntuj, hab lub nplajteb, dlej havtxwv hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob sau nruab ntug hab huv havtxwv.
Yaav taag lug, Vaajtswv ca txhua tsaav tuabneeg, nyag ua lawv le nyag lub sab nyam.

Teg num zoo kws Vaajtswv ibtxwm ua, yog nwg pub muaj tshaav muaj naag, kuas tej qoobloo sav lawv caij lawv nyoog, hab pub zaub mov rua mej noj kuas mej tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Tej nuav qha rua suavdlawg paub tseeb has tas muaj Vaajtswv tag.”
Txawm yog ob tug timthawj qha le ntawd rua puab los puab pheej yuav muab khoom fij rua obtug, obtug cheem yuav laug tsi yeej puab.

Thaus cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias huv tebchaws Pixidias hab huv lub nroog Ikauni-us tuaj txug; puab txawm ntxag kuas suavdlawg tuaj puab tog. Puab muab pobzeb ntaus Paulus hab muab nwg hai tawm huv lub nroog moog, puab xaav has tas nwg tuag lawm.
Tabsis thaus cov ntseeg tuaj sawv vij Paulus, Paulus sawv hab rov moog rua huv lub nroog. Nub tom qaab Paulus hab Npananpas txawm moog rua nraag lub nroog Denpis lawm.

Thaus Paulus hab Npananpas qha txujmoo zoo huv lub nroog Denpis, muaj ntau leej lug ntseeg. Tom qaab ntawd, obtug txawm rov moog rua peg lub nroog Lixathas, lub nroog Ikauni-us, hab lub nroog Aati-aukias huv cheebtsaam Pixidias.

Obtug nplig hab txhawb kuas cov ntseeg muab sab rau ntseeg tsi xob tso kev ntseeg tseg. Obtug qha puab has tas, “Peb cov ntseeg yeej yuav raug ntau yaam kev txomnyem, peb txhaj tau moog Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws.”
Paulus hab Npananpas tsaa muaj cov txwjlaug rua txhua pawg ntseeg, obtug ua kevcai yoo mov hab thov Vaajtswv muab obtug fij rua Vaajtswv tug kws puab ntseeg hab ca sab rua.
Tom qaab ntawd obtug txawm hlaa cheebtsaam Pixidias moog txug nraag tebchaws Paafilias.
Obtug qha Vaajtswv txujlug huv lub nroog Penkas taag, ces obtug txawm moog rua huv lub nroog Atalias,
hab obtug caij nkoj lug rua tim lub nroog Aati-aukias kws cov ntseeg tsaa obtug ua ob tug ua teg num qha txujmoo zoo kws nwgnuav obtug tub ua tav lawm.

Thaus obtug rov qaab lug txug huv lub nroog Aati-aukias, obtug hu cov ntseeg tuaj ua ke, obtug pav txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv tau paab obtug, hab qha qhov kws Vaajtswv qheb kev rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg Vaajtswv lawm rua puab noog.
Obtug nrug cov ntseeg ntawd nyob tau ib ntus.

Thaus Paulus obtug tseem nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias, muaj ob peb tug txivneej tuaj nraag xeev Yudas tuaj txug huv lub nroog Aati-aukias. Puab qha cov ntseeg has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua kevcai txav lawv le Mauxes txuj Kevcai mej txhaj yuav dlim mej lub txim.”

Paulus hab Npananpas nrug puab cov ntawd sis caav txug zaaj nuav. Thaus kawg suavdlawg pum zoo ca Paulus hab Npananpas hab cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias qee leej moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, moog nrug cov timthawj hab cov txwjlaug saablaaj saib yuav ua le caag.

Cov ntseeg txawm xaa obtug moog. Thaus puab taabtom taug kev moog hlaa lub xeev Faunikias hab xeev Xamalis, obtug qha cov ntseeg kws nyob huv ob lub xeev ntawd has tas, muaj lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg Vaajtswv lawm hab. Thaus cov ntseeg nov le ntawd, cov ntseeg zoo sab kawg le.

Thaus Paulus puab moog txug nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov ntseeg, cov timthawj hab cov txwjlaug suavdlawg tuaj tog puab. Paulus obtug qha tej kws Vaajtswv paab obtug thaus obtug moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg rua puab noog.

Tabsis cov ntseeg kws yog cov Falixais paab, muaj qee leej txawm sawv tseeg hab has tas, “Yuavtsum muab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws lug ntseeg ntawd ua kevcai txav, hab kuas puab coj lawv le Mauxes txuj Kevcai.”
Cov timthawj hab cov kws saib cov ntseeg txawm muab zaaj nuav lug saablaaj saib yuav ua le caag.

Puab saablaaj ntev loo has tsi txawj hum, ces Petus txawm sawv tseeg has rua puab has tas, “Cov kwvtij, mej tub paub has tas thaus chivthawj, peb cov kws nyob ntawm nuav, Vaajtswv xaiv kuv ua tug qha Txujmoo Zoo rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kuas puab tau nov hab lug ntseeg.

Hab Vaajtswv tug kws paub suavdlawg lub sab, nwg pub Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv rua puab ib yaam le nwg pub rua peb lawm. Vaajtswv ua le ntawd kuas suavdlawg paub has tas, Vaajtswv pum zoo hu lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lug ntseeg hab.
Vaajtswv suav has tas, lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg hab peb zoo tuab yaam nkaus. Vaajtswv zaam txim rua puab, tub yog vim puab ntseeg Vaajtswv.
Yog le ntawd, ua le caag mej tseem yuav muab lub nraa nyaav rua cov ntseeg ris? Txawm yog peb cov yawmkoob hab peb los yeej ris tsi taug lub nraa ntawd. Mej ua le nuav kuj yog mej sim Vaajtswv sab.
Mej ua le ntawd tsi yog lawm. Qhov kws peb dlim peb lub txim tub yog vim tug Tswv Yexus hlub peb xwb. Puab los kuj ib yaam nkaus le peb hab.”
Thaus Petus has le ntawd taag, suavdlawg txawm nyob tuabywv noog Npananpas hab Paulus qha txug tej txujci luj hab tseemceeb kws Vaajtswv ua thaus obtug moog qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg.
Thaus obtug qha taag lawm, Yakaunpaus has tas, “Cov kwvtij, mej ca le noog kuv has!
Ximoos nyavnyuas qha rua peb noog has tas, thawj zag kws Vaajtswv lug paab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg, Vaajtswv xaiv ib cov lug ua Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg.
Cov kws cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha txug zaaj nuav, lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug sau tseg has tas,
‘Tug Tswv has tas, tom qaab ntawd kuv yuav lug muab Daviv lub tsev kws qaug lawm ua dlua tshab. Txawm yog lub tsev ntawd qaug taag lawm los kuv yuav ua dlua tshab.
Kuv ua le nuav kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv qaab ntuj nuav tau kev lug cuag kuv, tsi has xeem twg le, txhua tug kws kuv xaiv ca lawm, puab yeej yuav lug cuag kuv.
Tug Tswv kws has le nuav, nwg tub qha zaaj nuav rua suavdlawg paub thaus u lug lawm.’ ”
Yakaunpaus has ntxiv tas, “Kuv xaav has tas, peb tsi xob kuas lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws taabtom lug ntseeg ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd.

Tabsis peb ca le sau ntawv moog qha rua puab has tas, kuas puab tsi xob noj tej qhov txhua chaw kws luas muab fij rua dlaab lawm, hab tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg, tsi xob noj tej nqaj tsaj kws hlua zawm cejdlaab tuag hab tsi xob noj ntshaav.
Rua qhov thaus u lug, txhua nub Xanpataus yeej muaj tuabneeg nyeem Mauxes txuj Kevcai huv tej tsev saablaaj hab muaj tuabneeg qha Mauxes tej lug huv txhua lub nroog.”

Tom qaab ntawd, cov timthawj, cov txwjlaug hab cov ntseeg suavdlawg pum zoo xaiv puab paab qee leej nrug Paulus hab Npananpas moog rua peg lub nroog Aati-aukias. Puab xaiv tau ob leeg nrug Paulus obtug moog, ob tug kws puab xaiv ntawd, ib tug yog Yudas kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Npaxanpas hab ib tug yog Xilas, suavdlawg puavleej fwm obtug.

Tsaab ntawv kws puab sau rua obtug nqaa moog has le nuav: “Peb cov kws yog cov timthawj hab cov txwjlaug kws yog mej cov kwvtij, peb sau tsaab ntawv nuav tuaj rua mej txhua tug ntseeg kws yog lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias huv tebchaws Xilias hab huv tebchaws Kilikias.
Peb nov has tas, peb cov muaj qee leej tuaj ua rua mej ntxhuv sab. Tej kws puab qha mej ntawd, yeej tsi yog peb kuas puab tuaj qha.
Yog le ntawd peb txhaj saablaaj pum zoo has tas, ca peb xaiv peb cov ib ob tug nrug Npananpas hab Paulus kws yog peb ob tug kwvtij kws peb hlub tuaj saib mej.
Paulus obtug yog ob tug kws muab sab rau ua peb tug Tswv Yexus Khetos teg num, obtug tsi khauvxwm obtug txujsa.
Peb khaiv Yudas hab Xilas tuaj cuag mej, obtug yuav qha mej lawv nraim le tej kws peb sau tuaj rua mej nuav.
Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv hab peb pum zoo has tas, peb tsi xob muab lub nraa nyaav rua mej ris, tsuas yog kuas mej coj tej yaam kws tseemceeb xwb.

Tej ntawd yog le nuav: Mej tsi xob noj tej qhov txhua chaw kws luas muab fij rua dlaab lawm, tsi xob noj ntshaav, tsi xob noj tej nqaj tsaj kws hlua zawm cejdlaab tuag hab tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg. Yog mej coj tau tej nuav, ces yog mej ua tau zoo lawm. Thov kuas mej tau nyob kaaj sab lug.”

Cov ntseeg txawm khaiv ob tug kws puab xaiv tau lawd nrug Paulus obtug moog. Thaus puab moog txug peg lub nroog Aati-aukias, puab hu cov ntseeg suavdlawg tuaj ua ke, hab muab tsaab ntawv ntawd rua cov ntseeg nyeem.
Thaus cov ntseeg nyeem taag, puab suavdlawg zoo sab kawg le, rua qhov tsaab ntawv ntawd txhawb puab tug zug heev.
Yudas hab Xilas yog ob tug xwbfwb kws cev Vaajtswv lug. Obtug qha ntau zaaj rua cov ntseeg noog, tej kws obtug qha ntawd txhawb cov ntseeg tug zug heev.
Obtug nrug cov ntseeg nyob tau ib ntus, tom qaab ntawd cov ntseeg xaa obtug rov qaab kaaj sab lug moog cuag cov kws khaiv obtug tuaj.
Tabsis Xilas has tas, nwg yuav nrug puab nyob ntawd.
Paulus hab Npananpas tseem nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias tau ib ntus. Obtug hab muaj ntau leej sis paab qha Vaajtswv txujlug.
Tsi ntev tom qaab ntawd Paulus txawm has rua Npananpas has tas, “Wb moog saib cov ntseeg huv txhua lub nroog kws wb tau moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua puab lawm, saib suavdlawg nyob le caag.”
Npananpas xaav coj Yauhaas Malakaus nrug obtug moog,
tabsis Paulus tsi pum zoo coj, rua qhov thawj zag thaus puab moog txug tim Paafilias, Malakaus ca le tso obtug tseg tsiv lawm, nwg tsi paab obtug ua num kuas tav.
Paulus hab Npananpas obtug sis caav heev, ces obtug nyag txawm ncaim moog nyag lawm. Npananpas coj Malakaus nrug nwg moog, obtug caij nkoj hlaa havtxwv moog rua tim lub koog povtxwv Xaipas.
Paulus coj Xilas nrug nwg moog. Thaus cov ntseeg thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua obtug taag, Paulus txawm sawv kev moog.
Paulus moog qha thoob plawg huv tebchaws Xilias hab tebchaws Kilikias. Tej kws nwg qha ntawd txhawb cov ntseeg tug zug heev.

Paulus moog txug peg lub nroog Denpis hab lub nroog Lixathas. Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Lixathas muaj ib tug hu ua Timautes. Timautes nam yog ib tug tuabneeg Yudais kws ntseeg Vaajtswv, tabsis Timautes txiv yog tuabneeg Kilis.
Cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Lixathas hab huv lub nroog Ikaune-us suavdlawg puavleej fwm Timautes.

Paulus xaav coj Timautes nrug nwg moog, Paulus txawm muab Timautes ua kevcai txav. Paulus ua le ntawd, rua qhov cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd puavleej paub has tas, Timautes txiv yog tuabneeg Kilis.

Paulus puab moog thoob plawg txhua lub nroog, puab qha tej kevcai kws cov timthawj hab cov txwjlaug nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees sau tuaj qha rua suavdlawg noog hab kuas suavdlawg ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd.
Yog le ntawd, cov ntseeg txhaj muaj zug heev hab naj nub muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob quas zug ntxiv.
Tom qaab ntawd Paulus puab moog thoob plawg huv cheebtsaam Felinkias hab cheebtsaam Kalatias, rua qhov Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv tsi pub puab moog qha huv xeev Axias.
Thaus puab moog txug peg Mixias nrimteb, puab yuav moog huv lub xeev Npithinias, tabsis Yexus tug Ntsujplig tsi pub puab moog.
Puab txawm ca le hlaa dlhau plawg  lub nroog Mixias moog rua nraag lub nroog Rhau-as.
Mo ntawd Paulus txawm ua ywgtoog pum ib tug txivneej Makedaunias sawv ntsug thov Paulus has tas, “Thov koj hlaa tuaj paab peb cov kws nyob tim Makedaunias nuav.”

Thaus Paulus ua ywgtoog ntawd, ces taamsim ntawd peb txawm sawbsim qhov txhua chaw yuav moog rua tim lub xeev Makedaunias, rua qhov peb paub tseeb has tas, Vaajtswv hu peb moog qha txujmoo zoo rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob tid.
Peb caij nkoj huv lub nroog Rhau-as ncaaj nraim moog rua peg koog Povtxwv Xamaulakes, hab nub tom qaab peb moog rua tim lub nroog Ne-apaulis.

Peb taug kev tawm huv lub nroog Ne-apaulis moog rua peg lub nroog Filipis. Lub nroog Filipis yog lub tuamceeb nroog huv xeev Makedaunias  kws yog cov tuabneeg Loos tswjfwm. Peb nyob ntawd tau ob peb nub.

Thaus txug nub Xanpataus, peb txawm tawm huv lub nroog moog rua tom ntug dlej, peb xaav has tas nyaj yuav muaj ib qhov chaw kws cov Yudais moog thov Vaajtswv tod. Thaus peb moog txug, peb nyob quastsawg hab nrug cov quaspuj kws nyob tod thaam.

Cov quaspuj ntawd muaj ib tug hu ua Lidias, nwg yog tuabneeg Thiyatilas, nwg tuaj ua luam muag ntaub yaajpwm. Nwg yog ib tug kws fwm Vaajtswv. Thaus nwg nov Paulus qha, tug Tswv qheb nwg lub sab, ua rua nwg totaub tej lug kws Paulus qha.

Ces Lidias hab nwg tsev tuabneeg txawm ua kevcai raus dlej, Lidias has rua peb tas, “Yog mej pum has tas kuv ntseeg Vaajtswv tag, ces mej ca le nrug kuv moog su huv kuv tsev. Nwg coj peb heev, ces peb txawm nrug nwg moog rua tom nwg tsev.”

Muaj ib nub thaus peb taabtom taug kev moog rua tom qhov chaw kws suavdlawg tuaj thov Vaajtswv, peb ntsib ib tug ntxhais qhev, nwg muaj dlaab hab paub txug yaav tom ntej. Qhov kws nwg txawj saib moov le ntawd, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws yuav nwg lug ua qhev tau nyaj ntau heev.
Nwg pheej lawv Paulus peb qaab hab qw nrov nrov has tas, “Cov txivneej nuav yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus cov tubkhai! Puab tuaj qha txujkev dlim txim rua mej.”

Nwg pheej naj nub ua le ntawd, Paulus ntxhuv sab, ces Paulus txawm tig hlo moog has rua tug dlaab has tas, “Kuv tuav Yexus Khetos lub npe ntab koj, koj ca le tawm huv tug ntxhais nuav lub cev moog.” Taamsim ntawd dlaab txawm tawm plawg lawm.

Thaus cov tuabneeg kws yuav tug ntxhais ntawd lug ua qhev pum has tas, puab yuav tsi tau nyaj lawm puab chim heev, puab txawm nteg kag Paulus hab Xilas obtug caab moog rua huv plawv nroog rua suavdlawg saib.
Puab coj Paulus obtug moog cuag cov numtswv Loos, hab qha rua cov numtswv has tas, “Ob tug txivneej nuav yog tuabneeg Yudais, obtug tuaj ua rua peb cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav ntxhuv.
Obtug tuaj qha tej kevcai kws txawv peb txuj. Peb yog tuabneeg Loos, peb yeej tsi yuav tej kevcai ntawd hab peb coj tsi tau.”
Thaus puab has le ntawd taag, cov pejxeem txawm sau nthwv lug yuav ntaus Paulus hab Xilas obtug. Cov numtswv txawm muab obtug tej rig tsho dlua pis rhe povtseg hab kuas cov tubrog muab obtug nplawm.
Thaus cov tubrog muab obtug nplawm taag, puab txawm coj obtug moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, puab kuas tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj zuv obtug zoo zoo.
Thaus puab has le ntawd taag, tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj txawm muab obtug kaw rua chaav huv plawv hab muab obtug xauv kutaw ruaj ruaj ca.

Thaus kwvlaam ib taag mo, Paulus hab Xilas taabtom thov Vaajtswv hab hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv. Cov tuabneeg kws nrug obtug nyob ua ke huv tsev lojcuj, puab suavdlawg noog obtug thov Vaajtswv hab hu nkauj.

Thaus obtug tseem hu nkauj, ua cav aav txawm tseeg quas nkawg ua rua lub tsev lojcuj ua zug koog. Ces taamsim ntawd lub tsev lojcuj tej qhovrooj txawm ca le qheb taagnrho hab tej saw hlau kws khi cov tuabneeg raug txim tej teg taw txawm nplaam taag huv tuabsi.

Tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj, nwg tsim dlheev nruab dlaab ndlub lug, ua cav tej qhovrooj tub qheb taag lawm. Thaus nwg pum le ntawd, nwg xaav has tas, ntshai cov tuabneeg raug txim tsiv taag lawm. Ces nwg txawm rhu hlo nwg raab ntaaj lug, yuav rov tua nwg.
Tabsis Paulus hu nrov nrov has tas, “Koj tsi xob ua le ko rua koj, peb txhua tug puavleej tseem nyob txhij ntawm nuav.”
Tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj kuas ib tug coj teeb moog rua nwg. Nwg txawm dlha ceev nrooj moog rua huv, nwg txhus caug ndlua ntawm Paulus hab Xilas kutaw. Nwg ntshai ua ib ce tshee quas nyo.
Nwg coj Paulus obtug tawm lug, nwg nug obtug has tas, “Ob tug tijlaug, kuv yuav ua le caag, kuv txhaj dlim kuv lub txim?”
Paulus obtug teb has tas, “Koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg ca le ntseeg tug Tswv Yexus, mej txhaj yuav dlim lub txim.”
Obtug qha tug Tswv txujlug rua tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tsev noog.
Mo ntawd nwg coj obtug moog ntxuav obtug tej qhov txhaab kws luas nplawm to. Thaus ntxuav taag, nwg hab nwg tsev tuabneeg txawm ua kevcai raus dlej.
Thaus puab ua kevcai raus dlej taag, nwg coj Paulus hab Xilas rov moog peg nwg tsev hab ua mov rua obtug noj. Nwg hab nwg tsev tuabneeg zoo sab kawg le, rua qhov puab lug ntseeg Vaajtswv lawm.
Thaus kaaj ntug, cov numtswv Loos khaiv ib tug tub ceevxwm moog has rua tug kws zuv lub tsev lojcuj has tas, “Ca le tso obtug ntawm moog.”
Tug zuv lub tsev lojcuj txawm has rua Paulus has tas, “Cov numtswv tso tuabneeg tuaj has kuas kuv tso koj hab Xilas moog, yog le ntawd meb ca le moog kaaj sab lug.”

Tabsis Paulus has rua cov tub ceevxwm has tas, “Puab tsi tau taug wb zaaj saib wb puas tau ua txhum, puab ca le muab wb nplawm taabmeeg suavdlawg. Txawm yog wb tub yog tuabneeg Loos los puab tseem nplawm wb hab muab wb kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj nuav. Nwgnuav puab tsua yuav kuas wb ca le tawm tuabywv moog xwb yeej tsi tau le. Ca le kuas cov numtswv Loos tuaj tso wb.”
Cov tub ceevxwm rov moog qha tej nuav rua cov numtswv Loos noog. Thaus cov numtswv Loos nov has tas, Paulus hab Xilas yog tuabneeg Loos, puab ntshai kawg le.
Yog le ntawd, puab txawm tuaj thov Paulus hab Xilas obtug zaam txim rua puab. Thaus puab thov taag, puab coj obtug tawm huv tsev lojcuj, hab thov kuas obtug tawm huv lub nroog moog.

Thaus Paulus hab Xilas tawm huv tsev lojcuj moog, obtug moog rua tom Lidias tsev. Muaj cov kwvtij ntseeg tuaj nyob ua ke huv Lidias tsev, obtug txhawb kuas puab muab sab rau ntseeg, hab obtug moog rua lwm qhov lawm.

Thaus Paulus hab Xilas obtug hlaa dlhau lub nroog Aafipaulis hab lub nroog Apaulaunias lawm, obtug txawm moog txug nraag lub nroog Thexalaunikes. Cov Yudais muaj ib lub tsev saablaaj nyob huv lub nroog ntawd.
Paulus txawm moog qha huv lub tsev saablaaj ntawd lawv le nwg txeev qha, nwg qha le ntawd peb zag rua peb nub Xanpataus. Nwg muab Vaajtswv txujlug qha hab teb tej lug kws puab nrug nwg sis caav.

Nwg qha rua puab has tas, “Yeej yuav muaj tuabneeg muab tug Mexiyas tua, hab tom qaab ntawd, nwg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug. Paulus has tas, tug Yexus kws kuv taabtom qha rua mej nuav, nwg yog tug Mexiyas ntaag.”

Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj noog ntawd muaj qee leej ntseeg tej kws Paulus hab Xilas qha hab muaj cov tuabneeg Kilis kws fwm Vaajtswv hab cov quaspuj kws tseemceeb ntau leej ntseeg tej kws Paulus obtug qha.

Tabsis cov Yudais ntxub obtug, puab txawm moog hu tej tuabneeg tsi tsimtxaj kws nyob tom tej kev tuaj nrug puab ua ib paab. Puab ua rua cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd ntxhuv, hab puab moog tsoo Yaxoos tsev nrhav Paulus hab Xilas obtug, puab yuav coj obtug tawm lug rua cov pejxeem txav txim.

Tabsis puab nrhav tsi pum obtug, puab txawm nteg Yaxoos hab ob peb tug ntseeg caab moog cuag cov numtswv, puab qw nrov nrov has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws ua rua tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov ntxhuv. Nwgnuav puab tuaj txug huv peb lub nroog lawm.

Tabsis Yaxoos tseem ca puab pw huv Yaxoos tsev hab. Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, puab tseem ua txhum vaajntxwv txuj kevcai, puab qha has tas, nwgnuav muaj dlua ib tug vaajntxwv hu ua Yexus lug kaav suavdlawg lawm.”
Thaus cov pejxeem hab cov numtswv nov le ntawd, puab chim heev.
Cov numtswv txawm muab Yaxoos puab nplua. Thaus puab them nyaj taag, cov numtswv txhaj tso puab moog.
Thaus tsaus ntuj zuag cov ntseeg xaa Paulus hab Xilas obtug moog nraag lub nroog Npele-as. Thaus obtug moog txug nraag, obtug moog rua huv cov Yudais lub tsev saablaaj.

Paulus qha cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Npele-as yoojyim dlua le nwg qha cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Thexalaunikes. Cov tuabneeg Npele-as kub sab lug noog Vaajtswv txujlug hab puab naj nub kawm Vaajtswv txujlug, saib puas muaj tseeb lawv le Paulus qha.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd muaj ntau leej lug ntseeg, muaj ntau leej quaspuj Kilis kws suavdlawg fwm hab ntau leej txivneej Kilis lug ntseeg hab.

Thaus cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Thexalaunikes nov has tas, Paulus moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug nraag lub nroog Npele-as lawm, puab txawm tuaj ua rua cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd ntxhuv.
Thaus cov ntseeg pum muaj le ntawd, puab txawm xaa Paulus moog rua nraag ntug havtxwv, tabsis Xilas hab Timautes tsi moog. Obtug ca le nyob huv lub nroog Npele-as.
Puab xaa Paulus moog txug nraag lub nroog Athees. Thaus cov kws xaa Paulus yuav rov qaab lug rua peg lub nroog Npele-as, Paulus kuas puab moog has rua Xilas hab Timautes kuas tuaj cuag nwg sai sai.
Thaus Paulus nyob huv lub nroog Athees tog Timautes hab Xilas obtug, nwg pum lub nroog ntawd muaj mlom ntau heev, nwg ntxhuv sab kawg le.
Nwg moog huv lub tsev saablaaj, nwg naj nub nrug cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws fwm Vaajtswv hab cov tuabneeg kws tuaj rua ntawm tej kab sis caam.

Thaus Paulus tseem nrug puab sis caam, ces cov xwbfwb kws yog cov Epikule-as paab hab cov Xatau-is paab qee leej tuaj nrug Paulus sis caam hab. Paulus qha has txug Yexus zaaj, hab qha txug qhov kws tuabneeg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.  Puab cov ntawd qee leej thuam Paulus has tas, “Tug tuabneeg nuav nwg tub tsi txawj ntse, nwg qha ua dlaabtsi?” Qee leej has tas, “Saib mas zoo le yog nwg has txug lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg tej vaajtswv?”
Yog le ntawd, puab txawm coj Paulus moog cuag cov numtswv ntawm Alepankus. Puab nug Paulus has tas, “Zaaj tshab kws koj qha ntawd yog le caag? Thov koj qha rua peb noog saib.
Peb nov koj qha tej zaaj txawv txawv kws peb tsi tau nov dlua. Peb xaav paub saib zaaj ntawd yog le caag tag.”
(Puab has le ntawd, rua qhov cov tuabneeg Athees hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, puab nyam noog hab nyam sis thaam txug tej zaaj txawv txawv kws puab tsi tau nov dlua.)
Ces Paulus txawm sawv ntsug taabmeeg cov numtswv hab qha puab has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Athees, kuv pum mej muab sab rau teev mej tej mlom heev.

Thaus kuv moog ncig saib mej lub nroog hab moog saib tej chaw kws mej pe mlom, kuv pum muaj lug sau rua ntawm ib lub thaaj has tas, ‘Muab rua tug Vaajtswv Kws Peb tsi Paub.’ Tug kws mej pehawm tabsis mej tsi paub ntawd tub yog tug kws nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej ntaag.
Tug Vaajtswv kws tsim lub nplajteb hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav, tug ntawd yog tug Tswv kws kaav lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb, nwg yeej tsi nyob huv tej tsev kws tuabneeg ua.
Vaajtswv tsi pluag ib yaam dlaabtsi le, nwg yeej tsi kuas leejtwg ua ib yaam dlaabtsi rua nwg. Rua qhov Vaajtswv yog tug kws rau sav rau paa rua tuabneeg, hab pub ib puas tsaav yaam rua suavdlawg.

Vaajtswv tsim txhua tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv tuab tug tuabneeg le roj ntshaa lug xwb, hab kuas puab moog nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb. Vaajtswv tu tebchaws rua puab hab teem sijhawm kuas puab nyob ntev le caag.
Vaajtswv ua le ntawd kuas puab txhaj le lug nrhav Vaajtswv. Yog puab kub sab lug xaav paub Vaajtswv, puab yeej yuav paub nwg, rua qhov Vaajtswv yeej nyob tsi dleb ntawm peb txhua tug.

lawv le qee leej has tseg has tas, ‘Muaj Vaajtswv, peb txhaj le caj sa moog moog lug lug hab muaj sa nyob.’ Mej cov kws txawj has lug txaj muaj qee leej has tas: ‘Peb puavleej yog Vaajtswv cov mivnyuas hab.’
Yog le ntawd, peb cov kws yog Vaajtswv cov mivnyuas lawm, peb tsi xob xaav has tas, Vaajtswv zoo ib yaam le tej mlom kws cov tuabneeg muaj tswvyim muab nyaj, muab kub nchuav hab muab pobzeb txaug ua.

Thaus tuabneeg tseem tsi tau paub Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv tsi suav tuabneeg lub txim. Tabsis nwgnuav Vaajtswv tub qha rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub qaab ntuj nuav has tas, puab yuavtsum tso puab tej kev txhum tseg.

Rua qhov Vaajtswv tub teem ib nub ca lawm, nub ntawd Vaajtswv yuav txav txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj nuav. Tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa lug ua tug txav txim, nwg yuav txav txim ncaaj nceeg. Hab qhov kws Vaajtswv tsaa tug ntawd sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, qhov ntawd qha rua suavdlawg paub has tas, tug ntawd yog tug kws Vaajtswv tsaa tag.”

Thaus cov tuabneeg noog Paulus qha, puab nov Paulus has tas muaj ib tug kws tuag lawm sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, puab txawm thuam hab luag Paulus zum zawg. Tabsis muaj qee leej has tas, “Peb xaav rov noog koj qha zaaj nuav dlua hab.”
Tom qaab ntawd, Paulus txawm tawm huv qhov chaw kws suavdlawg tuaj saablaaj ntawd moog lawm.
Muaj qee leej lug ntseeg Yexus hab lug koom nrug Paulus. Cov tuabneeg kws lug ntseeg muaj ib tug nom hu ua Di-aunexi-us; muaj ib tug quaspuj hu ua Damalis, hab muaj dlua ob leeg lug ntseeg hab.
Tom qaab ntawd Paulus txawm tawm huv lub nroog Athees moog rua tim lub nroog Kauleethaus.

Thaus nwg nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, nwg ntsib ib tug tuabneeg Yudais hu ua Akilas kws yug huv tebchaws Pootus. Akilas tug quaspuj hu ua Paxilas. Obtug nyavnyuas tuaj tim tebchaws Italis tuaj, rua qhov Vaajntxwv Kelaudi-us ntab cov Yudais txhua tug kuas tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Loos moog. Paulus txawm moog saib Akilas obtug,
Paulus nrug obtug nyob hab nrug obtug ua num ua ke. Paulus xaws tsevntaub ib yaam le Akilas obtug.
Txhua nub Xanpataus Paulus moog rua huv tsev saablaaj, nwg yum cov Yudais hab cov tuabneeg Kilis kuas lug ntseeg Yexus Khetos.

Thaus Xilas hab Timautes obtug tuaj peg lub xeev Makedaunias tuaj txug huv lub nroog Kauleethaus, Paulus txawm qha Vaajtswv txujlug lawm xwb, nwg tsi ua lwm yaam num le. Nwg ua timkhawv rua cov Yudais has tas, Yexus yog tug Mexiyas.

Thaus puab tawmtsaam hab thuam Paulus, Paulus txawm muab Paulus lub tsho nchus, hab has rua puab has tas, “Yog mej lub txim poob lug raug mej, mej tsi xob lam has tas kuv tsi qha mej. Txij nuav moog kuv yuav moog qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg.”
Paulus txawm ncaim puab moog, nwg moog nrug ib tug txivneej kws yog lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws hu ua Titi-us Yuxatus nyob. Nwg yog ib tug kws fwm Vaajtswv, nwg lub tsev nyob ze lub tsev saablaaj.

Kixapus kws yog tug thawj saib lub tsev saablaaj, hab nwg tsev tuabneeg txawm lug ntseeg Yexus Khetos hab muaj ntau leej kws nyob huv lub nroog Kauleethaus tau nov Paulus qha, puab txawm lug ntseeg hab ua kevcai raus dlej.
Muaj ib mos Paulus ua ywgtoog pum tug Tswv lug has rua Paulus has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai, koj ca le qha moog tsi xob tso tseg,
rua qhov kuv nrug koj nyob. Tsi muaj leejtwg yuav ua tau phem rua koj, rua qhov kuv cov thwjtim muaj ntau leej nyob huv lub nroog nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Paulus txhaj nyob huv lub nroog Kauleethaus qha Vaajtswv txujlug rua suavdlawg tau ib xyoos hab rau hli.
Lub sijhawm kws Nkali-aus ua nom kaav lub xeev Akhayas, cov Yudais tuavhuv ua ib lub sab nteg Paulus coj moog rua tom tsev has plaub.
Puab has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav yum suavdlawg kuas pehawm Vaajtswv tsi lawv le peb txuj kevcai.”
Thaus Paulus taabtom yuav teb puab, Nkali-aus has rua cov Yudais has tas, “Yog nwg tau ua txhum qhov twg lossis tau ua phem le caag rua mej cov Yudais, ces kuv yeej yuav ua sab ntev noog mej tej lug.
Tabsis mej tsuas sis caav txug tej nyuas lug, tej nyuas npe hab mej tej kevcai kws mej has tsi sis hum xwb, ca mej sis has mej, tej kws mej has nuav kuv tsi kaam txav txim.”
Nkali-aus txawm ntab puab tawm huv lub tsev has plaub moog.
Ces puab cov ntawd txawm moog nteg Xauthenes kws yog tug thawj saib lub tsev saablaaj coj moog nplawm ntawm lub tsev has plaub saab nrau qaab tsistaug. Tabsis Nkali-aus tsi quavntsej le.

Paulus nrug cov ntseeg nyob huv lub nroog Kauleethaus tau ob peb nub ntxiv, nwg maam le nrug Paxilas hab Akilas caij nkoj moog rua tim tebchaws Xilias. Thaus puab moog txug huv lub nroog Keekhale-as, ces Paulus txawm muab nwg cov plaubhau chais, rua qhov nwg tub coglug  has tas, nwg yuav chais nwg cov plaubhau.
Thaus Paulus moog txug tim lub nroog Efexus, Paulus txawm ncaim Paxilas hab Akilas obtug. Thaus puab sis ncaim lawm, Paulus moog rua huv tsev saablaaj hab nrug cov Yudais sis caam.
Puab cov ntawd thov kuas Paulus nrug puab nyob ib ntus, tabsis Paulus tsi kaam nyob.
Thaus nwg yuav ncaim puab moog, nwg has rua puab has tas, “Yog Vaajtswv pum zoo kuv tuaj, kuv maam le rov qaab tuaj qha mej dlua.” Ces Paulus txawm caij nkoj tawm huv lub nroog Efexus moog lawm.
Thaus Paulus moog txug nraag lub nroog Xixaleyas, Paulus moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees hab moog saib cov ntseeg kws nyob nraag. Tom qaab ntawd nwg rov lug rua peg lub nroog Aati-aukias.
Nwg nyob huv lub nroog Aati-aukias ib ntus, nwg maam le moog txhua nrho qhov txhua chaw huv cheebtsaam Kalatias hab Felinkias, nwg moog qha cov ntseeg kuas muab sab rau ntseeg.
Thaus ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej Yudais hu ua Apaulaus kws nyob huv lub nroog Alexaadias, nwg tuaj txug huv lub nroog Efexus. Nwg yog ib tug kws txawj qha hab paub Vaajtswv txujlug.
Nwg kawm tug Tswv txuj Kevcai. Nwg kub sab lug qha txug Yexus zaaj, tej kws nwg qha ntawd puavleej muaj tseeb. Tabsis nwg tsuas paub txuj kevcai raus dlej kws Yauhaas qha xwb.

Apaulaus moog qha huv lub tsev saablaaj tsi ntshai leejtwg le. Thaus Paxilas hab Akilas nov nwg qha, obtug txawm coj nwg moog rua tom obtug tsev, hab obtug qha Vaajtswv zaaj rua Apaulaus paub tseeb dlua yaav taag lug lawm.

Thaus cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Efexus paub has tas, Apaulaus yuav hlaa moog rua tim tebchaws Kilis, puab sau ib tsaab ntawv xaa moog rua cov ntseeg kws nyob tid kuas puab hlub Apaulaus. Thaus Apaulaus moog txug tid, nwg paab puab kawg le, puab lug ntseeg rua qhov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab.
Nwg caav yeej cov Yudais taabmeeg suavdlawg, rua qhov nwg tej lug tseemceeb, hab nwg muab Vaajtswv txujlug qha rua puab paub has tas, Yexus yog tug Mexiyas.

Thaus Apaulaus nyob huv lub nroog Kauleethaus, thaus ntawd Paulus moog txhua nrho cheebtsaam Kalatias, nwg maam le moog txug huv lub nroog Efexus. Thaus nwg tuaj txug lawm, nwg ntsib cov ntseeg ob peb leeg,
nwg nug puab has tas, “Thaus mej lug ntseeg, mej puas tau Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb tsi tau nov dlua has tas muaj Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv le.”
Paulus nug puab has tas, “Yog le ntawd, mej ua kevcai raus dlej le caag?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb ua lawv le Yauhaas txuj kevcai raus dlej.”

Paulus qha rua puab has tas, “Yauhaas txuj kevcai raus dlej tsuas qha has tas, cov kws ua kevcai raus dlej ntawd yog cov kws tub tso kev txhum tseg lawm, txawm yog le ntawd los Yauhaas qha has tas, suavdlawg yuavtsum ntseeg tug kws yuav lawv Yauhaas qaab lug, tug ntawd yog Yexus.”
Thaus puab nov Paulus has le ntawd, puab txawm tuav tug Tswv Yexus lub npe ua kevcai raus dlej.
Thaus Paulus tsaa teg hab thov Vaajtswv rua puab, Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv lug rua puab txhua tug. Puab txawm has tau lug txawv txawv hab puab qha Vaajtswv txujlug.
Cov txivneej ntawd muaj kwvlaam le kaum ob leeg.
Paulus muaj sab tawv qha huv lub tsev saablaaj has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws tau peb lub hlis. Nwg nrug cov tuabneeg kws tuaj noog nwg qha sis caam hab yum kuas puab lug ntseeg Yexus.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg ntawd qee leej muaj sab tawv tsi kaam ntseeg Yexus. Puab taabmeeg thuam Tswv Yexus zaaj rua suavdlawg noog. Ces Paulus txawm tso puab tseg, coj nwg cov thwjtim nrug nwg moog, hab nwg naj nub  moog qha huv Tilanus chaav tsev saablaaj.
Nwg pheej qha le ntawd tau ob xyoos, cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub xeev Axias txhaj tau nov Vaajtswv txujlug.
Vaajtswv pub fwjchim rua Paulus ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb rua suavdlawg pum,

hab puab muab Paulus txuj phuam so fws hab Paulus dlaim ntaub npua ua num coj moog tso rua sau cov tuabneeg kws muaj mob lub cev, ces cov tuabneeg ntawd tej mob txawm zoo lawm, hab cov tuabneeg kws raug dlaab los dlaab ca le tawm lawm.

Cov Yudais kws txawj ntab dlaab muaj qee leej moog ntab dlaab rua qhov nuav qhov u. Puab tuav Yexus lub npe ntab dlaab saib dlaab puas tawm. Puab has rua dlaab has tas, “Peb tuav Yexus tug muaj fwjchim kws Paulus qha ntab mej tawm.”
Cov kws ua le ntawd tub yog cov Yudais tug Povthawj Hlub kws hu ua Xakevas xyaa leej tub ntaag.
Dlaab teb puab has tas, “Kuv yeej paub Yexus hab paub Paulus, tabsis mej tsua yog leejtwg?”
Tug txivneej kws raug dlaab ntawd txawm muab puab ntaus, nwg ntaus yeej puab, puab txawm tsiv tawm huv nwg lub tsev moog. Puab tej rig tsho ndluag hab ib ce to taag huv tuabsi.
Cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Efexus puavleej nov zaaj nuav, puab ntshai kawg le. Ces Tswv Yexus lub npe txawm nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg txhua qhov.
Cov kws tub xub lug ntseeg lawm, muaj ntau leej tuaj leeg puab tej kev txhum taabmeeg suavdlawg.
Cov tuabneeg kws txawj ua khawvkoob ntau leej muab puab tej ntawv khawvkoob coj tuaj hlawv taabmeeg suavdlawg. Puab tej ntawv ntawd raug nqe tsib caug txheeb lub nyaj.
Yog le ntawd, tug Tswv txujlug kws muaj fwjchim  txhaj nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg txhua qhov hab muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg coob zuj zug.

Thaus dlhau tej xwm ntawd lawm Paulus npaaj sab  has tas nwg yuav moog rua tim Makedaunias hab Akhayas, nwg maam le moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees. Paulus has tas, “Tom qaab ntawd kuv yuavtsum moog rua tim lub nroog Loos.”
Paulus khaiv Timautes hab Elatus kws nrug nwg ua num ua nwg ntej moog rua tim lub xeev Makedaunias. Thaus obtug moog lawm, Paulus tseem nyob huv xeev Axias tau ib ntus hab.
Thaus ntawd nyob huv lub nroog Efexus muaj kev kub ntxhuv, rua qhov muaj tuabneeg lug ntseeg Yexus coob zuj zug,

nyob huv lub nroog ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Demeti-us, nwg yog ib tug kws ntaus nyaj muag, nwg muab nyaj nchuav ua tej lub nyuas tsev miv miv zoo le lub tsev teev tug mlom quaspuj Alatemis, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws ntaus nyaj tau nyaj ntau heev.

Demeti-us txawm moog hu cov kws ntaus nyaj ntawd hab lwm cov kws txawj ntaus nyaj ib yaam le puab cov tuaj saablaaj. Nwg has rua puab has tas, “Mej suavdlawg yeej paub has tas, tub yog vim peb ua teg num nuav peb txhaj tau noj tau haus.

Mej tub pum hab nov tej kws tug Paulus ntawd qha lawm. Nwg qha has tas, tej mlom kws peb nchuav nuav tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi le. Nwg has le ntawd ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Efexus nuav hab cov kws nyob thoob plawg lub xeev Axias tso txuj qub kevcai tseg yuav taag.

Yog peb tsi ceevfaaj, nyob tsaam tej kws peb ua yuav poob nqe hab ntshai suavdlawg yuav saib tsi taug lub tsev kws peb pe tug mlom quaspuj Alatemis kws muaj fwjchim luj, ces tug mlom quaspuj Alatemis kws cov tuabneeg Axias huv lub xeev Axias hab tej tuabneeg kws nyob thoob plawg huv qaab ntuj nuav pe yuav tsi muaj fwjchim lawm.”
Thaus Demeti-us has le ntawd taag, suavdlawg chim heev, puab txawm qw nrov nrov has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Efexus, tug mlom quaspuj Alatemis muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.”

Ces txawm muaj kev ntxhuv thoob plawg huv lub nroog Efexus. Suavdlawg txawm tuaj nteg kag Nkayus hab Alitakhus kws yog tuabneeg Makedaunias caab moog rua tom lub tshaav puam, rua qhov obtug nrug Paulus tuaj.
Paulus xaav moog cheem cov tuabneeg ntawd, tabsis cov ntseeg tsi kheev Paulus moog.
Cov numtswv kws nrug Paulus sis raug zoo khaiv tuabneeg moog cheem kuas Paulus tsi xob moog huv cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob tom tshaav puam.
Thaus ntawd cov tuabneeg coob coob kws nyob tod taabtom ntxhuv heev, nyag taug nyag qw le nuav le u, rua qhov muaj ibtxha tsi paub has tas, sov puab tuaj saablaaj zaaj dlaabtsi tag!

Cov Yudais txawm muab Alexaades thawb moog rua tom suavdlawg hauv ntej, ces muaj qee leej xaav has tas, tug kws ua txhum ntshai yog Alexaades. Alexaades txawm cu teg kuas suavdlawg nyob tuabywv, nwg yuav qha zaaj ntawd rua suavdlawg saib yog le caag.
Tabsis thaus puab pum has tas, Alexaades yog tuabneeg Yudais hab, puab qw tau ob txoog teev has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Efexus tug mlom Alatemis muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.”

Thaus kawg tug teev ntawv huv lub nroog has kuas suavdlawg nyob tuabywv. Nwg has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Efexus, suavdlawg puavleej paub has tas, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Efexus nuav yog cov kws tu lub tsev teev tug mlom Alatemis kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, hab tu lub pobzeb tseemceeb kws poob sau ntuj lug.
Suavdlawg puavleej paub has tas, muaj le ntawd tag. Yog le ntawd, mej ca le nyob tuabywv tsi xob laam tau laam ua rua suavdlawg ntxhuv.
Mej nteg obtug lug ua dlaabtsi? Obtug tub tsi tau moog nyag ib yaam dlaabtsi huv lub tsev teev mlom lossis thuam peb tug mlom los sav.
Yog Demeti-us hab nwg cov tuabneeg ntaus nyaj ntawd xaav kom leejtwg rua numtswv, peb yeej muaj tsev has plaub hab muaj tug txav txim huv tuabsi, kuas puab moog sis has lawm tom.
Tabsis yog mej tsua muaj dlua lwm zaaj, mej yuavtsum hu suavdlawg tuaj ua ke saablaaj tsaiv, maam le txav txim.
Yog peb tsi ua le nuav, nyob tsaam numtswv yuav has tas, tej kev kws ntxhuv nub nua yog peb ua, ces peb yuav tsi muaj lug teb puab, rua qhov tej kev ntxhuv nuav tsi muaj hauvpaug hauvntsis dlaabtsi.”
Thaus nwg has le ntawd taag, ces nwg txawm kuas suavdlawg moog tsev.
Thaus tsi muaj kev ntxhuv lawm, Paulus hu cov ntseeg tuaj ua ke. Nwg has lug txhawb puab zug taag, nwg txawm ncaim puab moog rua peg lub xeev Makedaunias lawm.
Thaus nwg taug kev moog, nwg qha ntau zaaj txhawb cov ntseeg kws nyob huv tej zej zog huv lub xeev ntawd tug zug, nwg maam le moog txug nraag lub xeev Akhayas.

Nwg nyob huv lub xeev Akhayas tau peb hlis. Thaus nwg taabtom yuav caij nkoj moog rua tim tebchaws Xilias, nwg nov has tas cov Yudais tuavhuv yuav ua phem rua nwg. Ces nwg txawm xaav has tas, nwg yuav rov qaab moog rua peg lub xeev Makedaunias.

Cov tuabneeg kws nrug Paulus moog yog Pilehus tug tub Xaupates, Alitakhus hab Xekudus kws nyob huv lub nroog Thexalaunikes; Nkayus kws nyob huv Denpis; Tikhikus hab Taufimus kws nyob huv xeev Axias; hab Timautes.
Puab cov ntawd xub ua ntej moog nyob nraag lub nroog Rhau-as tog peb.

Thaus peb ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb taag, peb txawm caij nkoj tawm huv lub nroog Filipis moog rua nraag lub nroog Rhau-as. Peb moog tau tsib nub maam le moog txug nraag, hab peb nyob nraag tau rau xyaa nub.
Nub xyaa  thaus tsaus ntuj peb tuaj noj mov ua ke hab ua kevcai noj tug Tswv Rooj Mov. Paulus qha puab txug ib taag mo, rua qhov thaus kaaj ntug nwg yuav ncaim puab moog.
Chaav tsev txheej sau kws peb saablaaj ntawd, puab taws ntau lub teeb.

Mo ntawd muaj ib tug hluas hu ua Etikhus, nwg nyob ntawm lub qhovrais noog Paulus qha. Thaus Paulus tseem taabtom qha, Etikhus tsaug zug heev, nwg txawm looj hlas lawm hab nwg ca le poob ntawm lub qhovrais kws yog txheej tsev peb rua huv aav. Thaus puab nqeg moog muab nwg tsaa hlo, nwg tub tuag lawm,
tabsis thaus Paulus nqeg lug txug, Paulus txawm moog puag nkaus tug hluas ntawd, Paulus has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Mej tsi xob txhawj, nwg tub muaj sa lawm.”
Ces Paulus nce rov moog rua sau tsev hab muab ncuav lug faib rua suavdlawg noj lawv le kevcai noj tug Tswv Rooj Mov. Paulus nrug suavdlawg thaam moog txug kaaj ntug, nwg maam le ncaim puab moog lawm.
Suavdlawg pum tug hluas ntawd tseem muaj sa, puab zoo sab kawg le, puab txawm coj nwg moog tsev.
Peb caij nkoj ua ntej moog nyob nraag lub nroog Axaus tog Paulus. Nwg tub xub has kuas peb moog nyob nraag tog nwg, rua qhov nwg yuav moog kutaw moog rua nraag, nwg maam le nrug peb caij nkoj moog.
Thaus Paulus tuaj txug nraag lub nroog Axaus, peb txhaj coj nwg nrug peb caij nkoj moog rua nraag lub nroog Mitilenes.

Peb caij nkoj tawm huv lub nroog Mitilenes moog ib nub txug ntawm lub koog Povtxwv Khi-aus. Nub tom qaab peb caij nkoj tawm ntawm Khi-aus moog ib nub txug lub koog Povtxwv Xamaus, hab nub tom qaab peb moog txug nraag lub nroog Miletus.

Paulus tub xaav tseg has tas, nwg yuav tsi moog su huv lub nroog Efexus, rua qhov nwg tsi muaj sijhawm su huv xeev Axias, nwg yuav maaj moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, saib moog puas ncaav nub kws suavdlawg ua kevcai Peetekos. Yog le ntawd, peb txhaj caij nkoj dlhau plawg moog tsi su huv lub nroog Efexus.
Thaus Paulus tseem nyob huv lub nroog Miletus, nwg khaiv tuabneeg moog hu cov txwjlaug kws saib cov ntseeg peg lub nroog Efexus kuas tuaj cuag nwg.
Thaus cov txwjlaug tuaj txug lawm, Paulus has rua puab has tas, “Txij thaus kuv tuaj txug huv lub xeev Axias lug txug nub nua, kuv ua kuv lub neej zoo le caag los mej puavleej pum.
Txawm yog cov Yudais pheej tuavhuv ua phem rua kuv kuas kuv raug kev txomnyem los kuv tseem ua sab ntev ua Vaajtswv teg num. Thaus kuv ua teg num ntawd, muaj qee zag lug kuv kua muag kawg le.
Hab mej tub paub has tas, thaus kuv qha mej huv mej tej tsev hab huv tej tsev saablaaj, kuv yeej qha tej zaaj kws yuav paab tau mej xwb, kuv tsi zais ib lus le.
kuv pheej ntuag cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kuas suavdlawg nyag tso nyag tej kev txhum tseg, tig rov lug cuag Vaajtswv hab ntseeg peb tug Tswv Yexus.
Nwgnuav Vaaj Ntsujplig tug dlawbhuv yuav kuas kuv moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees. Thaus kuv moog txug nraag, kuv yuav raug kev txomnyem le caag los kuv tsi paub.
Kuv tsuas paub lawv le Vaaj Ntsujplig qha rua kuv lawm xwb. Nwg qha kuv has tas, kuv yuav raug kaw huv tsev lojcuj hab yuav raug kev txomnyem huv tej nroog kws kuv yuav moog ntawd.

Tabsis kuv yeej tsi suav has tas kuv lub neej tseemceeb dlaabtsi, rua qhov kuv xaav ua teg num kws tug Tswv Yexus muab rua kuv ua kuas tav. Teg num ntawd yog moog qha Txujmoo Zoo rua suavdlawg kuas puab paub has tas, Vaajtswv hlub puab.
“Kuv tub moog txhua qhov qha rua suavdlawg has txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws. Nwgnuav kuv paub has tas, mej txhua tug kws nyob ntawm nuav yuav tsi muaj ib tug rov pum kuv le lawm,
Yog le ntawd, nub nua kuv qha rua mej has tas, yog mej cov leejtwg raug kev puamtsuaj, mej tsi xob lam has tas, kuv tsi qha mej.
Rua qhov kuv tub qha tej kws Vaajtswv xaav kuas mej paub rua mej lawm, kuv tsi tau zais ib qho le.

Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj nyob tsaam mej yuam kev hab mej yuavtsum ua tuab zoo saib paab yaaj kws Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv muab tso rua mej ua tug saib. Mej yuavtsum saib cov ntseeg ntawd ib yaam le tug tswv yaaj saib nwg paab yaaj. Cov ntseeg ntawd yog cov kws Vaajtswv  tug Tub tuag txhwv  lug ua nwg cov lawm.
Kuv paub has tas thaus kuv moog lawm, maa yeej yuav lug rua huv mej cov. Thaus maa lug maa yuav tum txhua tug yaaj huv tuabsi.
Txawm yog huv mej cov los yeej yuav muaj qee leej qha tsi tseeb ntxag cov ntseeg kuas moog ua puab thwjtim.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab ncu ntsoov has tas, kuv tub naj nub naj mo qha mej tau peb xyoos lug lawm. Thaus kuv qha mej ntawd muaj qee zag lug kuv kua muag kawg le.

“Nwgnuav kuv yuav ncaim mej moog, kuv thov Vaajtswv tsomkwm mej, mej yuavtsum khaws Vaajtswv tej lug kws has tas. Vaajtswv hlub mej rua huv mej lub sab. Vaajtswv txujlug ntawd txhaj paab tau kuas mej muab sab rau ntseeg hab yuav pub tej koob moov kws Vaajtswv tub npaaj tseg ca rua cov kws ntseeg nwg lawm rua mej.
Kuv yeej tsi ntshaw leejtwg tej nyaj tej kub lossis tej rig tsho naav lug ua kuv tug.
Mej suavdlawg puavleej paub has tas, kuv hab cov phoojywg kws nrug kuv ua num tau noj tau naav tub yog vim kuv ob txhais teg khwv yug suavdlawg xwb, kuv yeej tsi tau thov leejtwg le.

Txhua yaam num kws kuv ua rua mej pum tub yog kuv ua qha rua mej paub has tas, peb yuavtsum ua num nyaav le ntawd txhaj paab tau cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj zug. Hab peb yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej lug kws tug Tswv Yexus qha has tas, ‘Thaus yug pub rua luas, yug zoo sab heev dlua thaus yug tau luas le.’ ”
Thaus Paulus qha puab taag, Paulus hab cov tuabneeg kws noog nwg qha suavdlawg txhus caug thov Vaajtswv.
Thaus Paulus yuav ncaim puab moog, suavdlawg quaj quaj, hab puab lug puag Paulus xubpwg nwj Paulus.
Puab nyuaj sab kawg le, rua qhov nwg has tas, puab yuav tsi pum nwg lawm, ces puab txawm xaa nwg moog rua nraag lub nkoj.

Thaus peb ncaim puab moog lawm, peb txawm caij nkoj ncaaj nraim moog rua nraag koog Povtxwv Kaus; nub tom qaab peb moog txug nraag koog Povtxwv Laudes, hab tom qaab ntawm peb maam le moog txug lub nroog Patalas.
Peb pum ib lub nkoj yuav moog rua tim lub xeev Faunikias, peb txhaj caij lub nkoj ntawd moog.

Thaus peb moog pum lub koog Povtxwv Xaipas lawm, peb txawm moog saab qaabteb rua tim tebchaws Xilias. Puab yuav thau tej qhov txhua chaw huv lub nkoj rua ntawm lub nroog Tiles, peb txhaj nreg nkoj ntawm lub nroog ntawd.
Thaus peb nrhav tau cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Tiles lawm, peb nrug puab nyob tau xyaa nub. Vaaj Ntsujplig qha rua puab kuas puab tsi xob pub Paulus moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Tabsis thaus dlhau xyaa nub lawm, peb ncaim puab moog. Puab txhua tug hab puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas suavdlawg puavleej xaa peb moog txug nraag ntug havtxwv, peb suavdlawg txhus caug ntawm ntug havtxwv thov Vaajtswv.
Ces peb txawm sis ncaim, thaus peb nce rua huv nkoj, puab txawm rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Peb caij nkoj tawm huv lub nroog Tiles moog kawg kev nkoj rua nraag lub nroog Pataulemais, peb moog saib cov ntseeg huv lub nroog hab nrug puab nyob tau ib nub.

Nub tom qaab peb moog rua nraag lub nroog Xixaleyas. Peb moog su huv Filis kws yog ib tug qha txujmoo zoo lub tsev. Filis yog ib tug ntawm xyaa leej kws cov ntseeg nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees tau xaiv lug ua num.
Filis muaj plaub tug ntxhais tsi tau yuav quasyawg. Puab plaub leeg ntawd puavleej qha Vaajtswv txujlug.
Peb nyob huv Filis tsev tau ob peb nub, muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug hu ua Ankanpus tuaj nraag xeev Yudas tuaj.

Nwg tuaj saib peb, nwg muab Paulus txuj hlaab sa lug khi nwg teg nwg taw, hab nwg has tas, Vaaj Ntsujplig has tas: “Cov Yudais kws nyob nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav muab tug kws sa txuj hlaab nuav khi ib yaam le nuav, hab yuav muab nwg rua lwm tsaav Tuabneeg coj moog tsimtxom.”
Thaus peb nov le ntawd, peb hab cov ntseeg kws nyob ntawd cheem tsi kheev Paulus moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Tabsis Paulus has rua puab has tas, “Mej quaj ua dlaabtsi, mej yuav ua kuas kuv nyuaj sab los? Kuv yeej npaaj txhij lawm, tsi yog cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav muab kuv khi xwb, txawm yog puab yuav muab kuv tua povtseg, vim kuv ua tug Tswv Yexus teg num los kuv yeej yuav moog nraag.”
Peb cheem tsi tau nwg, yog le ntawd peb txawm ca nwg moog, nyob tsaam yog tug Tswv pum zoo.
Thaus ntawd peb txawm sawbsim qhov txhua chaw hab moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees.

Cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Xixaleyas muaj qee leej nrug peb moog hab, thaus peb moog txug, puab coj peb moog su huv  Manaxoos tsev, yaav taag lug Manaxoos nyob peg koog Povtxwv Xaipas hab nwg tub ntseeg Vaajtswv ntev lug lawm.
Thaus peb moog txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov ntseeg zoo sab kawg le.
Nub tom qaab Paulus nrug peb moog saib Yakaunpaus. Cov txwjlaug kws saib cov ntseeg tub tuaj nyob ntawd tog peb lawm.
Thaus Paulus nrug puab thaam, Paulus pav txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv ua, txij thaus Paulus moog qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg rua puab noog.

Thaus puab nov Paulus has le ntawd, puab ua Vaajtswv tsaug. Puab has rua Paulus has tas, “Tijlaug, koj tub paub has tas, cov Yudais muaj ntau txheeb leej lug ntseeg Yexus lawm, puab yog cov kws coj Mauxes txuj kevcai nruj.

Puab nov has tas, koj pheej moog qha cov Yudais kws nyob huv lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg tej tebchaws kuas puab tso Mauxes txuj Kevcai tseg, tsi xob muab tej mivnyuas ua kevcai txav, puab tsi xob ua lawv le cov Yudais txuj kevcai kws suavdlawg ibtxwm coj lug lawm.
Puab suavdlawg yeej yuav nov has tas, koj tuaj txug ntawm nuav lawm. Yog le ntawd, koj yuav ua le caag?
Peb xaav kuas koj ua le nuav. Muaj plaub tug txivneej nyob ntawm nuav, puab tau coglug tseg has tas,

puab yuav ua kevcai ntxuav, koj ca le nrug puab moog hab muab nyaj paab them puab tej nqe, puab txhaj tau chais puab tej plaubhau.  Yog koj ua le ntawd, suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas, koj coj lawv le Mauxes txuj Kevcai, koj tsi tau ua tej kws puab nov ntawd.

Peb tub sau ib tsaab ntawv rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kws ntseeg Vaajtswv lawm has tas, peb suavdlawg pum zoo kuas puab tsi xob noj tej qhov txhua chaw kws muab fij rua dlaab, tsi xob noj ntshaav, tsi xob noj tej nqaj tsaj kws hlua zawm cejdlaab tuag, hab tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg.”

Yog le ntawd, Paulus coj plaub tug txivneej ntawd moog, hab nub tom qaab nwg nrug puab ua kevcai ntxuav. Paulus moog qha rua tug povthawj kws saib lub Tuamtsev paub has tas, thaus twg puab maam le ua kevcai ntxuav tav. Nub kws puab ua kevcai ntxuav tav yog nub kws puab nqaa khoom tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv lawv le puab tub coglug tseg lawm has tas, puab yuav ua le ntawd.

Thaus yuav dlhau xyaa nub kws puab ua kevcai ntxuav ntawd, cov Yudais kws tuaj peg lub xeev Axias tuaj, muaj qee leej pum Paulus nyob huv lub Tuamtsev. Ces puab txawm ntxag kuas cov pejxeem ntxhuv hab puab txawm nteg Paulus.

Puab qw nrov nrov has tas, “Cov Yixalayees! Mej ca le lug paab peb! Tug nuav yog tug kws pheej moog qha txhua qhov kuas suavdlawg ntxub cov Yixalayees, saib tsi taug Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab lub Tuamtsev nuav. Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, nwg tseem coj lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab ua rua lub Tuamtsev tsi huv lawm.”

(Puab has le ntawd, rua qhov puab pum Taufimus kws tuaj peg lub nroog Efexus tuaj, nrug Paulus nyob ua ke huv lub nroog, puab txhaj xaav has tas, Paulus yeej coj Taufimus moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev lawm.)

Tej lug kws puab has ntawd ua rua cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog ntxhuv. Ces puab txawm dlha zum zawg tuaj nteg Paulus hab muab nwg caab tawm huv lub Tuamtsev moog. Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj ib tug lug muab lub Tuamtsev tej qhovrooj kaw kag lawm.

Thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd taabtom yuav muab Paulus tua povtseg, txawm muaj ib tug moog qha rua tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb kws saib cov tubrog Loos has tas, cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav suavdlawg ntxhuv heev lawm.

Thaus tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb nov le ntawd, nwg txawm coj cov thawj tubrog pawg pua hab ib paab tubrog nrug nwg moog saib yog ua caag cov pejxeem txhaj ntxhuv le ntawd. Thaus cov pejxeem pum tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb coj tubrog dlha tuaj, ces puab txawm tsi ntaus Paulus lawm.

Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb tuaj txug ndlua ntawm Paulus, nwg tuav nkaus Paulus hab has kuas cov tubrog muab ob txuj saw hlau lug khi Paulus. Tug thawj tubrog txawm nug has tas, “Tug nuav yog leejtwg, hab nwg ua txhum dlaabtsi?”

Cov tuabneeg ntawd puab nyag has nyag lawm ib yaam tsi sis thooj. Ces tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb paub tsi tseeb has tas yog vim le caag, nwg txhaj kuas cov tubrog coj Paulus moog rua huv cov tubrog lub yeej.
Thaus puab moog txug ntawm tug ntaiv, cov tubrog txawm muab Paulus nqaa, rua qhov cov pejxeem ua nruj ua tsiv heev rua Paulus.
Cov pejxeem lawv Paulus qaab hab qw ntsoog qeeg has tas, “Ca le coj nwg moog tua povtseg.”

Thaus cov tubrog taabtom coj Paulus moog rua huv lub tsev, Paulus txawm has rua tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb has tas, “Thov ca kuv has ib lus rua koj puas tau?” Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb teb has tas, “Koj paub lug Kilis hab los?
Koj tsi yog tug tuabneeg Iziv kws yaav taag lug tawmtsaam numtswv hab coj plaub txheeb leej kws tua tuabneeg nrug nwg moog rua tom roob mojsaab qhua los?”

Paulus teb has tas, “Kuv yog tuabneeg Yudais, kuv yug huv lub nroog Talaxus kws nyob peg tebchaws Kilikias. Kuv yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Talaxus ntaag. Lub nroog ntawd yog ib lub nroog tseemceeb. Thov koj ca kuv has rua cov pejxeem ntawd mivntsiv.”

Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb txhaj ca Paulus has. Paulus txawm sawv ntsug ntawm tug ntaiv cu teg rua suavdlawg kuas nyob tuabywv. Thaus suavdlawg nyob tuabywv lawm, Paulus txawm ua lug Henplais qha rua puab has tas,
“Mej cov kws ua nam ua txiv hab ua kwv ua tij suavdlawg, mej ca le noog kuv yuav has dlaws kuv zaaj!”
Thaus suavdlawg nov Paulus ua lug Henplais has, puab txawm nyob tuabywv noog. Paulus has tas:

“Kuv yog tuabneeg Yudais, kuv yug huv lub nroog Talaxus kws nyob tim tebchaws Kilikias, tabsis kuv lug luj hlub nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav. Nkamaliyees yog tug xwbfwb qha ntawv rua kuv ntaag. Kuv tau kawm peb cov yawmkoob txuj kevcai huv tuabsi lawm. Hab kuv muab sab rau ua Vaajtswv teg num ib yaam le naj nub nua mej pum kuv ua.
Yaav taag lug kuv yog ib tug kws tau tsimtxom cov ntseeg. Muaj qee leej kuv muab tsimtxom tuag lawm. Kuv nteg cov ntseeg, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej coj moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.

Tug Povthawj Hlub hab cov Yudais tej numtswv puavleej paub has tas, kuv has tseeb xwb. Puab ua ntawv rua kuv nqaa moog rua cov kwvtij Yudais kws nyob peg lub nroog Damaxes, thaus ntawd kuv moog nteg cov ntseeg kws nyob peg khi hab caab lug rau txim rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav.
“Thaus yuav laug taav su kws kuv taabtom taug kev moog yuav txug peg lub nroog Damaxes, txawm muaj dluab tshaav ntuj ci nplaag sau ntuj tuaj rua kuv.
Kuv txawm qaug ntawg rua huv aav, kuv nov ib lub suab has rua kuv tas, ‘Xaulus, Xaulus! Ua le caag koj tsimtxom kuv?’
Kuv nug nwg has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, koj yog leejtwg?’ Nwg teb kuv has tas, ‘Kuv yog Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales kws koj tsimtxom ntaag.’
Cov txivneej kws nrug kuv moog puavleej pum tug dluab tshaav ntuj kws ci tuaj rua kuv, tabsis puab tsi nov lub suab kws has rua kuv.

Kuv nug has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, yog le ntawd kuv yuav ua le caag?’ Tug Tswv txawm has rua kuv has tas, ‘Koj ca le sawv moog rua huv lub nroog Damaxes. Thaus koj moog txug tod, yuav muaj tuabneeg qha rua koj paub txhua yaam kws Vaajtswv yuav kuas koj ua.’
Tug dluab tshaav ntuj kws ci ci ntawd ua rua kuv ob lub qhovmuag tsi pum kev lawm. Ces cov txivneej kws nrug kuv moog ntawd txhaj le tuav kuv teg moog rua huv lub nroog Damaxes.
“Nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Ananias kws coj Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nruj, cov tuabneeg Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes puavleej fwm nwg.

Nwg tuaj saib kuv, nwg lug sawv ntawm kuv ib saab hab nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Nyuas kwv Xaulus, koj ca le rov pum kev!’ Taamsim ntawd kuv ob lub qhovmuag txawm rov pum kev, hab kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib nwg.

Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tub xaiv koj lug ua teg num kws Vaajtswv xaav kuas koj ua, hab kuas koj pum Vaajtswv tug Tubkhai kws ncaaj nceeg, hab nov lub suab kws nwg has rua koj.
Rua qhov koj yuav ua timkhawv qha nwg zaaj kws koj pum hab koj nov lawm rua suavdlawg paub.
Nwgnuav koj tseem yuav tog ua dlaabtsi? Koj ca le sawv tseeg ua kevcai raus dlej, hab tuav tug Tswv lub npe thov, nwg txhaj yuav zaam koj tej kev txhum.’
“Thaus kuv rov lug txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav, kuv taabtom thov Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev,

kuv ua ywgtoog pum tug Tswv lug has rua kuv has tas, ‘Nwgnuav koj ca le tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees nuav moog, rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav, puab yuav tsi noog tej lug kws koj ua timkhawv txug kuv zaaj.’

Thaus kuv nov tug Tswv has le ntawd, kuv has rua nwg has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, suavdlawg puavleej paub has tas, kuv yog tug kws pheej moog nteg cov ntseeg koj txhua qhov huv tej tsev saablaaj. Kuv muab puab ntaus hab muab puab caab moog kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.

Thaus cov tuabneeg kws ntxub Xatefanaus, muab Xatefanaus tug kws ua timkhawv txug koj zaaj tua povtseg, kuv nyob ntawd hab; kuv nrug puab pum zoo muab nwg tua povtseg. Hab cov tuabneeg kws tua Xatefanaus, puab hle puab tej tsho ca rua kuv zuv.’
Tug Tswv has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj ca le moog, kuv yuav khaiv koj moog dleb heev, moog qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg.’ ”

Cov tuabneeg ntawd noog Paulus qha lug txug thaus Paulus has tas, Vaajtswv yuav khaiv nwg moog qha lwm tsaav Tuabneeg, puab txawm qw nrov nrov has tas, “Tug tuabneeg zoo le nuav, tsi tsimnyog ca nwg ua neej nyob, ca le muab nwg tua! Ca le muab nwg tua povtseg!”
Cov tuabneeg ntawd chim heev, puab txhaj qw nrov nrov hab hle puab tej tsho pov zum zawg rua nuav rua u, hab tsuab moov aav w rua sau nruab ntug.

Thaus tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb pum le ntawd, nwg txawm kuas nwg cov tubrog coj Paulus moog huv lub yeej hab kuas puab muab Paulus nplawm, hab nug Paulus saib yog vim le caag cov Yudais pheej yuav qw tawmtsaam Paulus heev ua luaj le?

Tabsis thaus cov tubrog taabtom muab hlua khi Paulus yuav muab Paulus nplawm, Paulus has rua tug thawj tubrog pawg pua kws sawv ze ntawm Paulus has tas, “Thaus mej tseem tsi tau taug ib tug tuabneeg Loos zaaj, mej ca le muab nwg nplawm, puas lawv le txuj kevcai hab?”

Thaus tug thawj tubrog pawg pua nov Paulus has le ntawd, nwg moog qha rua tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb has tas, “Ua le caag koj kuas peb muab tug txivneej ntawd nplawm? Nwg tub yog tuabneeg Loos hab los sav.”
Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb lug nug Paulus has tas, “Koj ca le qha kuv saib, koj yog tuabneeg Loos hab los?” Paulus teb has tas, “Kuv yeej yog tag.”

Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb txawm has tas, “Kuv yog tuabneeg Loos hab, tabsis kuv them nyaj ntau heev, kuv txhaj tau lug ua tuabneeg Loos.” Paulus teb has tas, “Koj them nyaj ntau, koj txhaj tau lug ua, tabsis thaus kuv yug lug, kuv yeej yog tuabneeg Loos lawm.”

Thaus cov tuabneeg kws yuav taug Paulus zaaj nov le ntawd, puab txawm txaav ntawm Paulus moog dleb zuj zug lawm. Thaus tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb nov Paulus has tas, Paulus yog tuabneeg Loos, tug thawj tubrog ntawd ntshai heev, rua qhov nwg muab Paulus khi lawm.

Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb xaav paub tseeb has tas, tej lug kws cov Yudais nkaug Paulus ntawd yog le caag tag. Nub tom qaab tug thawj tubrog txawm kuas cov tubrog muab txuj saw hlau kws khi Paulus dlaws, nwg kuas cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov numtswv suavdlawg tuaj ua ke. Thaus suavdlawg tuaj txhij lawm, nwg txawm coj Paulus lug sawv taabmeeg suavdlawg.
Paulus tsaa qhovmuag saib cov Yudais tej numtswv hab has rua puab has tas, “Cov kwvtij, kuv lub sab yeej paub has tas, kuv ua kuv lub neej zoo taabmeeg Vaajtswv lug txug naj nub nua.”
Thaus tug Povthawj Hlub Ananias nov Paulus has le ntawd, nwg kuas cov tuabneeg kws sawv ze ntawm Paulus, ntaus Paulus qhovncauj.

Paulus has rua Ananias has tas, “Tug nam tuabneeg ntsejmuag ncaaj sab nkhaus, Vaajtswv yuav ntaus koj. Ua le caag koj tseem yuav muaj plhus tuaj nyob ntawm ko txav txim rua kuv lawv le Mauxes txuj Kevcai? Qhov kws koj kuas puab ntaus kuv, koj tub ua txhum Mauxes txuj Kevcai lawm los sav!”
Cov tuabneeg kws sawv ze Paulus has rua Paulus has tas, “Koj tseem yuav saib tsi taug tug Povthawj Hlub kws ua Vaajtswv teg num hab los?”

Paulus teb puab has tas, “Cov kwvtij, kuv tsi paub has tas nwg yog tug Povthawj Hlub, yog kuv paub ces kuv yuav tsi has le ntawd, rua qhov Vaajtswv txujlug sau tseg has tas, ‘Mej tsi xob thuam tug kws saib mej.’ ”

Thaus Paulus pum has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tuaj saablaaj ntawd muaj ibtxha yog cov Xadukais hab ibtxha yog cov Falixais, ces Paulus txawm has nrov nrov rua suavdlawg has tas, “Cov kwvtij, kuv yog ib tug Falixais, kuv txiv yog ib tug Falixais hab. Qhov kws puab coj kuv tuaj rua mej taug kuv zaaj, tub yog vim kuv ca sab has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm yuav muaj sa sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.”
Thaus Paulus has le ntawd taag, cov Falixais hab cov Xadukais txawm sis caav heev hab puab tsi sis hum lawm.

(Rua qhov cov Xadukais tsi ntseeg has tas, tuabneeg yuav sawv tau huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, hab tsi ntseeg has tas muaj cov timtswv ceebtsheej lossis muaj ntsujplig; tabsis cov Falixais ntseeg has tas muaj peb yaam ntawd huv tuabsi.)

Suavdlawg yimfuab sis caav heev dlua, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai kws yog cov Falixais paab muaj qee leej txawm sawv tseeg hab tshev has tas, “Peb tsi pum tug txivneej nuav ua ib qhov txhum le! Tej zag yog ntsujplig lossis timtswv ceebtsheej lug has rua nwg tag!”

Thaus tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb pum suavdlawg sis caav heev, nwg ntshai nyob tsaam puab muab Paulus chua ndluag ua ob peb ceg, nwg txhaj kuas nwg cov tubrog coj Paulus tawm huv cov tuabneeg ntawd moog rua huv lub yeej.

Mo ntawd tug Tswv lug sawv ntawm Paulus ib saab hab has rua Paulus has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai! Koj tub ua timkhawv qha kuv zaaj huv lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm, koj yuavtsum ua ib yaam le ntawd tim lub nroog Loos hab.”
Thaus kaaj ntug cov Yudais txawm tuaj ua ke saablaaj. Puab coglug has tas, puab yuav tsi noj tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi moog txug thaus puab tua tau Paulus tsaiv.
Cov tuabneeg kws tuavhuv ntawd muaj plaub caug tawm leej.
Ces puab txawm moog cuag cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov txwjlaug, puab has tas, “Peb tub coglug lawm has tas peb yuav tsi noj tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi moog txug thaus peb tua tau Paulus tsaiv.

Yog le ntawd, mej hab cov Yudais tej numtswv ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua cov tuabneeg Loos tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb kuas coj Paulus tuaj cuag peb. Mej ua txuj has rua nwg has tas, mej xaav taug Paulus zaaj kuas paub tseeb dlua thawj zag. Yog mej ua le ntawd peb yuav moog tog kev tua Paulus povtseg thaus nwg tseem tuaj tsi tau txug ntawm nuav.”
Tabsis Paulus tug muam tug tub nov puab tuavhuv yuav muab Paulus tua povtseg, nwg txawm moog rua huv cov tubrog lub yeej hab qha qhov kws nwg nov ntawd rua Paulus paub.
Paulus txawm hu ib tug thawj tubrog pawg pua lug cuag nwg hab has tas, “Thov koj coj tug tub hluas nuav moog cuag tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb, nwg muaj lug yuav has rua tug thawj tubrog ntawd noog.”

Tug thawj tubrog pawg pua txawm coj tug tub hluas ntawd moog cuag tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb hab has tas, “Tug Paulus kws raug txim ntawd thov kuv coj tug tub hluas nuav tuaj cuag koj, tug tub hluas nuav muaj lug yuav has rua koj noog.”
Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb tuav tug tub hluas ntawd teg coj moog rua ib caag hab nug has tas, “Koj muaj lug dlaabtsi yuav has rua kuv?”

Tug tub hluas ntawd teb has tas, “Cov Yudais tej numtswv tub saablaaj hum lawm has tas, pigkig puab yuav tuaj thov koj coj Paulus moog cuag cov Yudais tej numtswv, puab yuav ua txuj has tas, ‘Cov Yudais tej numtswv xaav taug Paulus zaaj kuas paub tseeb dlua thawj zag.’

Tabsis koj tsi xob noog puab has, rua qhov tub muaj plaub caug tawm leej taabtom tog kev yuav tua Paulus. Cov tuabneeg ntawd tub coglug tseg lawm has tas, puab yuav tsi noj tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi moog txug thaus puab tua tau Paulus tsaiv. Puab tub npaaj txhij lawm, tabsis puab tseem tog saib koj yuav has le caag xwb.”
Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb txawm has rua tug tub hluas ntawd has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog tsev, hab koj tsi xob qha qhov kws koj tuaj has rua kuv nuav rua leejtwg le.”

Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb hu nwg ob tug thawj tubrog pawg pua lug cuag nwg hab has tas, “Meb ca le moog txhij ob puas leej tubrog, txhij cov tubrog caij neeg xyaa caum leej, hab cov tubrog nkaug muv ob puas leej, thaus cuaj teev tsaus ntuj, mej moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas.
Mej nrhav neeg rua Paulus caij, mej yuavtsum saib nwg zoo zoo, hab xaa nwg moog kuas txug Felis kws yog tug tswvxeev.”
Tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb sau ib tsaab ntawv xaa moog rua Felis. Tsaab ntawv ntawd nwg sau has le nuav:
“Hawm txug tug Tswvxeev Felis, kuv yog Kelaudi-us Lixias. Kuv sau tsaab ntawv nuav tuaj qha rua koj paub has tas,
cov Yudais tau nteg tug txivneej nuav, puab tub yuav muab nwg tua povtseg. Kuv nov has tas, nwg yog tuabneeg Loos, kuv txhaj coj kuv cov tubrog moog paab nwg.
Kuv xaav paub tseeb has tas tej lug kws cov Yudais nkaug nwg yog le caag tag, kuv txhaj coj nwg moog cuag cov Yudais tej numtswv.

Thaus peb taug nwg zaaj, kuv pum has tas tej lug kws puab nkaug nwg, puab has txug qhov kws nwg ua txhum cov Yudais txuj kevcai xwb. Kuv tsi pum nwg ua ib qhov txhum kws yuav tsimnyog muab nwg tua povtseg lossis muab nwg kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.

Thaus kuv nov has tas cov Yudais tuavhuv yuav tog kev muab nwg tua povtseg, kuv txhaj xaa nwg tuaj cuag koj. Kuv has rua cov tuabneeg kws nkaug nwg has tas, kuas puab ca le tuaj has tim ntsej tim muag ntawm koj.”
Cov tubrog ntawd moog ua lawv le tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb has. Mo ntawd puab coj Paulus moog txug peg lub nroog Aatipatis.
Nub tom qaab cov tubrog kws moog kutaw, puab txawm rov qaab moog rua nraag puab lub yeej lawm, tsuas tseg cov tubrog kws caij neeg xaa Paulus moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas xwb.
Thaus puab moog txug huv lub nroog Xixaleyas lawm, puab muab tsaab ntawv kws Kelaudi-us Lixias sau rua tug Tswvxeev hab muab Paulus cob rua nwg.
Thaus tug Tswvxeev nyeem tsaab ntawv ntawd taag, nwg nug Paulus has tas, “Koj nyob lub tebchaws twg tuaj?” Thaus tug Tswvxeev paub has tas, Paulus tuaj peg tebchaws Kilikias tuaj,
tug Tswvxeev has rua Paulus has tas, “Tog cov tuabneeg kws nkaug koj tuaj txug tsaiv, kuv maam le noog koj has.” Tug tswvxeev kuas cov tubrog zuv Paulus zoo zoo huv Vaajntxwv Helauj lub loog.

Tau tsib nub tom qaab Ananias kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub, ob peb tug txwjlaug hab ib tug txivneej kws txawj txheem plaub hu ua Tetulus, puab moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas. Thaus puab moog txug lawm, puab txawm nkaug Paulus rua Felis kws yog tug Tswvxeev.

Thaus puab hu Paulus lug, Tetulus txawm nkaug Paulus rua Felis noog has tas, “Koj ua peb nam peb txiv! Naj nub nua peb muaj noj muaj haus, nyob kaaj sab lug hab peb lub tebchaws txhua qhov muaj kev vaammeej los tub yog vim muaj koj saib.
Txhua yaam kws koj tau paab peb lawm, peb yeej ncu ntsoov koj txaj ntsig moog le.
Ntshai yuav taabkaum koj, tabsis kuv thov koj ua sab ntev, peb muaj lu puav lug yuav has rua koj noog.
Peb pum has tas, tug txivneej nuav pheej ua rua cov Yudais kws nyob thoob plawg qaab ntuj ntxhuv, hab nwg yog tug thawjcoj ntawm cov Naxalenes paab.
Tsi yog le ntawd xwb, nwg tseem ua saib tsi taug lub Tuamtsev hab, peb txhaj nteg nwg. (Peb yeej yuav txav txim rua nwg lawv le peb txuj kevcai.
Tabsis tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb kws yog Lixias txawm tuaj txeeb Paulus ntawm peb teg moog lawm.

Lixias has rua cov tuabneeg kws nkaug Paulus kuas tuaj has tim ntsej tim muag taabmeeg koj.) Yog koj ua tuab zoo taug tug txivneej nuav zaaj zoo zoo, koj yuav paub has tas, yeej yuav muaj lawv le tej lug kws peb has.”
Cov Yudais kws nyob ntawd has zum zawg has tas, “Tej kws Tetulus has yeej muaj tseeb tag.”

Thaus tug tswvxeev kuas Paulus has dlaws Paulus zaaj, Paulus has tas, “Kuv paub has tas koj yog tug txav txim rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav tau ntau xyoo lug lawm, kuv txhaj txaus sab has dlaws kuv zaaj rua koj noog.
Yog koj ua tuab zoo saib, koj yeej yuav paub has tas, txij nub kws kuv moog pehawm Vaajtswv nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees lug txug nub nua, tub tsi tau dlhau kaum ob nub.
Cov Yudais yeej tsi tau pum kuv nrug leejtwg sis caav huv lub Tuamtsev le. Puab tub tsi pum kuv ua rua cov pejxeem ntxhuv huv puab tej tsev saablaaj lossis huv lub nroog qhov twg le.
Tej lug kws puab nkaug kuv, puab nrhav tsi tau ib lus tseeb kws qha has tas kuv tau ua txhum.

Txawm yog tsi muaj ib lus tseeb los kuv thov leeg ib qho rua koj has tas, kuv yeej coj lawv le txuj Kevcai Tshab kws puab has tas tsi tseemceeb. Tabsis txuj kevcai ntawd yeej yog Vaajtswv txuj kws peb cov yawmkoob yeej ibtxwm coj thaus u lug lawm. Kuv ntseeg txhua lu kws sau tseg rua huv Mauxes txuj Kevcai hab huv tej ntawv kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau sau tseg lawm huv tuabsi.
Kuv hab puab puavleej ca sab ib yaam nkaus has tas, Vaajtswv yuav tsaa cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm txhua tug sawv rov qaab lug, tsi has cov tuabneeg ua phem lossis cov tuabneeg ua zoo.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj muab sab rau ua kuas hum Vaajtswv sab hab hum tuabneeg sab.

“Kuv tub tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalees moog nyob lwm qhov tau ntau xyoo lawm, kuv txhaj rov qaab moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab coj mivntsiv nyaj moog pub rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua Vaajtswv.

Thaus kuv ua kevcai ntxuav taag, kuv taabtom muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev, ces puab txawm tuaj pum kuv. Thaus ntawd tsi muaj tuabneeg coob nrug kuv nyob ua ke hab tsi muaj kev ntxhuv dlaabtsi le.
Tabsis cov Yudais kws tuaj peg lub xeev Axias tuaj, muaj qee leej nyob ntawd hab. Yog puab pum has tas, thaus ntawd kuv ua txhum, tsimnyog puab tuaj nkaug kuv rua koj ntawm nuav,
lossis kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawm nuav has saib, thaus kuv qha kuv zaaj rua cov Yudais tej numtswv noog, cov kws nkaug kuv nuav, puab tsua pum kuv ua txhum dlaabtsi.

Tsuas tshwj thaus kuv sawv taabmeeg puab, kuv has ib lus le nuav xwb: ‘Nub nua mej txav txim rua kuv tub yog vim kuv ntseeg has tas cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm, yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.’ ”

Felis yeej kawm paub txuj Kevcai Tshab lug lawm. Thaus nwg nov Paulus has le ntawd, nwg txawm kuas suavdlawg tso tseg. Nwg has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Tog Lixias kws yog tug thawj tubrog pawg txheeb tuaj txug tsaiv, kuv maam le rov has mej rooj plaub nuav dlua.”
Felis kuas tug thawj tubrog pawg pua zuv Paulus hab has tas, tsi xob muab Paulus khi, ca nwg cov phoojywg tuaj saib nwg hab tu nwg.

Tom qaab ntawd ob peb nub, Felis hab Deluxilas kws yog Felis tug quaspuj tuaj, Felis tug quaspuj yog tuabneeg Yudais, nwg kuas puab coj Paulus lug ntsib obtug, hab kuas Paulus qha txug kev ntseeg Yexus rua puab noog.

Tabsis thaus Paulus qha txujkev ncaaj nceeg, kev tswj yug lub sab hab txujkev txav txim kws yaav pegsuab rua obtug noog, Felis ntshai, nwg txawm has rua Paulus has tas, “Koj ca le rov moog, lwm nub kuv khoom tsaiv kuv maam le rov hu koj tuaj dlua.”
Tabsis Felis xaav has tas, Paulus yuav muab nyaj rua nwg, nwg txhaj pheej hu Paulus moog nrug nwg thaam ob peb zag.
Tom qaab ntawd ob xyoos, Pauleki-us Fexatus lug ua tug tswvxeev hloov Felis chaw. Felis xaav kuas cov Yudais nyam Felis, Felis txhaj ca Paulus nwg nyob nwg huv tsev lojcuj.
Thaus Fexatus lug ua tswvxeev tau peb nub lawm, nwg tawm huv lub nroog Xixaleyas moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees,
thaus nwg moog txug nraag, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov Yudais tej thawjcoj txawm tuaj nkaug Paulus rua Fexatus.
Puab thov Fexatus hu kuas Paulus tuaj rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Puab thov le ntawd, rua qhov puab tub tuavhuv tseg lawm has tas, puab yuav tog kev muab Paulus tua povtseg.
Fexatus teb has tas, Paulus tseem raug kaw peg lub nroog Xixaleyas. Tsi ntev nuav kuv yuav rov qaab moog peg,
yog mej pum Paulus ua txhum dlaabtsi, mej cov kws ua thawj ca le nrug kuv moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas, mej maam le sis has peg.

Fexatus tseem nrug puab nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kwvlaam le kaum nub, nwg maam le rov qaab moog rua peg lub nroog Xixaleyas. Thaus nwg moog txug peg lawm, nub tom qaab nwg moog rua huv lub tsev has plaub, ces nwg txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog coj Paulus lug cuag nwg.
Thaus Paulus lug txug, cov Yudais kws tuaj nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj, txawm lug sawv vij Paulus hab nkaug Paulus ntau yaam rua Fexatus, tabsis puab tsi muaj timkhawv le.
Ces Paulus txawm has dlaws Paulus zaaj has tas, “Kuv yeej tsi tau ua txhum cov Yudais txuj kevcai hab tsi tau ua saib tsi taug lub Tuamtsev lossis ua txhum Fuabtais Xixas le.”
Tabsis Fexatus xaav kuas cov Yudais nyam Fexatus, ces nwg txawm nug Paulus has tas, “Koj puas xaav moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, ca kuv maam le moog has mej rooj plaub nraag?”

Paulus teb has tas, “Kuv tub nyob huv Fuabtais Xixas lub tsev has plaub nuav lawm, yog le ntawd tub tsimnyog koj txav txim rua kuv ntawm nuav. Koj yeej paub has tas, kuv tsi tau ua txhum rua cov Yudais.

Yog kuv tau ua txhum kevcai lossis ua ib yaam dlaabtsi kws tsimnyog muab kuv tua povtseg, kuv yeej tsi tawv tsi nyom le. Tabsis yog tej lug kws puab nkaug kuv ntawd tsi muaj tseeb, leejtwg tseem yuav muaj cuabkaav muab kuv rua puab? Kuv thov moog has tim Fuabtais Xixas.”

Thaus Fexatus nov Paulus has le ntawd, nwg txawm nrug nwg cov tuavxaam saablaaj. Thaus puab saablaaj taag, nwg has rua Paulus has tas, “Koj tub thov moog has tim Fuabtais Xixas lawm, yog le ntawd koj yuav tau moog cuag Xixas xwb.”
Tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev Vaajntxwv Akipas hab Vaajntxwv tug muam kws hu ua Npelanikes tuaj saib Fexatus huv lub nroog Xixaleyas.

Obtug tuaj nyob tau ntau nub, Fexatus txawm pav Paulus rooj plaub rua Vaajntxwv Akipas noog has tas, “Lub sijhawm kws Felis ua tug tswvxeev kaav lub xeev nuav, nwg tau muab ib tug txivneej kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj, nwgnuav tug txivneej ntawd tseem nyob huv tsev lojcuj;
hab thaus kuv moog rua nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov txwjlaug txawm tuaj nkaug tug txivneej ntawd rua kuv hab thov kuas kuv txav txim rua nwg.
Tabsis kuv has rua puab has tas, lawv le cov Loos txuj kevcai, ob tog yuavtsum tuaj sis has tim ncauj tim lug hab ca tug pemkom has dlaws nwg zaaj taag tsaiv, maam le txav txim rua tug kws ua txhum.
Thaus puab tuaj txhij lawm, nub tom qaab kuv moog nyob huv lub tsev has plaub, hab hu tug txivneej ntawd lug cuag kuv.
Thaus cov yeejkom sawv lug has, puab tsi nkaug tej kws nwg ua txhum lawv le kuv xaav.
Puab tsuas sis caav has txug puab tej kevcai xwb, hab puab has txug ib tug txivneej kws hu ua Yexus, nwg tub tuag lawm, tabsis Paulus has tas tug txiv neeg ntawd tseem muaj sa nyob.
Thaus ntawd kuv tsi paub yuav taug le caag txhaj paub zaaj nuav tseeb, kuv txhaj nug Paulus saib, nwg puas kaam moog nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv maam le has nwg rooj plaub nraag.

Tabsis Paulus thov kuas kuv ca nwg nyob nwg huv lub tsev lojcuj, hab ca Fuabtais Xixas maam le txav txim rua nwg. Kuv txhaj ca nwg nyob nwg huv tsev lojcuj moog txug nub kws kuv xaa nwg moog cuag Fuabtais Xixas.”
Vaajntxwv Akipas has rua Fexatus has tas, “Kuv xaav noog tug txivneej ntawd has.” Ces Fexatus txawm teb has tas, “Pigkig, kuv yuav kuas tug txivneej ntawd lug has rua koj noog.”

Nub tom qaab cov thawj tubrog hab cov numtswv huv lub nroog nrug vaajntxwv hab Npelanikes moog rua huv chaav tsev has plaub. Thaus Vaajntxwv Akipas moog txug huv chaav tsev has plaub lawm, Fexatus khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Paulus lug cuag vaajntxwv.

Thaus Paulus lug txug, Fexatus has rua vaajntxwv has tas, “Vaajntxwv Akipas hab mej txhua tug kws nyob ntawm nuav: mej suavdlawg puavleej pum tug txivneej nuav, nwg yog tug kws cov Yudais kws nyob huv lub nroog nuav hab cov kws nyob nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees, pheej tuaj kuas kuv muab nwg tua povtseg.

Tabsis kuv tub nug nwg taag lawm, kuv tsi pum nwg ua ib qhov txhum kws yuav txaus muab nwg tua povtseg. Yog le ntawd thaus nwg thov moog has tim Fuabtais Xixas, kuv txhaj has rua nwg has tas, kuv yuav xaa nwg moog.

Vaajntxwv Akipas, kuv has rua koj has tas, yeej tsi muaj ib qhov tseemceeb kws yuav zoo sau tug txivneej nuav zaaj moog qha rua Fuabtais Xixas paub. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj coj nwg tuaj cuag suavdlawg, tabsis qhov tseeb yeej yog kuv coj nwg tuaj cuag koj kuas koj taug nwg zaaj, kuv txhaj muaj lug sau xaa moog rua Fuabtais Xixas.
Kuv xaav has tas, yog tsi muaj ib qhov tseemceeb kws zoo sau qha has tas tug kws raug txim ua txhum dlaabtsi, yeej tsi zoo xaa tug ntawd moog cuag Fuabtais Xixas.”
Vaajntxwv Akipas has rua Paulus has tas, “Kuv ca koj has dlaws koj zaaj.” Paulus xyaab hlo teg hab has dlaws nwg zaaj le nuav:
“Vaajntxwv Akipas, kuv zoo sab kawg le, nub nua kuv tau lug sawv ntawm koj xubndlag has dlaws txhua zaaj kws cov Yudais nkaug kuv has tas kuv ua txhum rua koj noog,
rua qhov koj yeej paub cov Yudais tej kevcai hab tej kws peb cov Yudais has tsi sis hum lawm. Yog le ntawd, thov koj ua sab ntev noog kuv has.

“Txij thaus kuv yau lug txug naj nub nua, kuv lub neej zoo le caag los cov Yudais puavleej paub huv tuabsi. Kuv yeej nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob hlub huv kuv lub tebchaws hab huv lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Puab yeej ibtxwm paub kuv thaus u lug lawm. Yog puab kaam ua timkhawv, puab yeej ua tau timkhawv has tas, kuv yog ib tug kws yog cov Falixais paab kws coj nruj.
Nwgnuav kuv tuaj sawv ntawm nuav tub yog vim kuv ca sab rua tej kws Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.
