Peb cov Yudais kaum ob xeem puavleej muab sab rau naj nub naj mo ua lawv le Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai. Peb ca sab has tas, peb yuav tau lawv le tej lug kws Vaajtswv cog tseg ntawd. Vaajntxwv, tub yog vim kuv ca sab le nuav, cov Yudais txhaj has tas kuv ua txhum!
Ua le caag mej cov kws yog tuabneeg Yudais ib yaam le kuv, mej pheej tsi ntseeg has tas, Vaajtswv tsaa tau cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug?
“Yaav taag lug lawm, kuv yeej xaav has tas, kuv yuav ua txhua yaam tawmtsaam Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales.

Kuv txhaj ua le ntawd nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees. Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj tso cai rua kuv moog nteg cov ntseeg Vaajtswv coj lug kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj. Thaus cov thawj txav txim has tas yuav muab cov ntseeg ntawd coj moog tua povtseg, kuv pum zoo le ntawd hab.

Muaj ntau zag kuv moog nteg cov ntseeg huv tej tsev saablaaj lug rau txim hab yuam kuas puab tso puab tej kev ntseeg tseg. Kuv ntxub puab kawg le, kuv txhaj moog tsimtxom cov ntseeg kws nyob huv lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg tej tebchaws hab.
“Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj thov cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj ua ntawv tso cai rua kuv moog tsimtxom cov ntseeg peg lub nroog Damaxes.
Vaajntxwv, thaus taav su kws kuv taug kev moog, kuv pum dluab ci nplaag sau ntuj tuaj, ci tshaaj lub nub tuaj rua kuv hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug kuv moog ntawd.

Peb txawm qaug taag rua huv aav, kuv nov ib lub suab ua lug Henplais has rua kuv has tas, ‘Xaulus, Xaulus! Ua le caag koj tsimtxom kuv? Yog koj tawmtsaam kuv, yuav mob koj ib yaam le tug nyuj kws tuam nwg tug tswv tug paas, ces yeej yuav mob nyuj nqaj xwb.’
Kuv nug has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, koj yog leejtwg?’ Tug Tswv teb has tas, ‘Kuv yog Yexus tug kws koj tsimtxom ntaag.

Koj ca le sawv, qhov kws kuv lug tshwm rua koj pum nuav, yog kuv lug tsaa koj ua kuv tug tubkhai. Koj moog qha qhov kws nub nua koj pum kuv  hab kuv yuav ua rua koj pum yaav tom ntej rua suavdlawg paub.
Kuv yuav khaiv koj moog qha cov Yixalayees hab lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg, kuv yuav tsomkwm koj, tsi pub leejtwg ua phem rua koj.

Kuv yuav khaiv koj moog qha cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj kuas puab tawm lug nyob qhov pum kev, hab tawm huv dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txhais teg lug cuag Vaajtswv. Thaus puab lug ntseeg kuv lawd, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim rua puab, puab txhaj tau lug nrug cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv xaiv ca ua Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg lawm nyob ua ke.’
“Vaajntxwv Akipas, tub yog vim le ntawd, kuv txhaj ua lawv le tej kws kuv nov lub suab sau ntuj has kuas kuv ua.

Kuv xub qha cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Damaxes, kuv maam le moog qha nraag lub nroog Yeluxalees. Tom qaab ntawd kuv moog qha thoob plawg huv lub xeev Yudais hab qha lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg kuas suavdlawg nyag tso nyag tej kev txhum tseg, hab tig rov lug cuag Vaajtswv, hab nyag ua nyag lub neej kuas phim qhov kws nyag tub tso nyag tej kev txhum tseg lawm.
Tub yog vim le ntawd, cov Yudais txhaj le tuaj nteg kuv huv lub Tuamtsev; thaus ntawd puab tub yuav muab kuv tua povtseg.

Tabsis Vaajtswv naj zag paab kuv lug txug naj nub nua, kuv txhaj le tau tuaj sawv ntawm nuav ua timkhawv qha tej kws kuv pum hab kuv paub lawm rua cov hlub cov yau suavdlawg noog. Tej kws kuv qha, kuv tsuas qha lawv le tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug hab Mauxes xub qha tseg lawm
has tas, tug Mexiyas yuav raug kev tsimtxom, hab nwg yuav yog thawj tug kws sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug. Nwg yuav qha qhov kaaj kws yog txujkev cawm dlim rua cov Yudais hab lwm Tsaav tuabneeg.”
Thaus Paulus taabtom has dlaws Paulus zaaj tsi tau taag, Fexatus txawm has nrov nrov rua Paulus has tas, “Paulus, koj vwm lawm! Tej kev txawj ntse kws koj kawm ua rua koj vwm lawm.”
Paulus teb has tas, “Fexatus, kuv tsi vwm! Kuv yeej meejpem hab tej lug kws kuv has nuav yeej muaj tseeb tag.
Vaajntxwv Akipas, kuv muaj sab tawv qha tej nuav rua koj, rua qhov koj yeej paub tej nuav taag lawm, vim tej nuav muaj taabmeeg suavdlawg. Kuv ntseeg has tas koj yeej paub tej nuav huv tuabsi lawm.
Vaajntxwv Akipas, koj puas ntseeg tej lug kws cov cev Vaajtswv lug qha? Kuv paub has tas koj yeej ntseeg tej lug ntawd.”
Vaajntxwv Akipas has rua Paulus has tas, “koj nyavnyuas qha mivntsiv rua kuv xwb, koj txawm siv xaav has tas, koj yuav yum tau kuv lug ntseeg Yexus nua los?”

Paulus teb has tas, “Txawm yog kuv qha ntau qha tsawg los kuv thov Vaajtswv paab koj hab mej txhua tug kws taabtom noog kuv qha nuav kuas suavdlawg lug ua ib yaam le kuv ua, tsuas yog tsi xob raug luas muab saw hlau khi le kuv raug nuav xwb.”
Paulus has le ntawd taag, Vaajntxwv Akipas hab tug Tswvxeev Fexatus, Npelanikes hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd txawm sawv,
hab thaus puab tawm moog rua nrau zoov lawm, puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav tsi tau ua ib qhov txhum kws yuav txaus muab nwg tua povtseg lossis muab nwg kaw rua huv tsev lojcuj.”
Vaajntxwv Akipas has rua Fexatus has tas, “Yog tug txivneej nuav tsi xob thov moog has tim Fuabtais Xixas, ces peb ca le muab nwg tso moog los tau.”

Thaus cov numtswv saablaaj pum zoo has tas, puab yuav xaa peb moog tim tebchaws Italis, puab muab Paulus hab ob peb tug tuabneeg raug txim rua Yuli-us kws yog cov Loos tug thawj tubrog pawg pua kws saib paab tubrog kws hu ua “Fuabtais Paab.”

Ces peb nce moog rua huv lub nkoj kws tuaj peg lub nroog Alimetis tuaj. Lub nkoj ntawd taabtom yuav moog rua tim tej nroog kws muaj chaw nreg nkoj huv xeev Axias, peb txawm caij moog. Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Alitakhus nrug peb moog. Aletakhus yog tuabneeg Makedaunias kws tuaj tim lub nroog Thexalaunikes tuaj.
Nub tom qaab peb moog txug huv lub nroog Xidoos. Yuli-us hlub Paulus, Yuli-us ca Paulus moog saib Paulus cov phoojywg, cov phoojywg ntawd txhaj muab tej qhov txhua chaw pub rua Paulus.
Thaus peb caij nkoj tawm huv lub nroog Xidoos moog, peb moog saab peg qaum koog Povtxwv Xaipas moog, rua qhov saab nraag cua ntsawj hlub heev.
Thaus peb caij nkoj moog, peb moog ze lub xeev Kilikias hab xeev Paafilias, peb maam le moog txug lub nroog Milas kws nyob huv tebchaws Likias.

Thaus peb tseem nyob huv lub nroog Milas muaj ib lub nkoj tuaj nraag lub nroog Alexaadias tuaj, lub nkoj ntawd yuav moog rua tim tebchaws Italis. Tug thawj tubrog pawg pua txawm kuas peb caij lub nkoj ntawm moog.

Peb caij nkoj moog qeeb heev, rua qhov muaj cua ntsawj hlub heev tom hauv ntej tuaj, peb txhaj moog tsi tau ceev. Peb moog tau ntau nub, peb maam le moog txug huv lub nroog Kanidus. Pheej muaj cua ntsawj hlub heev, peb moog tsi tau ncaaj nraim, peb txhaj lem nkoj moog rua nraag lub koog povtxwv Keletes, hab peb moog ze Keletes ceg kaum kws hu ua Xalemaunes moog.
Peb caij nkoj lawv ntug koog povtxwv moog nyuaj kawg le, peb maam le moog txug ib qho chaw kws suavdlawg hu ua Qhov Chaw Zoo Nreg Nkoj kws nyob ze lub nroog Laxe-as.
Peb nyob ntawm qhov chaw nreg nkoj ntawd tau ntev loo, tsi zoo caij nkoj moog lawm, rua qhov tub dlhau Nub ua Kevcai Theej Txhoj  lawm. Yog le ntawd Paulus txhaj has rua suavdlawg has tas,

“Cov kwvtij, yog peb caij nkoj moog ntxiv, ntshai peb yuav muaj kev txhawj kev ntshai heev, lub nkoj hab tej qhov txhua chaw kws peb thauj moog yuav puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi, tsi yog le ntawd xwb, tseem yuav muaj tuabneeg tuag hab.”
Txawm yog Paulus has le ntawd los tug thawj tsi noog Paulus lug, nwg tsuas noog tug tsaav nkoj hab tug tswv nkoj lug xwb.

Lub caij ntuj no tsi zoo nreg nkoj ntev ntawm qhov chaw ntawd, feem coob txhaj pum zoo caij nkoj tawm qhov chaw ntawd moog su tom lub nroog Faunis kws muaj chaw nreg nkoj. Lub nroog Faunis yog qhov chaw nreg nkoj ntawm lub koog Povtxwv Keletes kws tig rua saab qaabteb nubpoob hab saab qaumteb nubpoob.  Puab moog su qhov ntawd kuas dlhau lub caij ntuj no.

Thaus muaj cua tuaj quas ntxag saab qaabteb tuaj, puab xaav has tas, zoo moog rua tim lub nroog Faunis. Puab txawm nqug lub thauj lug rua sau lub nkoj, hab puab caij nkoj lawv ntug koog Povtxwv Keletes moog.
Tabsis thaus puab caij nkoj moog mivntsiv, txawm muaj ib nthwv cua ntsawj sau koog Povtxwv Kaletes tuaj. Nthwv cua ntawd suavdlawg hu ua “Cov Cua Saab Nubtuaj Qaumteb.”
Cov cua ntawd ntsawj lub nkoj kws peb caij, lub nkoj txawm moog tsi tau lawv ntug koog Povtxwv Kaletes moog.

Peb lem lub nkoj moog txug nraag ib lub koog Povtxwv miv miv kws hu ua Kaudas. Thaus peb moog txug nraag cua ntsawj tsi heev, rua qhov muaj lub koog povtxwv ntawd thaiv lawm, peb txhaj nqug lub nkoj miv lug khi rua ntawm lub nkoj luj, tabsis peb nqug nyuaj kawg le.

Thaus puab nqug tau lub nkoj lawm, puab muab hlua khi lub nkoj ruaj ruaj, rua qhov puab ntshai nyob tsaam lub nkoj moog tsoo cov xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv Linpias, puab txhaj muab dlaim ntaub cug cua txu, ca lub nkoj moog lawv le cua ntsawj.
Cua dlaaj cua dlub pheej tsi txawj tu le, thaus kaaj ntug lawm, puab muab tej qhov txhua chaw kws puab thauj moog, thau povtseg rua huv havtxwv.
Nub tom qaab puab txawm muab tej qhov txhua chaw kws puab siv huv lub nkoj thau povtseg huv tuabsi hab.
Peb tsi pum lub nub hab lub hli tau ntau nub los cua dlaaj cua dlub tseem ntsawj le qub. Thaus ntawd peb txhaj xaav has tas, ntshai peb yuav tsi dlim le lawm.

Tau ntau nub cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nkoj tsi muaj leejtwg noj mov le, Paulus txawm sawv ntsug has tas, “Cov kwvtij, yog mej ntxuv noog kuv lug, peb nyob tuabywv tom lub koog Povtxwv Keletes tsi xob tuaj, ces peb tub tsi raug kev txomnyem hab peb tej qhov txhua chaw yuav tsi poob taag.
Tabsis kuv has rua mej has tas, mej tsi xob txhawj! Peb cov kws nyob ntawm nuav yuav tsi muaj ib tug tuag le, tsuas yog lub nkoj yuav puag taag xwb.
Kuv paub le nuav, rua qhov naag mo tug Vaajtswv kws kuv naj nub pehawm khaiv nwg ib tug timtswv lug has rua kuv has tas,
‘Paulus, koj tsi xob ntshai! Koj yeej yuav tau moog sawv taabmeeg Fuabtais Xixas xwb. Vaajtswv hlub koj heev, Vaajtswv yuav tsi pub cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nkoj nuav ib tug tuag le.’
Yog le ntawd cov kwvtij, mej tsi xob txhawj! Rua qhov kuv ntseeg has tas, Vaajtswv yeej yuav ua lawv le nwg tau qha rua kuv lawm.
Txawm yog le caag los peb lub nkoj yeej yuav moog khuab rua ib lub koog povtxwv xwb.”

Cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj peb lub nkoj moog moog lug lug huv Havtxwv Meditelanees tau kaum plaub mos, mo ntawd kwvlaam ib taag mo, cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv lub nkoj xaav has tas lub nkoj tub moog yuav txug tim ntug,

puab txawm muab ib txuj hlua khi lub thauj tso rua huv havtxwv ntsuag saib tub le caag. Thaus puab ntsuag taag, puab pum has tas tub neeg nkaum dlaaj, lub nkoj moog mivntsiv puab rov ntsuag dlua, puab pum has tas tub kaum tsib dlaag.
Puab ntshai nyob tsaam lub nkoj moog tsoo pobzeb, puab txhaj muab plaub lub thauj tom tw nkoj tso rua huv havtxwv kuas lub nkoj nreg. Mo ntawd peb laaj tog txug kaaj ntug kawg le.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv lub nkoj xaav tsiv, puab txawm muab lub nkoj miv tso rua huv havtxwv, puab ua txuj ua yaam le puab yuav muab cov thauj hlau kws nyob tom taubhau nkoj tso rua huv dlej.
Tabsis Paulus has rua tug thawj tubrog pawg pua hab cov tubrog has tas, “Yog puab cov ntawd tsiv lawm, ces mej cov nyob ntawm nuav yuav tsi muaj ib tug dlim le.”
Cov tubrog nov Paulus has le ntawd, cov tubrog txawm muab txuj hlua kws khi lub nkoj miv txav tso lub nkoj miv rua dlej ntsawj moog.
Thaus yuav kaaj ntug, Paulus kuas suavdlawg noj mov. Paulus has tas, “Mej tub tog saib cua dlaaj cua dlub puas tu lug tau kaum plaub nub nuav lawm, mej tsi tau noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Yog le ntawd, thov mej ca le noj mov, mej txhaj le yuav tsi tuag. Txawm yog mej tej plaubhau los yuav tsi muaj ib txuj poob le.”
Thaus Paulus has le ntawd taag, Paulus txawm muab ib lub ncuav lug ua Vaajtswv tsaug taabmeeg suavdlawg, nwg maam le muab ndlais noj.
Thaus puab nov Paulus has le ntawd, puab zoo sab mivntsiv, puab txhua tug txhaj noj mov hab.
Taagnrho peb cov kws nyob huv lub nkoj muaj ob puas xyaa caum rau leej.
Thaus puab noj mov taag lawm, puab muab cov nplej kws puab thauj moog, thau povtseg rua huv havtxwv kuas lub nkoj sib mivntsiv.

Thaus kaaj ntug lawm, cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv lub nkoj pum ib lub koog povtxwv, tabsis puab tsi paub has tas yog lub twg. Puab pum ib ceg havtxwv kws muaj xuabzeb, puab xaav has tas tso lub nkoj ncaaj nraim moog rua ntawd nyaj yuav moog txug tim ntug.

Puab txawm muab tej hlua kws khi cov thauj txav tso cov thauj rua huv havtxwv, hab dlaws txuj hlua kws khi ob tug dluav kws tswj lub nkoj povtseg, hab puab nthuav dlaim ntaub cug cua nyob tom taubhau rua cua ntsawj lub nkoj kuas ncaaj nraim moog rua tim ntug.
Tabsis thaus puab caij lub nkoj moog tsi tau txug tim ntug, tog taubhau nkoj txawm moog dlaig nkaus ruaj ruaj rua ntawm cov xuabzeb lawm, dlej ndlaas tuaj ntsawj yaav tw nkoj tawg yuav laug taag.
Cov tubrog ntshai nyob tsaam cov tuabneeg raug txim ua luam dlej tsiv, puab txawm sis thaam has tas, yuavtsum muab cov tuabneeg raug txim tua povtseg huv tuabsi.

Tabsis tug thawj tubrog pawg pua xaav paab Paulus, nwg txhaj txwv tsi pub kuas puab muab cov tuabneeg raug txim tua povtseg, tug thawj tubrog has kuas cov kws txawj ua luam dlej, dlha rua huv dlej ua luam dlej moog rua tim ntug,

cov kws tsi txawj ua luam dlej ca le muab tej dlaim txag hab tej yaav ntoo kws luv ntawm lub nkoj lug tag hauvsab ua luam dlej moog rua tim ntug. Puab ua le ntawd, suavdlawg txhaj moog txug tim ntug huv tuabsi tsi muaj ib tug tuag le.
Thaus peb txhua tug dlim hab tawm tau rua tim ntug lawm, peb txhaj paub has tas, lub koog povtxwv ntawd hu ua Malatas.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub koog povtxwv ntawd hlub peb kawg le. Puab rauv tawg rua peb nte, rua qhov thaus ntawd taabtom lug naag hab no heev.
Paulus moog khaws tau ib tsuag tawg lug, nwg taabtom yuav muab tso rua huv qhovcub, thaus paa tawg txhawb, muaj ib tug naab tawm huv tsuag tawg lug tum Paulus txhais teg.

Thaus cov tuabneeg Malatas pum tug naab tum dlai vag ntawm Paulus txhais teg, puab sis thaam has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav, ntshai nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg tua tuabneeg, txawm yog nwg dlim kev tuag huv havtxwv lug lawm los Ntuj tseem tsi tseg nwg nyob hab.”
Tabsis Paulus nchus tug naab poob rua huv qhovcub, Paulus tsi mob le caag le.

Cov tuabneeg ntawd pum naab tum Paulus txhais teg, puab xaav has tas, ntshai Paulus txhais teg yuav o lossis Paulus yuav ca le qaug ntawg hab tuag kag taamsim ntawd, puab tog tog, tabsis tsi pum muaj le caag, ces puab tsua has tas, “Nwg yog vaajtswv.”

Tug nom kws kaav lub koog povtxwv Malatas hu ua Puli-us, nwg lub tsev nyob tsi dleb ntawm qhov chaw kws cov tuabneeg Malatas rauv tawg rua peb nte, peb moog su huv Puli-us tsev tau peb nub, hab Puli-us nrhav zaub nrhav mov zoo kawg rua peb noj.

Thaus ntawd Puli-us txiv taabtom ua npaws hab thoj plaab. Paulus moog saib Puli-us txiv huv txaaj hab thov Vaajtswv paab khu nwg. Thaus Paulus thov Vaajtswv, Paulus cev teg tuav nwg, ces nwg tej mob txawm zoo lawm.
Thaus Paulus khu Puli-us txiv zoo lawm, cov tuabneeg muaj mob kws nyob huv lub koog povtxwv ntawd txawm tuaj cuag Paulus, hab puab txhua tug tej mob zoo huv tuabsi.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd nqaa ntau yaam tuaj pub rua peb hab ua peb tsaug. Hab thaus peb yuav caij nkoj moog, puab nqaa qhov txhua chaw tuaj tso rua huv lub nkoj rua peb siv.

Peb nyob huv koog povtxwv Malatas tau peb lub hlis, tom qaab ntawd, peb nce moog rua huv lub nkoj kws hu ua “Vaajtswv Ntxaib,” lub nkoj ntawd tuaj nraag lub nroog Alexaadias tuaj su huv lub koog Povtxwv ntawd kuas dlhau lub caij ntuj no.
Thaus peb moog txug peg lub nroog Xilakuxes, peb nyob ntawd tau peb nub.
tom qaab ntawd peb caij nkoj moog rua peg lub nroog Lenki-oos. Nub tom qaab muaj cua ntsawj saab qaabteb tuaj, peb caij nkoj moog ob nub txhaj moog txug peg lub nroog Pute-aulis.
Thaus peb moog txug huv lub nroog ntawd lawm, peb moog saib cov ntseeg. Puab thov kuas peb nrug puab nyob xyaa nub. Tom qaab ntawd peb maam le moog txug peg lub nroog Loos.

Thaus cov kwvtij ntseeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Loos nov has tas peb moog, puab txawm tuaj tog peb. Muaj ibtxha tuaj tog peb nraag lub Kab Api-us, muaj ibtxha tuaj tog peb nraag lub zog kws hu ua Peb Lub Tsev Su. Thaus Paulus pum cov ntseeg tuaj tog peb, nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug hab nwg kaaj sab mivntsiv.
Thaus peb moog txug huv lub nroog Loos lawm, cov numtswv ca Paulus nwg nyob nwg, tsuas yog puab tso ib tug tubrog zuv Paulus xwb.

Tau peb nub tom qaab Paulus txawm hu cov Yudais tej thawjcoj kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tuaj saablaaj. Thaus suavdlawg tuaj txhij lawm, Paulus has rua puab has tas, “Cov kwvtij, txawm yog kuv tsi tau ua txhum peb tsaav tuabneeg lossis tsi tau ua txhum peb cov yawmkoob tej kevcai los cov Yudais ca le nteg kuv tim lub nroog Yeluxalees hab muab rua cov numtswv Loos txav txim.
Thaus cov numtswv Loos taug kuv zaaj taag, puab xaav tso kuv, rua qhov puab tsi pum kuv ua ib qho txhum kws yuav txaus muab kuv tua povtseg,
tabsis cov Yudais txwv tsi pub puab tso kuv, kuv txhaj thov tuaj cuag Fuabtais Xixas. Kuv ua le nuav, tsi yog kuv yuav tuaj nkaug kuv tsaav tuabneeg rua Fuabtais Xixas.

Qhov kws kuv hu mej tuaj ntawm nuav yog kuv xaav pum mej hab qha rua mej paub has tas, vim le caag luas txhaj muab saw hlau khi kuv. Kuv raug khi le nuav tub yog kuv ntseeg tug kws cov Yixalayees ca sab rua.”

Puab has rua Paulus has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nyob tim lub xeev Yudas tsi muaj ib tug sau koj zaaj tuaj rua peb paub le. Hab peb cov kwvtij kws nyob tid tuaj saib peb, tabsis peb tsi nov puab has ib yaam dlaabtsi txug koj le.

Peb cov kws tuaj ntawm nuav, peb xaav paub has tas zaaj kws koj ntseeg yog le caag, rua qhov peb pheej nov has tas, tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov chaw, suavdlawg ntxub cov tuabneeg kws ntseeg le koj ntseeg. Zaaj nuav peb paub tsi tseeb, thov koj qha rua peb.”

Puab txawm teem ib lub sijhawm yuav nrug Paulus thaam. Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, muaj tuabneeg coob coob tuaj cuag Paulus huv lub tsev kws Paulus nyob. Paulus qha cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntawd ib nub tsaus ntuj. Nwg qha txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws. Nwg muab tej lug kws Mauxes hab cov cev Vaajtswv lug sau tseg lawm qha rua puab kuas puab lug ntseeg Yexus.
Thaus Paulus qha taag, muaj ibtxha ntseeg tej kws Paulus qha, tabsis muaj ibtxha tsi ntseeg,

cov tuabneeg ntawd tsi sis hum, nyag txawm tawm nyag lawm. Thaus puab yuav moog Paulus has ib lus rua puab has tas, “Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv kuas Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tseeb rua mej cov yawmkoob:
Nwg has tas, ‘Ca le moog has rua cov tuabneeg nuav has tas, mej yuav noog taag noog thab, tabsis mej yuav tsi totaub, mej yuav saib taag saib thab, tabsis mej yuav tsi pum,

cov tuabneeg nuav lub sab ruag, puab tsi xaav noog, puab txhaj ntsaws qhovntsej, puab tsi xaav pum, puab txhaj qe qhovmuag. Yog puab tsi ua le ntawd nyob tsaam puab qhovmuag yuav pum, puab qhovntsej yuav nov hab puab yuav totaub, ces puab yuav tig rov lug cuag kuv, hab kuv yuav khu puab tej mob.’ ”
Paulus xaus lug has tas, “Kuv qha rua mej has tas, tub muaj tuabneeg moog qha Vaajtswv txujlug kws yog txujkev cawm dlim rua lwm Tsaav Tuabneeg lawm. Puab yeej yuav noog!”
Thaus Paulus has le ntawd taag, cov Yudais sis caav heev, ces puab nyag txawm tawm nyag moog lawm.
Paulus nyob huv lub tsev kws nwg ndlav tau ob xyoos txwm nkaus, nwg tog txais txhua tug kws tuaj saib nwg.
Nwg qha txug Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws hab qha Tswv Yexus Khetos zaaj rua txhua tug noog, nwg tsi ntshai leejtwg le hab tsi muaj leejtwg txwv nwg.
